Subject: unable to delete ticket so have removed text
Text:
I have two panels on a page.   One has search criteria and the other the aspxgrid which will display the results.     When the page is first displayed, the panel with the d=grid is hidden since there are no results as yet.     The user fills in the criteria and clicks on the search button which then retrieves the required data from the database and populates the grid and then makes the panel with the grid visible to the user.

What is happening is that the grid is displayed but none of the paging works.     The paging does work if I make the panel with the grid visible from the start but this does not look right to the user since they can see an emply grid.    I have tried turning off clallbacks but this does not work.

Please advise.

Subject: dxTextBox - The onEnterKey handler does not pass the validationGroup option in Angular 2

Subject: SessionMixingException occurs in some scenarios if a non persistent object is the BaseObject descendant
Text:
Hi,

I'm getting a SessionMixingException when I update persistent objects, from a listview action that opens up a nonpersistent detail view.
This worked fine in previous DX versions but not in 13.2.7.

I've attached an example that demonstrates the issue. On the 'Data Row Item' List view there is an action button 'Allocate Data'. This pops up a nonpersistent detail view of type DataItemAllocationCriteria.

The user picks all sorts of options (limited in this example) that are applied to select dataRowItems to allocate to a person.

The action then assigns the selected number of DataRowItems to the personnel, if I call ObjectSpace.Refresh() in order to refresh the root list view, now I get this exception on my nonpersistent object:

Type: SessionMixingException
     Message: The 'SessionMixingExample.Module.BusinessObjects.DataItemAllocationCriteria' object belongs to a different session.


I would appreciate any assistance with this problem.

Subject: "TypeError: element.id.indexOf is not a function" JavaScript error if an array is passed to the isDXScriptElement function
Text:
Hi,

When using the Devexpress in a page which also loads data using Jquery ajax , one of the function in the script in (MVC/utils.js)

function isDXScriptElement(element){ return element && element.id && element.id.indexOf(__aspxStartupScriptPrefix) == 0; }

throws an exception, if the element being loaded has an id property and it is not of string type, The workaround i have done for now is to override this function to

function isDXScriptElement(element){ return element && element.id && element.id.toString().indexOf(__aspxStartupScriptPrefix) == 0; }

Can this be done in a different way or will this be marked as bug which will be fixed in the next release.

Subject: A color scheme is not applied to a theme with a renamed root folder
Text:
The theme editor sometimes makes assumptions about the root folder name.

For example, I have themes for various different versions of the controls, but if I rename the theme folder from DevExpress.Xpf.Themes.MyTheme to DevExpress.Xpf.Themes.MyTheme.14.2.4, then the theme editor will give me an error when creating or opening a color scheme because it is trying to access the DevExpress.Xpf.Themes.MyTheme folder.

I know I could add an extra folder level, like this: DevExpress.Xpf.Themes.MyTheme.14.2.4\DevExpress.Xpf.Themes.MyTheme. But I would rather not have to do that. Right now my workaround is to rename the folder, edit my theme, then rename it back.

It would be nice if the theme editor did everything relative to the folder of the theme project so that the root folder name didn't matter.

It would be nice if the theme editor did everything relative to the folder of the theme project so that the root folder name didn't matter.

Subject: A custom data source does not apply paging, filtering, sorting and grouping
Text:
I have created a custom data source as shown below:

var dataSource = new DevExpress.data.DataSource({ load: function (loadOptions) { var d = new $.Deferred(); $.getJSON('http://mydomain.com/MyDataService').done(function (data) { ... d.resolve(data); }); return d.promise(); } });

Now, I want to filter data and I am using the following code:

dataSource.filter("Name", "contains", 'SomeValue'); dataSource.load();

My data source does not apply a filter expression and loads all data. How can I solve the problem?

Subject: A dialog has an incorrect position after the virtual keyboard is hidden on iOS
Text:
I have a dxlist that contains text boxes.

The last row of the list contains buttons.

Clicking a button displays a dialog, prompting for confirmation.

In the scenario where rows in the lower part of the list are tapped, the screen is "moved up" to allow for the keyboard and the virtual keyboard is displayed.

Tapping the button to display the dialog displays the dialog as per the attached image.

This only appears to be an issue on an iPad mini running ios7. it appears ok on an ipad mini running ios6 and also on an iPad4 running ios7.I have not tested it on android.

Project (and image) attached.

Subject: A form is scaled incorrectly after loading a SpellChecker if the SpellChecker.Culture property value differs from the current machine culture
Text:
Hello,

Problem1:
we develop winforms app using spellchecker control. We observe strange behavior. On displays when zoomfactor is more than 100%, let's say 150% the app is correctly displayed, but immediately when some form which contains spellchecker control is displayed/instantiated the zoomfactor of the application is reset to 100% and gets unreadable on the display, because the letters are too small.

This occures in strange conditions. When culture of spellchecker component is set to sk-SK, everything works as expected. When I change the culture to ch-DE, problems occures.

Please see attached solution to reproduce the problem.

Problem2:
Even when the zoom is ok, the text and details are blurry.

Please see attached document for details. Problem1 is realy bad, because we cannot deliver application to customers which have more than 100% zoom in windows settings. Problem2 is not so hot, but we would like to solve it.

Subject: A NotSupportedException is raised when  a new value is selected while different enum types with the same name are used in several ComboBoxEdits
Text:
Hi DevExpress,

I run into problem with binding ComboBoxEdit to an enum. Everything works fine until I have 2 different enums defined inside separate classes but with the same enum name (and enum values). Combobox which is "loaded" first behaves like expected, the other shows a validation error (Value '' could not be converted). This happens even when comboboxes exist in separate user controls.

When I try to select value of second combobox, there is following error in VS output window: Cannot convert 'Foo' from type 'EDataType' to type 'EnumBindingDemo.Data2+EDataType' for 'en-US' culture with default conversions; consider using Converter property of Binding. NotSupportedException:'System.NotSupportedException: EnumConverter cannot convert from EnumBindingDemo.Data1+EDataType.

To me it seems like the enum type is cached by its name somewhere and then during second conversion types don't match. If I rename one of the enums everything works ok.

I attached a simple demo where you can see the behaviour.

Kind regards
Robert

Subject: A popup menu does not display all toolbars
Text:
Hello support team,

I'm using a ToolbarListItem feature to list all toolbars of my application in an menu list.
How to reproduce:
Please open the attached application and perform following steps:
1. Go to Toolbars item an do mouse click. => the submenu lists entries named 'Toolbar', 'File' and 'Customize...'.
2. Open Customization Window.
3. Create a new Toolbar and close the Customization Window.
4. Go to Toolbars item an do mouse click. => the submenu is empty (the object name an type are noted).

Previously I was used Version 14.1.6 in my application and there the behavior was still correct.
What can I do to fix the faulty behavior of the ToolbarListItem feature?

Thanks
Viktor

Subject: A RichEditControl calculates a paragraph indent incorrectly after resetting numbering for this paragraph
Text:
I have a bug with the indentation with this sequence in our application: 
- Create Letter;
- Creat a many lines in the letter;
- Insert several Bullet and Numbering on this new lines;
- Save (with SaveDocument method in RTF format) and Close the letter;
- Open the letter (with LoadDocument);
- Place the cursor just after the bullet;
- Click on the Bullet/Numbering button on the Toolbar.

Result : the indentation is the same without Bullet or Numbering. But the indentation works fine until the Save, Close and Open...

How I can fix this problem?

Thanks for your help!

Subject: A TcxRegisterClasses object is not destroyed on unloading the DLL containing ExpressEditors components
Text:
It may happen that some instances of TcxRegisteredClasses won't be freed when you call dxFinalize before the module is unloaded:

1. So first problem ist located in cxEdit.pas where the finalization method "UnregisterAssistants" is registered at dxUnitsLoader. So the FRegisteredEditProperties member will be freed after we call dxFinalize. 
In our case we do it just before the DLL will be unloaded.
2. Next problem is in some unit finalization sections, for example at cxProgressBar.pas. There is a method called "GetRegisteredEditProperties.Unregister(TcxProgressBarProperties)". The "GetRegisteredEditProperties" funtion than creates a new FRegisteredEditProperties member which no one will ever free again.

Solution:
- So all of the  GetRegisteredEditProperties-calls in the unit finalization sections should be registered at dxUnitsLoader or
- GetRegisteredEditProperties should not create new instances after it was uninitialized by someone.

Subject: A TcxRegisterClasses object is not destroyed on unloading the DLL containing ExpressEditors components.
Text:
It may happen that some instances of TcxRegisteredClasses won't be freed when you call dxFinalize before the module is unloaded:

1. So first problem ist located in cxEdit.pas where the finalization method "UnregisterAssistants" is registered at dxUnitsLoader. So the FRegisteredEditProperties member will be freed after we call dxFinalize. 
In our case we do it just before the DLL will be unloaded.
2. Next problem is in some unit finalization sections, for example at cxProgressBar.pas. There is a method called "GetRegisteredEditProperties.Unregister(TcxProgressBarProperties)". The "GetRegisteredEditProperties" funtion than creates a new FRegisteredEditProperties member which no one will ever free again.

Solution:
- So all of the  GetRegisteredEditProperties-calls in the unit finalization sections should be registered at dxUnitsLoader or
- GetRegisteredEditProperties should not create new instances after it was uninitialized by someone.

Thanks a lot.

Marinko

Subject: Add an option to configure system types or built-in types usage in the "String.Format" refactoring
Text:
Refactor! offers me to use String.Format() instead of string.Format(). Where can I configure it so that string.Format() would be suggested?

It is recommended and also accepted by the most C# developers using the native types for the most scenarios. This also applies to int for example. Developers should prefer using int instead of Int32 for example.

Subject: Application hangs on an attempt to print an attached XLSX file
Text:
Hello DevExpress Support,

I'm currently evalulating the Spreadsheet Document Server for editing and exporting Excel sheets to PDF. On the second spreadsheet the .CreateDocument() function never returns and is using 100% cpu (version 2.9) or raises an internal exception (version 2.8).

<TestMethod()> Public Sub ExportWorkbookPDF() Dim workBook As New Workbook workBook.LoadDocument("C:\Develop\Sheet.xlsx", DocumentFormat.OpenXml) Using printingSystem As New PrintingSystem() Using link As New PrintableComponentLink(printingSystem) link.Component = workBook.Worksheets(0) link.CreateDocument() link.PrintingSystem.PreviewFormEx.ShowDialog() link.PrintingSystem.ExportToPdf("C:\Develop\Sheet_0.pdf") End Using Using link As New PrintableComponentLink(printingSystem) link.Component = workBook.Worksheets(1) link.CreateDocument() link.PrintingSystem.PreviewFormEx.ShowDialog() link.PrintingSystem.ExportToPdf("C:\Develop\Sheet_1.pdf") End Using End Using workBook.Dispose() End Sub
Furthermore, I would like to know if and when Charts (only export, no editing) are supported.

Regards,
Michael

Subject: Asian characters are not displayed correctly on exporting data to PDF
Text:
When using the Dashboard Viewer to export to PDF , Japanese characters are not displaying properly in the output. So far we have not had any issues with characters not displaying properly in the designer or viewer so it only appears to be a PDF export issue.(the export to image works fine) I have verified that the same problem occurs in the designer and both the web viewer and win viewer.

I have a feeling it is strictly a font/font encoding issue, so if there was a way to set the font and font encoding used by the pdf exporter in code then I could properly work around the issue. I tried changing the font properties of the viewer component to use a standard japanese font and to use the Japanese character set, however this did not seem to affect the font used by the PDF exporter.

At this stage in the evaluation process we are very satisfied with the features provided by your product and this is the first major problem we have had , as such it would please me greatly if we could find a way to solve the export issue.

I have provided a sample PDF to illustrate the problem. You can recognize the characters not being exported correctly as they appear as squares.

Text:

I have a XAF Web application that I want to set the Horizontal Layout, so I seted the parameter WebWindowTemplateHttpHander.PreferedApplicationWindowTemplateType = Template.Horizontal

Now I realized that the behavior of the navigation bar (menu) is diferent in those Templates Types.

Using the vertical template the navigation bar, it shows the multi-level items, otherwise using the horizontal template the sub-items are not showed. (see attachment)

Thanks,
Sandro.

Subject: ASP.NET MVC Data persistance between user login sessions
Text:
Hey

I am a WinForms developer and after making my first footsteps with ASP.NET MVC, I decided to go on with this programming Framework.

Now, I was thinking of how to create my new Software and before I start, I have already a big question...
How can I make my actual view persistent?

What I try to achive is as follows in a Little Szenario.

A user logs into the MVC Site and choose  to query some Customer data.
After that, the user logs off (the result of the query is still visible)

When the user logs on again, this last result of his query should be visible again.
So, like a persistence Framework.

How can I achieve something like this?

THX for every tip you have for me.

Subject: ASPxButtonEdit  - "number.toFixed is not a function" JavaScript error on a button click
ASPxButtonEdit  - "number.toFixed is not a function" JavaScript error on a button click
Text:
We have an issue with RoundNumber function as it produces javascript error on button click:

TypeError: number.toFixed is not a function
http://localhost:44004/DXR.axd?r=1_145,1_81,1_137,1_99,1_106,1_98,1_130,1_78,1_128,1_101,1_105,1_126,1_84,1_92,1_135,1_121,1_129,1_80,1_95,1_91,1_114,1_104,1_79,1_120-KIIp9
Line 30424

RoundNumber: function(number) {
  if(this.decimalPlaces <= 0 || number == null)
   return number;
  return parseFloat(number.toFixed(this.decimalPlaces));
 },

which should be like this:

RoundNumber: function(number) {
  if(this.decimalPlaces <= 0 || number == null)
   return number;
  return parseFloat(number).toFixed(this.decimalPlaces);
 },

Please provide a hotfix ASAP.

Subject: ASPxCallbackPanel - The "HTTP Error 404.0 - Not Found" error is raised during an attempt to run the application
Text:
Hello,

I have an ASPX that was working with v13.2, but when upgrading the ASPXCallbackPanel makes the browser give a HTTP Error 404.0 - Not Found, Error Code: 0x80070002. Here is the code: 

<%@ Page Title="" Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/Site.Master" AutoEventWireup="true" CodeBehind="TestControl.aspx.cs" Inherits="Test.Test.TestControl" %>


<%@ Register Assembly="DevExpress.Web.v17.2, Version=17.2.8.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b88d1754d700e49a" Namespace="DevExpress.Web" TagPrefix="dx" %>


<asp:Content runat="server" ContentPlaceHolderID="MainContent">
    <dx:ASPxListBox ID="ASPxListBox1" runat="server" ValueType="System.String"></dx:ASPxListBox>
    <dx:ASPxCallbackPanel ID="ASPxCallbackPanelCurrency" runat="server" ClientInstanceName="ASPxCallbackPanelCurrency">
    </dx:ASPxCallbackPanel>
</asp:Content>

If I remove the ASPxCallbackPanel, the page opens correctly.

Thank you for your assistance,

Javier

Text: I have the AspxCardView set to 100% but when the browser window is resized the cards appear to be left justified instead of centered.  Is there away to have the cards re-center on windows resize?

Text:
Hello,
 
I am using DevExpress 18.2.3 ASP.NET WebForms. My question is in regards to the iOS theme. How can I reduce the size of the checkbox and radiobutton controls to more closely be the size of those in the Material Compact theme? Subject: ASPxCheckBox, ASPxCheckBoxList, ASPxRadioButton, ASPxRadioButtonList -  Improve Accessibility (Section 508) - Add an associated label for editors
Text: When using the ASPxCheckBox, and populating it's Text property, the html produced contains a label tag for that text. However, that label tag is not associated with the input tag, which causes my page to fail certain accessibility tests. I think can get around this by creating labels within a hidden div and setting the AssociatedControlId to point to the input tag. But it would be better if the label tag generated by the "Text" Property would populate the "for" attribute automatically.

Subject: ASPxCheckBoxList  - Add the SelectField property
Text:
It sure would be nice if CheckBoxLists had a way to set the Selected flag on the Add.
I would propose both a SelectField on the html  like ValueField and TextField and an optional field on the Items.Add that would allow me to specify if it is selected from the code-behind.

I spent a lot of time trying to make value do the selecting, since I was expecting a one step process.  If I had seen the selected value from either the html or code-behind, I would have realized that value was an identifier and not the checkbox (value of true/false or 0/1)

Subject: ASPxClientDashboardViewer.ExportToPdf(ASPxClientDashboardExportOptions options) - FileName & Title Options are not available
Text:
Hi,

I am trying to export dashboard from client side by using ExportToPdf method with Options parameter.

Based on the following documentation, the available options are only:

https://documentation.devexpress.com/#Dashboard/DevExpressDashboardWebScriptsASPxClientDashboardExportOptionsMembersTopicAll

- autoFitPageCount
- pageLayout
- paperKind
- scaleFactor
- scaleMode

Following are my questions:

1. Could you please let me know how to change the File Name and Title if I use this client side method?

2. I notice that the current ExportToPdf, export the whole dashboard or all the dashboard items. How to export any single dashboard item from client side using this ExportToPdf method?

3. One more thing, without any documentation of available value for each option. Let's say the scaleMode, how I am supposed to know what the available mode for this option beside "UseScaleFactor"?

There's only this sample option that I've found so far in the documentation:

WebViewer.ExportToPdf({ pageLayout: 'Landscape', paperKind: 'A4', scaleMode: 'UseScaleFactor', scaleFactor: 1.0 });

Regards,
Laks

Subject: ASPxCloudControl - ASPxClientCloudControlItemEventArgs.name is empty in the ItemClick event handler when the ShowValues property is set to True
Text:
On ASPxCloudControl ItemClick client side event, the ASPxClientCloudControlItemEventArgs object should provide a name property for clicked item. It is true for ASPxCloudControl with ShowValues=false, but for ShowValues=true the name is empty.
See attached solution.

Subject: ASPxComboBox - "Input string was not in a correct format" error message
Text:
I'm using asp.net webforms, aspxformlayout control, sqldatasource control, and I'm inserting a record via stored procedure.

I'm getting the infamous "Input string was not in a correct format" error msg. I'm familiar with this problem when working with the aspxGridview control but this is in a regular group of editor controls in an aspxformlayout.

I have the following questions:
1) Where is this error coming from??? (I think it's the datasource control that throws this error)
2) How do I test for which value and from which control this is crashing from???
And most importantly...
3) How do I fix it???

Files attached.

Pete

Also, how do I tell which build I have ?

Subject: ASPxComboBox - Cascading Combo Boxes - Unable to get a value on the callback of ASPxCallbackPanel
Text:
Hello,

I am currently testing the DevExpress suite for a project. I want to use Cascading Comboboxes (Demo here) and send data to the server via a callback panel. For the sake of brevity, I would include only the most important part in the code sample.

My problem is the following : I have a combobox which is filled during a callback, based on the selected item in another combobox. I also have a button which initiates a callback of a ASPxCallbackPanel, which, on it's part, tries to send data to the server - the values of the selected items of the comboboxes.

My second combobox is obviously filled during its own callback, JavaScript reacting to selected index changed, alerting with the selected value on the screen. Unfortunately, when I try to send the data to the server via a callback from the panel, it sees my combobox as empty, selectedItem as null, and trying to get the value throws a NullReferenceException.

Been trying to find out why it acts like this for a few days now. I would like to avoid a full page postback on button click AND a full panel callback on cb1.SelectedIndexChanged at all costs.

Kind regards,
Daniel

Subject: ASPxCombobox - Incremental filtering - How to avoid selecting first element automatically if filering mode is "StartsWith"
Text:
Hello. My project has a ASPxCombobox with IncrementalFilteringMode="StartsWith". When I enter the letter, the search and complete begins. This behavior does not suit me.
I need to have the same behavior as when adding FiltteringMode = "Contains", but only to search by the first letter.. That is, the search is performed on items but without autocomplete in the field .

For example:
My combobox has one item "test". When i type 't' should be filtered by elements but in the field must be only 't' not 'test'.

I tried to use event ClientSideEvents-ItemFiltering="itemfiltering".

function itemfiltering(s, e) {  
        e.item.text = e.filter;
        e.item.texts[0] = e.filter;
        e.item.value = e.filter;    
}

It works right of typed 2 or less symbols but for 3 and more it doesn't working(

Please help!

Subject: ASPxDashboardViewer - It is not possible to set a default value for Parameter using the CustomParameters event
Text:
We are successfully automatically setting Start Date and End Date parameters in code behind of an aspx page using CustomParametersWebEventArgs in OnCustomParameters event. The Dashboard data source is updated correctly.

However, when we click on the filter pop-up in the web GUI to manually set the Start Date and End Date, the original parameter values from the dashboard definition are still there -- not the parameter values that were set in code behind when the dash first loads. See attached image.

Is there a way to update the pop-up parameters to reflect what was set at runtime?

Thanks much

Hi,

I have a webform that contains a few AspxDateEdit controls.

When I retrieve the data (EF 4.0) back from the Azure SQL database and set the aspxdateedit controls the date changes
from Uk -> US.

Uk=dd/MM/yyyy and US=mm/dd/yyyy.

I've attached a document showing how I set and check the culture within the application and how the control take the UK date and resets it to US.

Can you see what I am doing incorrectly?

Thanks,
Graham

Subject: ASPxDockPanel - Drag&Drop animation and panel position are incorrect
Text:
Hello,
I have attached the project based on sample "ASPxDockZone - How to allow end-users to resize a control", the only difference - at the top of page lies div with some height. You can reproduce this issue with dragging ASPxDockPanel and docking it to zone. Help me to overcome this problem please.


Thanks in advance!

Subject: ASPxDocumentViewer - How to Disable/Hide the Print One Page action on print preview
Text:
I'm trying to find a way to hide or remove the print one page button from the standard tool bar on the print preview dialog.

I'm using ReportsAspNetModuleV2.ReportViewerType = ASP


I've created a view control, set the TargetViewID
TargetViewId = ReportsAspNetModuleV2.ReportViewDetailViewWebName;

Now I'm trying to figure out how to get a hold of the toolbar

This is all I got, am I getting close:

ReportViewerDetailItem reportViewItem = ((DetailView)View).GetItems<ReportViewerDetailItem>()[0] as ReportViewerDetailItem;


protected override void OnActivated() {
base.OnActivated();
ReportViewerDetailItem reportViewItem = ((DetailView)View).GetItems<ReportViewerDetailItem>()[0] as ReportViewerDetailItem;

// Need something like this I guess?
//reportViewItem.ReportViewer.SettingsToolbar


}

Can you point me in the right direction.

Text:
See attached image.
I love the new document viewer. The only problem I am having is trying to center the menu items on the menubar. I tried setting the following property:

Subject: ASPxDropDownEdit -  JavaScript error is thrown after a second postback if ASPxListBox is inside DropDownWindowTemplate
Text:
Get error: "SCRIPT5007: Unable to get property 'SetValue' of undefined or null reference" in DXR.axd for statement:
internalCheckBox.SetValue(checked ? ASPxClientCheckBoxInputKey.Checked : ASPxClientCheckBoxInputKey.Unchecked);

The dropdowns don't work and you can't enter anything in the text entry fields. See attached Word document on how to reproduce this error.

Sorry for the large attachment, but a lot of SQL was required to get to the point of failure.

Subject: ASPxFileManage - How to get the source code for the Multi-File Selection online demo
Text:
hi,

In your multiple file selection demo:
http://demos.devexpress.com/ASPxFileManagerAndUploadDemos/UploadControl/MultiFileSelection.aspx

I am trying to implement the UploadedFilesContainer. I believe some of the code is missing from the demo.
On researching further I realized there are a couple of files that I need: UploadedFilesConatiner user control, Demo.js file etc.

Can you please post these and other required file?

P.S. I am using VB.net and I do not have any demos installed.

Thanks,
Sankalp

Subject: ASPxFileManager - How to allow single file upload
Text:
Hi,

I have created a user control using the file upload and submit function given in File Manager and File Upload - Upload Control. I use it at many forms in my application. But at one place I want this control to allow only a single file to be uploaded from it. For this I used EnableMultiSelect property and it allows selection of one file only but I can choose a single file multiple times and that leads to multiple files again. What can be done to prevent this? I am looking for something like if EnableMultiSelect is false the repeated file selection replaces the previous selected file.

Regards
Pradeep

Subject: ASPxFileManager - How to allow single file upload based on the Upload And Submit Demo
Text:
Hi,

I have created a user control using the file upload and submit function given in File Manager and File Upload - Upload Control. I use it at many forms in my application. But at one place I want this control to allow only a single file to be uploaded from it. For this I used EnableMultiSelect property and it allows selection of one file only but I can choose a single file multiple times and that leads to multiple files again. What can be done to prevent this? I am looking for something like if EnableMultiSelect is false the repeated file selection replaces the previous selected file.

Regards
Pradeep

Subject: ASPxFileManager - How to allow single file upload in the Upload And Submit Demo
Text:
Hi,

I have created a user control using the file upload and submit function given in File Manager and File Upload - Upload Control. I use it at many forms in my application. But at one place I want this control to allow only a single file to be uploaded from it. For this I used EnableMultiSelect property and it allows selection of one file only but I can choose a single file multiple times and that leads to multiple files again. What can be done to prevent this? I am looking for something like if EnableMultiSelect is false the repeated file selection replaces the previous selected file.

Regards
Pradeep

Subject: ASPxFileManager - How to hide/show files/folders using access rules
Text:
Hi,
I am using Filemanager with a custom file system provider inherited from DataSourcefFleSystemProvider. Everything seems to work fine except when i try to hide a subfolder with accessrules : I have a Folder2 included in a Folder1 included in the root. I want to hide Folder2 and its content. Could you show me how to define necessary folder or/and file access rules ?

Thanks

Subject: ASPxFileManager - How to select a folder based on a selected row in ASPxGridView
Text: I have a combo box that is bound to a ASPxGridView and when I select a name from the combo, it populates  the ASPxGridView.  I  have a root folder with name folders in a ASPxFileManager and I am trying to display the files in the persons folder when a grid row is selected.  I'm retrieving the correct information when the row is selected, but I can't seem to get the ASPxFileManager to programmatically select a folder on the tree to display the files within.

Subject: ASPxFilterControl - Make it possible to create and edit any valid criteria operator
Text:
EDITED (by Dennis):

1. It should be possible to select collection properties and complex reference paths (check S35190 for a temporary solution for XAF Web apps);
2. It should be possible to write any valid criteria operator, including custom functions. The Text type allowing manual input is good for this.
Refer to the attached WinForms screenshot for more details on what it could look like in the UI.

2. It should be possible to create and edit any valid criteria operator, including custom functions and free joins. A separate Text tab allowing manual input is good for this. Refer to the attached WinForms screenshot for more details on what it could look like in the UI.
Check out the T161022 and Q357251 tickets for temporary solution in XAF Web apps.

See Also:

ASPxFilterControl - Add the Text tab to allow creating any criteria
ASPxFilterControl - allow construct rules [Column1] [operation] [Column2] and Date constants like WinForms

Subject: ASPxFilterControl - XSS vulnerability - Filter Expression is rendered without html encoding
Text:
1. FilterControl text tab error text doesn't encode.
Require:
    - enable FilterControl TextTab (SettingsFilterControl.ViewMode = "VisualAndText")
Controls: ASPxFilterControl, ASPxGridView, ASPxCardView, ASPxVerticalGrid.
Version: 15.2+

2. Grid/PivotGrid FilterBuilder - filterExpression display string encoded partially:

2.1. Set "bad" filterExpression with XSS on the server side.
Require:
    - show FilterBuilder (Settings.ShowFilterBar="Visible/Auto")
Controls: ASPxGridView, ASPxCardView, ASPxVerticalGrid, ASPxPivotGrid.
Version: 8.1+

2.2. Set XSS filterExpression on the client side through text tab.
Require:
    - show FilterBuilder (Settings.ShowFilterBar="Visible/Auto")
    - enable FilterControl TextTab (SettingsFilterControl.ViewMode = "VisualAndText")
    - enable SettingsFilterControl.ShowAllDataSourceColumns property
    - has IList/IEnumerable field in grid dataSource
Controls: ASPxGridView, ASPxCardView, ASPxVerticalGrid
Version: 15.2+

Dear DevExpress Support,

I am currently evaluating a trial version of DevExpress 18.x for the creation of a new ASP.NET based application.
I am rather new to Webdevelopment and am not so familiar with all these concepts in contrast to the Windows Forms application development. .

I now try to create a multi tabbed layout that contains 3 ASPxFormLayout controls that hold my controls that I want to populate.

I've laid out the layouot like I want it to be in the designer (see Attachment 1).

However when the application runs, the controls are much to short and look rather ugly.
I want them to span the available space within the defined ColSpan . See Attachment 2.

I searched for a property which would allow me to to do this and stumpled over GridSettings.StretchLastItem, which neatly strechted the controls like I want them to. However, my layout is not honored anymore now, and I only have one control per line... .

How can I achieve my goal? Which property/setting am I missing?
Kindly be as descriptive as possible when describing its location as I am not very familiar with all controls and their properties yet.


Thank you!

With BR
Markus

Subject: ASPxGridView - 3 Tier Architecture + Disconnected DataSet
Text:
Dear Team,

We are currently validating Devexpress ASP.Net web controls for our new project, we have been facing couple of important issues, which are mandatory to follow in our new project standards. following are the list of issues, which we can describe for now.

1.  Our new web project should be 3 tier architecture 
2. we have observed during our test with GridView, all the functionalities like (Ex: Search, paging, edit, delete Etc...)  works fine with SQL Data Source control. whereas we are not in condition to adopt SQL data source control in our project. Can same operations be achieved with disconnected dataset (for multi user environment). if yes, can you please help us by providing related links for reference.

we are extremely happy with Devexpress ASP.Net controls, but above said limitations are stopping to adopt devexpress technology.

Thanks in advance for your quick response

Regards,
Ram

Subject: ASPxGridView - Batch Edit - It is not possible to use the space key in an editor inside the Footer
Text:
To reproduce the issue, do the following:
1) Enable Batch Edit in ASPxGridView.
2) Add an editor (ASPxTextBox) to the Footer template.
3) Try to use the space key in this editor.

The client-side OnMainTableKeyDown function prevents the default space behavior and causes this problem.

Subject: ASPxGridView - Batch Edit - It is not possible to use the space key in an editor inside the Footer
Text:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Enable Batch Edit in ASPxGridView.
2) Add an editor (ASPxTextBox) to the Footer template.
3) Try to use space in this editor.

The client-side OnMainTableKeyDown function prevents default space behavior  and causes this problem.

Subject: ASPxGridView - Grid disapprears when the server-side IsRowSelected method is called with the index of a selected row after upgrade to 14.1.3
Text:
We utilize check boxes on our AspxGridViews throughout our project.  The user checks a few boxes and pushes a button and then we process only the checked or selected rows.  After upgrading to 14.1.3, the IsRowSelected on server code always returns false, whether a row is selected or not.  This has broken our project in many places and is a show stopper.  Unless you can fix us quick, we will have to return to 13.1.8 where they all work fine.

One case where it works is if we use the new ShowSelectButton="true" property and use it to select all rows, then IsRowSelected returns true as it should.

I have attached a video demonstrating the bug and will also attach the asp.net page code.

Subject: ASPxGridView - Header Filter - How to show images instead items
ASPxGridView - HeaderFilter doesn't filter blank items if HeaderFilterMode is "CheckedList"
Text:
Hi,

I am using an aspxgridview with a header filter using checkboxes.
One of the columns called status (nvarchar) contains different string values, including an empty string.

when trying the filtering on this column using checkboxes, we can see and select the empty string, but it is not applied in the filter and automatically gets unchecked again.
This gives very strange behaviour because when the end user clicks '(select all)' it does in fact not contain the empty string values!
I tried this first in 2.12 and upgraded to the latest version to make sure it wasn't an old bug but the problem remained.

I saw that the generated 'is any of' filter did indeed not contain an empty string. When I tried to add an empty string to the filter using the filter editor I did not find a way to do so.

Is it by design that empty strings cannot be filtered like this (in that case it's still giving unexpected results with i.e. '(select all)')? Or is this a bug?

Subject: ASPxGridView - How to skip disabled editors while navigating cells in Batch Edit mode
Text:
Hi,

  As for another ticket, we are working on navigation in a MVC Gridview in Batch Edit mode.  The problem we are currently having is with editors that are disabled in the grid.  We sometimes disable some editors when some criterias are met (for example, there is no need to select a choice in a combobox for this particular item/row).  When navigating with the "tab" and "enter" keys, when the focus is put on one cell that has a disabled editor, the "enter" key does not follow to the next cell.  The "tab" key does.  We tried to handle the "OnFocus" event of the editor to foward the focus on the next cell but since it is disabled, it does not seem to fire.

  We have attached a sample project in which we have disabled a column.  If you navigate to it using the "tab" key and continue, you will see that the focus is sent to the next column, but not with the "Enter" key.  

  Thank you for your help !

  Regards,

Subject: ASPxGridView - It is impossible to localize NextPageButton/PrevPageButton in PlasticBlue theme
Text:
We got a problem localizing text in the pager section of the ASPxGridView (we use Plastic Blue theme, that shows text for the page switcher):
a) By using satellite assemblies, page counter and group panel text are set correctly, but not previous/next page text.
b) Setting a text manually for the NextPageButton and PreviousPageButton enables translation via the language ressource files, but this text is ignored by the grid for any language. This worked in version 11.2.

We attached a sample project that includes image buttons to change language and two ASPxGridViews. For the first, the SettingsPager is empty. It shows that the satellite assemblies provide correct translations for all other text and that the resource files switch the column captions.
For the grid below, german text including '<<' and '>>' is defined for PreviousPageButton/NextPageButton, but this is ignored.

So the question is: how to tanslate 'next' and 'prev' correctly?

Thanks for you help!

Subject: ASPxGridView - Manually handling the batch update while in BatchEdit Mode...
Text:
I have an ASPxGridView bound to a non updateable source (a LinqDataSource which points to a SQL View). I have set a DataItemTemplate for one column in the ASPxGridView to be an ASPxTextBox. This allows the user to quickly put in quantities in the grid without having callbacks and wait time for each row they modify. I want the user to be able to make changes to these TextBoxes on multiple rows within the grid and then click the Save Changes or a separate button to initiate the BatchEdit update. From there, I would need to obviously handle the update myself since you can't update a view.

I was thinking that if I could mark the rows that change dirty on the client side as the user makes changes to the ASPxTextBox and then grab those lines at the time of saving the batch, I could handle updating the appropriate data myself.

What would be the easiest way to handle this?

Thanks for the help in advance!

Bryan

Subject: ASPxGridView - SettingsPager.Summary.Text is not applied to the grid if PageSizeItemSettings "All" is selected
Text:
Hi,

I have implemented following code to set Itemcount on pager:

int itemCount = (int)grid.GetTotalSummaryValue(grid.TotalSummary["ID"]);
        grid.SettingsPager.Summary.Text = "Page {0} of {1} (" + itemCount.ToString() + " items)";
When i perform group by on rows, it is showing correct item count i.e. total number of rows in grid irrespective of collapsed and expanded group headers when page size is set to 10 or 50.

But when page size is selected as "All " then the item count only shows the number of visible rows in the grid, i.e. if a group header is collapsed it counts it as one row no matter how many row are under that group.

i want to get total number of rows present in grid in case of page size 'All' as i am getting in case of page size as 10 or 50.
Please provide some solution for the issue.

Regards
varun chauhan

Subject: ASPxGridView - Slow web page performance with large database
Text:
Hi,

I have a web page with several devexpress controls (chart and gridviews) that are connected to database via SqlDataSource, the database has a 2M rows and growing quite fast. The controls need agregated fields (groupby) and since there are 6 in the page it takes some time to render.
In order to reduce this time I have create a data class that make just one connection to de database and fill all the controls, this class is keeped in a session variable to minimize database connections.

QUESTION:
I wonder if devexpress has already solved this problem: that is if there is a way to just make one call to the database obtain an snapshot of the data (ie. filter by two dates) so that snapshot can be consumed by differente controls (ie. one control will need to make a groupby over a certain field and other will need to filter the data by other field)?, can it also make this data persistent in the page so only when the filter dates changes it will be needed to call de data base again?

Thanks,

Jaime

Subject: ASPxGridView - Tag Helper - Actual meaning of Allow Edit, Update and Delete options
Text:

Subject: ASPxGridView - Unable to find how obtain values of the selected rows

It's taken me over an hour on line to work out how to get the following code to return cell values from a selected row, and I found it not on DevExpress but on StackOverflow.

Many of the links on your support site don't work or the information isn't valuable as it refers to much older versions of the components..  I'm migrating our code from Telerik to DevExpress but this doesn't really help.  :)

I'm sure I'm not the only programmer who prefers to process server-side for security etc. and not use JavaScript on client-side.  The documentation seems to focus primarily on client side.  I can understand the client-side trend, but it's not for me.

Sorry, I'm just frustrated at the lost time. :)

Barry

Subject: ASPxGridView disappears when the server-side IsRowSelected method is called after upgrade to 14.1.3
Text:
We utilize check boxes on our AspxGridViews throughout our project.  The user checks a few boxes and pushes a button and then we process only the checked or selected rows.  After upgrading to 14.1.3, the IsRowSelected on server code always returns false, whether a row is selected or not.  This has broken our project in many places and is a show stopper.  Unless you can fix us quick, we will have to return to 13.1.8 where they all work fine.

One case where it works is if we use the new ShowSelectButton="true" property and use it to select all rows, then IsRowSelected returns true as it should.

I have attached a video demonstrating the bug and will also attach the asp.net page code.

Subject: ASPxGridView disapprears when the server-side IsRowSelected method is called after upgrade to 14.1.3
Text:
We utilize check boxes on our AspxGridViews throughout our project.  The user checks a few boxes and pushes a button and then we process only the checked or selected rows.  After upgrading to 14.1.3, the IsRowSelected on server code always returns false, whether a row is selected or not.  This has broken our project in many places and is a show stopper.  Unless you can fix us quick, we will have to return to 13.1.8 where they all work fine.

One case where it works is if we use the new ShowSelectButton="true" property and use it to select all rows, then IsRowSelected returns true as it should.

I have attached a video demonstrating the bug and will also attach the asp.net page code.

Subject: ASPxGridView width is too narrow if the control is initially located on an inactive ASPxPageControl tab
Text:
I'm using an AspxGridView that needs to have both horizontal and vertical scrollbars. This grid is contained in an UpdatePanel. The data source of the grid is set at Page_PreRender, but it still doesn't work even if it is set at Page_Load. The number of rows depends on the value of the textbox underneath the grid. This textbox causes a partial postback. Note that any partial postback generates the issue, even switching tabs.
How to reproduce the issue: Click inside the textbox and press Enter. The grid will disappear and turn grey. After analyzing with Firebug I noticed that the width of the rows is not calculated.

I attached a sample project (one of DevExpress' demo projects modified). The issue can be seen on page VerticalScrollbarIssue.

Subject: ASPxHtmlEditor - A selected placeholder is still selected if some text from a webpage is dropped to the editor's content
Text: When using the Html Editor in design view, if a placeholder in the content is highlighted and I drag and drop an object from an external source (like text from another web page), the object is inserted at the correct position but the current selection is not updated and the placeholder remains selected. This is causing problems for me because I am using some custom drag drop functionality and if a placeholder is selected, this causes the placeholder to be replaced rather than the object being inserted correctly. You can see this behavior in your HtmlEditor placeholder demo.

Subject: ASPxHtmlEditor - Add the client-side events for the embedded ASPxFileManger
Text:
Hi

Is it possible to execute client side scripts on the Filemanager displayed within the HTMLEditor?

For example in a standalone fileexplorer I have the following:

<ClientSideEventsItemMoving="moveitem"ItemRenaming="renameitem"FileUploading="uploadStarted"ErrorOccurred="OnErrorOccurred"FileUploaded="function(s, e) {alert("file uploaded!");}"/>


But I cannot see how I would enable these within an HTML Editor when uploading images using the fileexplorer?

For example if the open the filemanager in the HTML editor and select to rename a file, I want to display a message along the lines of

"Renaming this file will prevent it from displaying on other documents using this image, continue?" as below which works ok on a standalone fileexplorer

function renameitem(s, e) {

if (confirm("Renaming may make the file/folder unavailable for content previously loaded. Are you sure you want to rename?")) {

HiddenOverWrite.Set("rename", true);

return

}

e.cancel = true;

HiddenOverWrite.Set("rename", false);

}


thanks
Tommy

Open http://demos.devexpress.com/ASPxHTMLEditorDemos/Features/General.aspx in IE8

JavaScript error is thrown (not investigated) and list is NOT pasted into the htmleditor control.

Thanks for your help.

Subject: ASPxHtmlEditor - Selected table loses focus in IE11 one second after clicking the border
Text:
Good day,

We use a button to insert templates into the ASPxHtmlEditor that include basic html tables. When you try to select the table as an object by clicking on the border, it loses the selection and causes javascript errors.

I managed to reproduce the errors on the demo page by pasting the following html into the html part of the editor, then switching to the design view and clicking on the tables border:
<table style="border: 3px solid #000"><tr><td> </td></tr></table>Kind regards,
Johan Brits

Subject: ASPxHTMLEditor - The <u> element is not shown when the Underline command is invoked
Text:
When I in HTML Editor change a text to bold, it puts <strong> around it. Italic puts <em>. But underling puts <span style="text-decoration:underline">.

Unfortunately, my reports in MS Reporting Services , with a textbox there with the setting so that it interprets html tags,  don't understand this text-decoration. But they do understand <u>.

How can I solve my problem? And why the difference between bold/italic and underline>?

Subject: ASPxHtmlEditor - The cursor works unexpectedly in IE browser after a test is pasted from MS Word via the Paste button
Text:
On IE, the Copy paste function works correctly when using the Hot Keys

However, when I use the right click and then paste in the HTML editor, the cursor seems to go to the beginning of the text I entered.

This is for all the text that has been copied from any of the Microsoft Office Suite. Is there a function to enable the cursor to stop going to the start of the paragraph and actually set a line break and allow it to start a new paragraph?

Subject: ASPxHtmlEditor - The ReplacePlaceholders method truncates a string that is formatted using "c" Format specifier
Text:
In the attached code, in the LoadPlaceholdersForEmail() method, I build an HTML table by looping thru the selected checks in the checks grid.  The table should have the headings Check Number & Check Amount, followed by the list of check numbers and amounts from the checks grid. 

I have noticed that at times the Check amount is getting truncated.  I have tried a few different formatting techniques to try to address this problem, but have not figured out how to consistently get the full value of the placeholder item to appear.  When I run it thru the debugger, the pfeTableOfChecks appears correct  before it is sent into the following code as a dictionary item of PlaceholdersForEmail:

emailBody = ASPxHtmlEditor.ReplacePlaceholders(emailBody, PlaceholdersForEmail);

Would you take a look at the logic I have and see why the check amount is at times getting truncated?  How can I prevent this from happening? 

Thank you!!

Linda Kampa

I have noticed that at times the Check amount is getting truncated.  I have tried a few different formatting techniques to try to address this problem, but have not figured out how to consistently get the full value of the placeholder item to appear.  When I run it thru the debugger, the pfeTableOfChecks appears correct  before it is sent into the following code as a dictionary item of PlaceholdersForEmail:

emailBody = ASPxHtmlEditor.ReplacePlaceholders(emailBody, PlaceholdersForEmail);

Thank you!!

Linda Kampa

Subject: ASPxHtmlEditor - Using a key combination [Ctrl + A] (select all) on an empty editor selects certain toolbar buttons
Text:
Good day,

I've noticed that the editor sometimes unselects the font name and size and selects all the font style buttons (bold, italic, underline and strikethrough) when you select all in an empty editor using the keyboard [Ctrl + A]. I managed to reproduce this on the demo page but I had to "select all" twice on the empty editor.

This also happens if the client side command is called in JavaScript, and the EnterMode property is set to "Default":

ASPxHtmlEditor.ExecuteCommand('formatblock', 'div');Kind regards,
Johan Brits

Subject: ASPxImage - cannot show picture from webshare
Text:
Hello!

I have a aspxImage control which loads the imageURL from a database:

<dx:ASPxImage ID="imgCover" runat="server" Height="180px" Width="150px" ImageUrl='<%# Eval("ImageUrl") %>'/>The value for the webshare is like: \\myserver\Pictures\photo1.jpg

After publishing on the IIS webserver this works fine if the user has read permissions on the webshare. If not the picture is not shown.
The Application Pool at IIS is running with "ApplicationPoolIdentity" which has full access permissions on the share.

Can you please advise?

Thank you very much!
Richard

Subject: ASPxImage - How to load SVG images

My old code was:

ImageUrl="~/img/auflag01.svg"  

My svg file is in img directory.

1. How will I use svg images in ASPxImage?

2. How will I use WebChartControl as svg?

Regards.

Any advice or an example would be helpful.

When a user clicks on an image, I don't want it to go into Full Screen mode, I just want the image displayed in a popup (with a template would be nice), then when they click outside the image, it goes back to where it was. A header could be optional, but it doesn't need it.

Subject: ASPxImageGallery - The "_aspxIGIL is null or not defined" error occurs when placing image gallery into the grid's DataItemTemplate
Text:
Hi, i'm working on a ImageGallery control inside an aspxgridview's dataitemtemplate to show the top 3 images related to a record.
I have bound the grid programmatically by using the grid's DataBinding event; the ImageGallery control is populated at runtime (by the Init event).

This implementation works fine on Chrome and Firefox but on IE11 (and even previous versions) I'm facing this JS runtime error:

("_aspxIGIL" is null or not defined)
Errore di run-time di JavaScript: Il valore della proprieta` '_aspxIGIL' e` nullo o non definito, non e` un oggetto funzione

function onload(){_aspxIGIL(this,"ctl00_ctl00_ASPxSplitter1_Content_ContentSplitter_MainContent_pnMain_grResults_cell2_4_pnDescription_imgGal",1,1,0,2,1,1,"")}
How can I solve this issue?

Thank's in advance.
Regards

Subject: ASPxImageSlider operates incorrectly in Compatibility mode
Text:
We have been experiencing calls from a number of users that the image slider does not work and it appears to be down to their version of IE.

I have added to the .aspx file the following in the header

<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=10" />

and in the .aspx.vb

Protected Sub Page_PreInit(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs)
DevExpress.Web.ASPxClasses.ASPxWebControl.SetIECompatibilityMode(10)
End Sub

and this has fixed the problem for IE10 users, how can I fix it so that it works for 7,8,9 and 10?

Thanks

How do you reference controls on a tab in the client with JavaScript? Just specifying ClientInstanceName doesn’t work, even though I can reference some controls this way.

Subject: ASPxPopupControl isn't displayed in certain cases
ASPxPopupControl isn't displayed on an attempt to catch an exception in certain cases
ASPxPopupControl size grows in Visual Studio Deisgner if the internal ASPxButton's Text property contains a string with spaces
Text:
Hello DevExpress,

Since few updates, an annoying bug appears on Visual Studio Design when an aspxButton is in an aspxpopupControl.

For each spaces in the aspxbutton's text, it adds a new line at the end of the PopupControl. Here a screenshot :
http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/17/1398189821-prtscr.jpg

The final rendering is correct in the browser. Like I said, It's only in VS design

Temporary solution :
Replacing space by "&nbsp" or changing the wrap option of the button to True or False instead of Default can resolve this or ignoring it ..

You can also look at the attached sample project.

Thank you,

Luc

Subject: ASPxProgressBar - How to display progress information about server-side processing
Text:
Hello,

I was looking for a recent example of an ASPxProgressBar used to monitor a long-running server-side process.  I set the EnableSessionStatet to ReadOnly, per item https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Example/Details/E918, but that seems to be contradicted in T119544  .  I could not get E198 to compile on my machine either.  Both of the code sets in E918 seem to point to DX version 8.2.3.  

I tried to piece together a solution myself, using the JSProperties, but it does not seem to be working.

The requirement is to update the client-side ASPxProgressBar position every few seconds while a long process is running on the server.

Could you please take a look and let me know where I went wrong?  This seems to be something that has generated more than a few questions in the past,  Sample code attached.

Regards,

-Jay

Subject: ASPxRichEdit - The width of the document is changed after it is exported to PDF
Text:
Hi,

Please refer to the attached project (start page OrderEditor/Order.aspx).

Note how the footer spans across two lines in the order editor. However, if the same document is exported to PDF, the footer is now three lines. Is this a bug? I want to make sure that the output PDF perfectly matches how the editor renders the document.

Also, what is the right way to calculate available editable width of a document? This is the logic that I use:
// calculate available width m_pageWidth = m_document.Sections.First().Page.Width - (m_document.Sections.First().Margins.Left + m_document.Sections.First().Margins.Right); Calculated width is 6.26875, but I believe it should be 8.5 - (1 + 1) = 6.5.    (8.5 is the paper width, left and right margins are set to 1). Why is the Width property returning 8.26875 rather than 8.5?

There are several instances where I need to create a table that centers text on a page, so the way I do it is to set the table width to whatever is available width of the document and then center the text inside a table cell. Is this the right way to do it?

Thanks,
Daniel

Subject: ASPxScheduler - How to save the Resource Text in the Subject field when creating a new Appoinment
Text:
Hello,

I am using the code below to automatically populate the Subject line with the selected Resource and the user name when a new Appointment is saved. However, I would like to accomplish two things:

1. Instead of saving the ResouceId in the Subject line, I would like to actually save the actual Resource Text of the selected Resource instead of the id (see attached example)
2. How can I make a Resource selection required before a new Appointment can be saved?

Thank you.

Protected Sub ASPxScheduler1_AppointmentInserting(sender As Object, e As DevExpress.XtraScheduler.PersistentObjectCancelEventArgs) Handles ASPxScheduler1.AppointmentInserting Dim apt As Appointment = CType(e.Object, Appointment) apt.Subject = Session.Item("UserName") & " " & apt.ResourceId.ToString() End Sub

Subject: ASPxSpinEdit  - "number.toFixed is not a function" JavaScript error if a string was passed in the SetValue method
ASPxSpinEdit  - "number.toFixed is not a function" JavaScript error if a string was passed in the SetValue method
Text:
We have an issue with RoundNumber function as it produces javascript error on button click:

TypeError: number.toFixed is not a function
http://localhost:44004/DXR.axd?r=1_145,1_81,1_137,1_99,1_106,1_98,1_130,1_78,1_128,1_101,1_105,1_126,1_84,1_92,1_135,1_121,1_129,1_80,1_95,1_91,1_114,1_104,1_79,1_120-KIIp9
Line 30424

RoundNumber: function(number) {
  if(this.decimalPlaces <= 0 || number == null)
   return number;
  return parseFloat(number.toFixed(this.decimalPlaces));
 },

which should be like this:

RoundNumber: function(number) {
  if(this.decimalPlaces <= 0 || number == null)
   return number;
  return parseFloat(number).toFixed(this.decimalPlaces);
 },

Please provide a hotfix ASAP.

Subject: ASPxTreeList - PopupEditForm - The popup disappears between callback requests?
Text:
Hi DevEx Support

Your demo code for ASPxTreeList > Editing > Validation refers (https://demos.devexpress.com/ASPxTreeListDemos/Editing/Validation.aspx)

Using your sample code, I made one small change: I changed the mode of the editor from "EditFormAndDisplayNode" to "PopupEditForm"

<SettingsEditing Mode="EditFormAndDisplayNode" />
<SettingsEditing Mode="PopupEditForm" />

When validation returns an error condition (i.e. after applying changes), there is a moment that the popup disappears before it becomes visible again to show the error. This causes a flashing effect which is not present in the "EditFormAndDisplayNode" mode.

Although it is quite brief in your sample code, in my project the database is quite large and the popup disappears for more than a second or two, which is a bit irritating for the user. Is there any way to force the popup editor to remain in view during validation? Or show Loading message? We really prefer to use the popup editor and not the standard edit form.

Thanks for looking into this
Regards
Conrad

Subject: ASPxTreeList does not populate the Summary attribute for its data table and therefore is not compliant with WCAG 1.0-5.5
Text:
ASPxTreeList should populate the Summary attribute in the rendered datatable when the SummaryText property is populated.

According to the documentation: "The SummaryText property specifies the text, placed in the table tag, which will be picked up by browser-readers."



To reproduce, create a tree list. Set AccessibilityCompliant="true" SummaryText="This is a test summary"

Run the application, and inspect the rendered HTML. Notice that there is no summary attribute for the datatable. This violates WCAG 1.0 - 5.5 Provide Summaries for Tables.

Thanks!

Subject: ASPxWebDocumentViewer - Images are automatically converted to Jpeg when a report is printed
Text:
When using the print button in the ASPxWebDocumentViewer control, the PDF Export Options Convert Images to Jpeg property value is ignore and is always set to True.

You can verify this by creating a report with an XRChart and set the PDF Export Options Convert Images to Jpeg property to false.

Print the report using the print button in the ASPxWebDocumentViewer  control.

Export the report to PDF using the export button in the ASPxWebDocumentViewer  control and print the PDF from Adobe (or whatever PDF application you have).

You'll notice that the chart image quality of the PDF export is much better than the print out from the document viewer control.

You'll also notice that the chart text is selectable in the PDF export and that it isn't selectable in the print PDF.

Subject: ASPxWebDocumentViewer ignores PDF Export Options Convert Images to Jpeg property value when printing
Text:
When using the print button in the ASPxWebDocumentViewer control, the PDF Export Options Convert Images to Jpeg property value is ignore and is always set to True.

You can verify this by creating a report with an XRChart and set the PDF Export Options Convert Images to Jpeg property to false.

Print the report using the print button in the ASPxWebDocumentViewer  control.

Export the report to PDF using the export button in the ASPxWebDocumentViewer  control and print the PDF from Adobe (or whatever PDF application you have).

You'll notice that the chart image quality of the PDF export is much better than the print out from the document viewer control.

You'll also notice that the chart text is selectable in the PDF export and that it isn't selectable in the print PDF.

Subject: Audit Trail query - How to show captions instead of property names
Text:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
select a.oid as Oid,ot.TypeName, a.PropertyName, a.Operationtype, a.OldValue, a.NewValue,a.UserName, a.ModifiedOnfrom AuditDataItemPersistent ajoin AuditedObjectWeakReference aw on a.AuditedObject = aw.Oidjoin XPWeakReference w on aw.Oid = w.Oidjoin XPObjectType ot on ot.Oid = w.TargetType

Subject: Blue theme - Labels change their fore color from black to blue under certain circumstances
Text:
Hi,

I've found a bug in the Blue theme after upgrading to the latest DX version: When the actions 'New' or 'SaveAndNew' opens a new object in the same view, the labels in the view become blue (instead of black).

You can reproduce this using the attached project by doing the following:

1. Open a Person
2. Create a new Role from the nested 'Roles' listview
3. In the opened Role detailview Click on 'New' or 'Save and New' (it doesn't matter if you save the current Role or not)
4. Now you see that the labels in the Role detailview where changed from black to blue

Subject: Can't write arbitrary values in Filters Tab when PopupExcelFilterNumericValuesTabFilterType = List
Text:
Hello

When the gridview has a numeric column which is configured with PopupExcelFilterNumericValuesTabFilterType = List , if I select the 2nd tab (Numeric Filters) I can't write an arbitrary value.

Example if the grid has rows with values (2,4,6,10) I can't select a filter "Greater" than 5 (the value must be in the list). I think this behavior is correct for the first tab (the checked list) but you should not enforce on the 2nd tab.

This is working when the PopupExcelFilterNumericValuesTabFilterType = Range

Changing Portrait Page Setting to Landscape
Text:
Dear Support Team,

We are facing problem while printing document which has got Page Width is greater than Page Height. More over we are facing this problem only for Cannon Laser Shot LBP2900 series printers.

For our report document, we had set Paper Kind as Custom, Page Width as 827, Page Height as 585 and Landscape = False.

As i said above in all type of printer it is printing as expected except above printer. in this printer it is printing in landscape with somewhere on the corner of the paper.

After spending lot of time we found that this series printer doesn't support paper type which has got more width than height. if paper size has set more width than height in Xtra Reports printer is automatically changing to landscape mode.

But with reports created with other vendor application it is printing properly on the same printer. even with MS-Word it is printing properly.


we are facing problem only with Xtra Reports.


Please provide a solution to over come this.

Thanks

Sujan.

Subject: Chart bound to ObservableCollection does not update when collection members are updated
Text:
Hi,

I have a DXGrid and DXChart in different DockPanels in a DockLayoutManager. I am using MVVM and the Grid and chart are bound to the same Observable Collection in my view model.

When I initialize and load items into the ObservableCollection the grid and chart both update accordingly and display the data.

When I edit data in the grid, however, the chart is not updated. The Grid binding is set to TwoWay and data is definately changing becuase I am able to save changes to my back end database.

If I call

chart.UpdateData();


then the data in the Chart is refreshed and shows correctly, but it appears the binding is not working as expected. Its like the chart binding is always stuck in OneTime mode.

Based on this answer this appears by design ?
http://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/Q289189

Has any option been added to allow this to be user configurable ? I appreciate its resource intensive - but I don't have many data points so the performance penalty in my case would be acceptable.

Thanks
Chris

Subject: Code Issues - Members decorated with certain attributes should not be considered as unused
Text:
Hello,

Code Issues detects the following method as an "unused member".

[ContractInvariantMethod] private void ObjectInvariant() { Contract.Invariant(_dic != null); }ContractInvariantMethodAttribute belongs to the System.Diagnostics.Contracts namespace as part of Code Contracts architecture which does different types of assertions for debugging purposes.

Although it does look like it isn't used, Code Contracts will end up changing the compiled code so that this method automatically gets called after each member / function access. Therefore CodeRush is wrong: the member is NOT unused.

Same thing for AssemblyInitializeAttribute and AssemblyCleanUpAttribute in Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting. This indicates that the method must be called at specific events in Visual Studio Unit Testing framework. Therefore these methods are not unused either.

Please make Code Issues aware of these attributes. Thanks.

The initial color is set to RGB 201, 145, 103. When you click on the popup and select "More Colors" to show the color picker, the color space it shows is incorrect. It should be higher into the red part of the spectrum. You can see this by clicking right on the location where it puts the selector by default. The green value will jump to 174 or so, indicating that it's not showing the appropriate color space.

Is there something we're doing wrong? Is there any way to fix this?

Thanks

Subject: Command buttons - Provide the capability to raise the Click event when a user moves finger across a button
Text:
Hi,

I've noticed when testing my app on an iPad or iPhone that all dxButtons and dxTileView tiles when touched, if you slightly move your finger across the button (but are still over it) it doesn't register it as a click but shows the button or tile highlight/depress so it gives the impression it will click. Doing the same thing on a native app, if you're touching a button, no matter if you move your finger slightly across it, as long as you are on it still it will register the click.

Note - this is more prominent using the dxTileView - if you slightly move your finger over the tile when pressing, the tile depresses but the click doesn't register.

This behaviour can make for annoying user experience!

Thanks

Subject: Components 15.1.8 install failed when VS 2008 is running
Text:
Hello,

An upgrade to 15.1.8 finished with 'failed'. I reviewed the install log and found:

cannot access the file 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\DevExpress\DXMenu\DevExpress.ProjectUpgrade.Package.dll' because it is being used by another process

The Resource Monitor identified the culprit as a running instance of Visual Studio 2008 which I had neglected to close. If I remember correctly, install normally warns if there are running instances of VS2012 (and perhaps others) but it said nothing about 2008. It would be nice if this issue was reported before installation begins.

Thank you,
Mark

Subject: ConditionalAppearance - How to create appearance rules based on complex criteria, for instance, a singleton/configuration class not depending on the current View object
Content copied from an MS Excel document is not pasted into a Spreadsheet document in German locale (Z1S1 reference style)
Text:
Hello!

I cannot copy a single cell or a range of cells from Excel 2010 by copy+paste onto a xtraSpreadSheet. I works the other way (from xtra to Excel2010) and I am able to copy a single cell content from Excel to xtraSpreadSheet (by pressing F2 in the target cell on the xtra side). Also it is possible to copy+paste a range of cells from one location to another within xtraSpreadSheet.

After selecting a range of cells on the Excel side I hit copy and then I change to xtraSpreadSheet. When I hit the paste button (in Home ribbon menu) nothing happens. I can hit Paste Special and then I see a dialog with the following entries:

Microsoft Excel 8.0 Format
Comma delimited (Csv)
Unformatted Text (Tab delimited text)
<empty line>
<empty line>

Note that the last two lines have no title but they appear to have a function, but I don't known which. Seems to be a bug.

The "Microsoft Excel 8.0 Format" (the default?) entry does nothing.
Both "Comma delimited (Csv)" and "Unformatted Text (Tab delimited text)" work, but without formatting information etc.

Subject: Creating a custom table with the USER_TABLES name causes Data Source Wizard crash
Text:
I encountered an issue while trying to run the query builder in the dashboard suite. It would crash during initialization when using it with some of our Oracle databases. With others it would work fine.
It took me quite a while to get to the root of the problem but I evetually figured out that this was caused by some of our views and tables having the same name. In our case these were uninted relicts within our database that could easily be cleaned up.
What bothered me though was the full on crash it caused in our application plus the lack of information on the cause. Therefore I would like to suggest you add some error handling to prevent a crash and a more conclusive error message to your code. I have attached a screenshot of the message box I got after the crash which shows the stack trace.

Subject: Creating Charts in a console application
Text:
Hello,

I'm looking for a way to create many charts.
Specifically, I'll be creating a POCO collection in a .net console app. Then, for each object in that collection, I need to create a chart and save that chart as a raster image. I've attached a sample of what one of these charts will look like. They'll all be the same chart, just different data, and this console app will need to output over 3000 distinct charts in a single run.
I see ways to create single charts using WPF or MVC controls, and they look very good, but I'm hoping there's a good way mass produce them in a console application.

Thanks,
Aaron

Subject: CriteriaPropertyEditor - Support string properties that specify the objects' type
Text:
Hello,

I had the requirement to add a property which uses the CriteriaPropertyEditor to a class which I cannot change (in this case it's the DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportData). So I have overriden DevExpress.ExpressApp.Controller.CustomizeTypesInfo to add a MemberInfo to the ReportData class.

But then I realized that it is not possible to use the CriteriaOptionsAttribute to specify the property which provides the type the CriteriaPropertyEditor is using, because the ReportData class only has a string property which contains the full name of the report data type.

So I had to implement my own CriteriaPropertyEditor, CriteriaPropertyEditorHelper and CriteriaOptionsAttribute to fulfill this task.

So my question: can you please extend the GetCriteriaObjectType method of the DevExpress.ExpressApp.Editors.CriteriaPropertyEditorHelper class so one can specify a string property which returns the full name of the type the CriteriaPropertyEditor should use?

Olaf

John W.

Subject: Customization Form - It is impossible to drag fields to the row area in certain cases

I did a simple example to show our customers problem. You need restore Database file and Cube file in MSAS to run my example ( see attached files)

FIRST SITUATION:

1) Open my example
2) All fields are in Filter Area... so move 3 fields to Row Area
3) Now try to move the fourth field in the middle of 2 fields : It´s IMPOSSIBLE!!
4) So move 3 fields to Column Area
5) Now try to move the fourth field in the middle of 2 fields : It´s POSSIBLE!!


So, What´s the difference move fields from Filter Area to Row Area ( problem ) and COlumn Area ( OK ) ???


SECOND SITUATION:

1) Move 7 fields from Filter Area to Row Area
2) Now try to move just one more field to the end or middle of Row Area: IMPOSSIBLE!!

Why???

 

Thanks!!

Subject: cxComboBox - Typing a search string that doesn't narrow down the drop-down list stops highlighting this string in list values if incremental filtering is enabled and the Properties.DropDownListStyle property is set to lsFixedList
Text:
Hi,


When Incremental Filtering of TcxComboBox is set to True and a character is entered, a candidate list is displayed and highlighted the part which matches the input character.


However, lines other than the first line are highlighted or not. Hover the cursor to highlight it. Is this a specification? Regardless of whether the cursor is moved or not, I think that the part that matches the input character should be highlighted in real time.


I attach the confirmed executable file and image.


?Reproduction?
1. Launch exe -> Image1.png
- "test 1 ~ 5" is set for the item
2. Enter "te" in the combo box -> Image2.png
- "te" is highlighted on line 1
- "t" is highlighted on line 2
- Not highlighted after line 3
3. Place the cursor on the 4th line of the candidate list -> Image3.png
- "te" is highlighted from line 1 to line 4
- Line 5 is not highlighted
4. Enter "tea" in the combo box -> Image4.png
- "No matches found" is displayed
5. Enter "tea" in the combo box -> Image5.png
- "tes" is highlighted on all lines


Thanks.

Subject: Dashboard - How to resize pivot column to bestfit when exported
Text:
Hi,
When we load a dashboard in a dashboard viewer, we add the code below to resize the columns (best fit) Private Sub DashboardViewer1_DashboardItemControlCreated(sender As Object, e As DashboardItemControlEventArgs) Handles DashboardViewer1.DashboardItemControlCreated If e.PivotGridControl IsNot Nothing Then e.PivotGridControl.BestFit() End If End Sub Private Sub DashboardViewer1_DashboardItemControlUpdated(sender As Object, e As DashboardItemControlEventArgs) Handles DashboardViewer1.DashboardItemControlUpdated If e.PivotGridControl IsNot Nothing Then e.PivotGridControl.BestFit() End If End Sub
Everything is ok, but when we export the dashboard (pdf/ image) or print it, the best fit is not apply.
Is there an event to put the same code when the export / print option is launched ?
thanks

Subject: Dashboard Export number is always formatted as Currency

So, I think there's a bug that needs to be solved, but I'd also like to know if there's a way to programatically get in-between the print preview and the export of a dashboard item. I'd like to change number formatting and do some other things to change the final export product.

Subject: Dashboard Item - Add a DropDown data selector item that supports filtering capabilities
Text:
As a more compact alternative to card view, I suggest you implement selectors / dropdowns, similar to this (SAP BusinessObjects):
http://resources.businessobjects.com/support/cx/samples/download_45/portable_interactive_model/Portable%20Interactive%20Visual%20Model.swf
Or see attached picture. Selectors should be able to attach to each other, so that you never end up with an empty set, or be independent - have a fixed set of values, for performance. As an added benefit, it would be nice if you could multi-select. For example, in insurance, you would select multiple policy types to indicate you want all activity related to property.
Depending on the number of items in the list, this new approach may save lots of on-screen space.
Please also let me know if something like this is already on your list. Thanks.

Subject: Dashboard Item Toolbar not shown on hover when Caption is off
Text:
Hello,

Ran into another strange problem after upgrading from 17.x to 18.1, this may or may not be related to my previous tkt #T653061 @ https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/T653061/dashboard-item-toolbar-when-caption-is-off

So, On dashboards that include many items, some of these items have caption ON while others have caption off... on the items with off captions, in 17.x, user were able to just hover on any part of the visualization and the toolbar will automatically appears allowing user to interact with it. In 18.1, users are forced to click anywhere in the specific visualization before the toolbar appears, this will cause a lot of confusion for our user. is this by design and if so, is there a way to override so it behave the same as it did in 17.x

See attached video
