Subject: DataGrid -  How to filter a column that has tokens
Text:
Hello,

I have a dxData Grid and I am displaying tokens in one column - each row can have multiple tokens in a column. For example, we have an "issue" with the labels (tokens) "urgent", "frontend". 

While this works pretty well, I do have problems with the filtering - In the header filter, I have rows like "urgent", "urgent frontend", "frontend urgent", "backend", "backend frontend" (and such).

What I want to achieve is that the filter (header filter and filter builder) only shows a list of "urgent", "frontend", "backend". And the the filtering then occurs if the selected tokens are in the row. If I select "urgent" and "backend", I'll find all rows that have those two tokens in it (but have other tokens as well).

I there a way to achieve this? Is there an example of that somewhere in the demos that I missed?

Markus

{

in my view

how can I get another value?

Subject: DataGrid - Column reordering and resizing slow in IE 11 with large number of columns and rows.
Text:
Hi,

Column resizing and reordering seems to be very slow when we use infinite scrolling in IE. The same works better on google chrome.
I have also set the ColumnRenderingMode to virtual to improve the performance.

Attaching a sample project to illustrate the same.

As we keep scrolling down in the grid(till order 200), we see a decrease in the reordering performance. Also, we see a decrease in the performance if we add cell templates to columns.

I created a CodePen https://codepen.io/sannip/pen/EdOrag based on
https://community.devexpress.com/blogs/javascript/archive/2018/05/16/datagrid-and-treelist-performance-improvements-v18-1.aspx to compare performance.
And column reordering is a lot faster in this CodePen.

 
Thanks,

my function looks like this:
function StoreRows(e, elementName)Where e is the data from OnRowUpdated and elementName is a string

I have tried a couple of things to make this work, but they do not:

.OnRowUpdated(@<text>function(e) { StoreRows(e, "updatedLoans") }</text>).OnRowUpdated("StoreRows(e, \"updatedLoans\")")This one works, but only provides your data and not the string that I need
.OnRowUpdated("StoreRows")Your help is greatly appreciated.

Subject: DataGrid - How to eliminate database queries when building filters
Text: We use the MVC gridview extensively in our product and most support filtering and we use custom callbacks to support things like saving views/etc. For some customers who have large datasets, we've noticed that while building a filter, it calls back to the server and in the callback, we requery the database. Is there a way to determine in the custom callbacks like when they are adding a condition/etc that we don't need to requery the database? In other words, we'd like them to be able to build their filter conditions but not query the database until they hit "Apply/OK" on the filter. In looking at the parameters sent from the browser, it looks like it's possible to figure this out but I couldn't find a way to do it that is documented.

Subject: DataGrid loses the entered data in the editing form when expanding or collapsing another row
Text:
Hello,

I discovered that there were some changes made between version 17.1.8 and 17.1.9 in the way dxDataGrid build-in forms are treated when rows are being expanded/collapsed.

Let me give you a simple scenario. Suppose a user is adding a new row. He or she enters the data and while filling up the form they decide to expand a row below to see its details and maybe use those info in adding. What is happening in newer version is that the adding form with all the data disappears irrevocably contrary to the previous version where the adding form stays untouched which is the expected behavior.

I've prepared some samples that demonstrate this. One for version 17.1.8 and the other for 17.1.9. Please check it out. Notice that the code for both versions is identical (but the behavior is not).

Subject: DataLayoutControl - Support sentence casing option for default captions
Text:
You have a cool feature that initializes layout item captions to the data binding field name. Right now it takes "PascalCaseFieldNames" and generates "Title Case Caption Names." This is great except that title casing for field names looks ugly in my opinion and doesn't fit my company's app style. "Sentence case caption names" are less choppy and easier to read.

The ideal would be Humanizer's take on it. See also this article by Microsoft on user interface text. End users have come to expect this as a norm not only from their operating system but also from almost all well-designed websites. Usability standards agree that absorbing sentence casing is less cognitive load than title casing. I was at the excellent DevExpress UI superhero roadshow in New York- your own presentation backs this up.

So this auto-caption feature doesn't save me any time in its current state. I have to go retype the captions anyway, and I imagine others do the same or else sacrifice friendly UI. Can you please implement a feature so that I can choose the casing at design time, and would you consider making sentence casing the default?

Subject: DefaultWindowManager.RegisterOrShowOrActivate returns an incorrect result if the dialog closing operation was canceled
Text:
Hi,

I'm using MIF to show a dialog. When the dialog is closed using the close button, the WindowInjectionResult is as expected. Closing the dialog though the close button ( x in the top right corner) the result is None. So far, so good.
But when I close the window with the close button, cancel the close during closing command an then close the window by using the close (x) button, the result is still the result of the Close button, not the None result.

Steps to reproduce:
- Start the app and hit the 'Open MIF Dialog' button. The dialog opens.
- Check the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'OK' button. Result is as expected.

- Start the app and hit the 'Open MIF Dialog' button. The dialog opens.
- Check the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'X' button. Result is as expected.

- Start the app and hit the 'Open MIF Dialog' button. The dialog opens.
- UNCheck the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'OK' button. The dialog is not closed.
- Check the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'X' button. Result is the 'OK' button result, not 'None'

An other question: how can I set the dialogs owner when using MIF to show the dialogs across a larger application?

Subject: DevExpress Extension Packages are loading synchronously in the Visual Studio 2019
Text: Visual Studio 2019 Preview 1 features a reworked the default packages loading mechanism. When you open IDE with DevExpress Packages installed, you can see Visual Studio warning in the result.

Subject: DevExpress Extension Packages are loading synchronously in the Visual Studio 2019
Text:
Visual Studio 2019 Preview 1 features a reworked package loading mechanism. When you open IDE with DevExpress Packages installed, you can see the following Visual Studio warning.



This is the expected behavior, dismiss this notification or press "Never show this message again"

Also, when you open the design time for the first time after DevExpress components have been installed, DevExpress LayoutAssistant extension initializes the Visual Studio toolbox, which takes some time. When it is done, the Visual Studio 2019 Preview 1 shows a notification that gives you an option to disable this extension to improve the performance.



Do not disable DevExpress extensions to keep all features functional.

Subject: DevExpress Extension Packages are loading synchronously in the Visual Studio 2019
Text:
Visual Studio 2019 Preview 1 features a reworked package loading mechanism. When you open IDE with DevExpress Packages installed, you can see Visual Studio warning in the result.



This is the expected behavior, dismiss this notification or press "Never show this message again"

Also, when you open the design time for the first time after DevExpress components have been installed, DevExpress LayoutAssistant extension initializes the Visual Studio toolbox, which takes some time. When it is done, the Visual Studio 2019 Preview 1 shows a notification that gives you an option to disable this extension to improve the performance.



Do not disable DevExpress extensions to keep all features functional.

Subject: DevExpress MVC 2 version and its capability query
Text:
Hello Team,

I have an application in ASP .Net 3.5 with MVC 2.0 and Asp.Net Dynamic data. My requirement is to to implement Dev express grids so that I can get following features as mentined below:

Asp.Net MVC2.0 requirement
--------------------------------------
1.Paging with page no textbox so that we can enter any page no to go on particular page .
2.Page size dropdown to change page size.
3.Filteration/sorting for every column

ASP.Net Dynamic Data page requirement
------------------------------------------------------

Subject: Disable automatic refresh on modifying nested dashboard object settings

It should be possible to update Dashboard settings and force the designer or viewer to update manually by calling a special method.

Subject: Disable DeferredDeletion when using Business Class Library
Text:
Hi,

I am developing an application with three tiers of classes, based on the Task class, provided in the Devexpress Business Class Library.

There's an Order class which derives from WorkItem which derives from Task.

Task (BaseObject, ITask) -> XPCustomObject with DeferredDeletion by default true
WorkItem (Task)
Order (WorkItem)

When I create an Order and delete it. It is still in my database. That makes sense, because DeferredDeletion is set to true in the Task base class.

However, when I add this attribute to the order class, it still is not immediately deleted from the database.
[DeferredDeletion(false)]

Probably because the DeferredDeletion of the Task is still in effect, but how can I override this behaviour?

And is there a way to globally disable the DeferredDeletion option?

Thanks,
Jim

I am having trouble using DockPanels on a Surface Pro tablet - it is nearly impossible to resize and move the panels.

https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/T198868

However, in the example supplied, if I close the bottom panel in the example it generates an error.   Also it does not allow you to grip the toolbar of the bottom panel to allow you to move it - is there a better way to allow the grip size to be bigger without this problems?  It also has the issue that increasing the grip size affects the look of the panel and that all controls in the panel are surrounded by a big border (the grip) - is it possible to make the grip bigger but is visibly the same as normal panels?  I guess this is how all other window resizing works on tablets - the grip is bigger but visibly looks normal size.

Thanks in advance,
Dan.

Now, clicking from 1 tab to another is also setting the property back to "True", and I haven't found an event I can handle to set them back (I can see that the property is back to "True" in the DocumentManager.DocumentActivate event, but setting it back to "False" in that event doesn't work, the close button still appears.

Subject: DocumentManager and DockManager - It is impossible to completely disable floating
Text:
Hi!

I use DocumentManager and DockManager in my forms to place controls. I want to disable completely the possibility to float panels/documents.
The view of the DocumentManager is TabbedView. I set the followings configurations to disable everything :

tabbedView.DocumentProperties.AllowFloat = false;
panel.Options.AllowFloating = false; (on each panels of the DockManager)

First question : Is there a way to disable floating on the DockManager itself (DockManager.DockingOptions.AllowFloating = false or something like that). It is not really interesting to have to iterate of each panel to disable this function.

Second question : It seems that floating is still working after that anyway. If I take a document (Fill), I can float it. Why ? Is there something I miss ?

I read old posts that mentioned some bugs about Document Fill and Dock Panels float but it seems to be fixed since some times.

Thanks!

Benoit

Subject: Drawer - Widget doesn't calculate panel width correctly when the 'overlap' mode is used
Text:
Steps for reproduce:

- Specify template width via css

- Open Drawer

- See the wrong panel width

Subject: Drawer - Widget doesn't calculate panel width correctly when the 'overlap' mode is used
Text:
When Drawer is used in 'overlap' mode, panel has wrong size if it's template width is specified via css or not specified at all.

 

There is codepen for example. In this example Drawer panel contain simple list. List-item width is specified.

.dx-list-item { width: 200px; }

But Drawer panel has a larger size.

 

It is necessary to set width property to the list in Drawer panel to fix this issue.

$list.dxList({ // dxList options width: 200 })

Subject: Drawer - Widget doesn't calculate panel width correctly when the 'overlap' mode is used
Text:
When Drawer is used in 'overlap' mode, the panel has a wrong size if its template width is specified via css or not specified at all.

 

There is codepen for example. In this example the Drawer panel contains a simple list. List-item width is specified.

.dx-list-item { width: 200px; }

But Drawer panel has a larger size.

 

It is necessary to set the width property to the list in the Drawer panel to fix this issue.

$list.dxList({ // dxList options width: 200 })

Subject: Drawer - Widget doesn't calculate panel width correctly when the 'overlap' mode is used
Text:
When Drawer is used in 'overlap' mode, the panel has a wrong size if its template width is specified via css or not specified at all.

 

There is codepen for example. In this example the Drawer panel contains a simple list. List-item width is specified.

.dx-list-item { width: 200px; }

But Drawer panel has a larger size.

 

It is necessary to set the width property to the list in the Drawer panel to fix this issue.

$list.dxList({ // dxList options width: 200 })

Subject: Drawer - Widget doesn't calculate panel width correctly when the 'overlap' mode is used
Text:
When Drawer is used in 'overlap' mode, the panel has a wrong size if its template width is specified via css or not specified at all.

 

There is codepen for example. In this example the Drawer panel contains a simple list. List-item width is specified.

.dx-list-item { width: 200px; }

But Drawer panel has a larger size.

 

It is necessary to set the width property to the list in the Drawer panel to fix this issue.

$list.dxList({ // dxList options width: 200 })

Subject: Dropdown editors don't arrange their popup when the popup height increases
Text:
Hello,

We have a custom control in our application based on the PopupEditBase class. The popup for this control displays a list of selectable items from a data source.

As this list of items comes from the database and may load after the popup has opened, sometimes this means that the popup starts out smaller but then grows in height. This means that if the popup is opened near the bottom of the screen, it can obscure the rest of the control as it will attempt to open the popup below the 

My question is, is there a way to rearrange the placement for the popup whilst it is open if its size changes? I was trying to use the InvalidateArrange but this doesn't seem right.

Any help you could provide would be great.

Thanks

Subject: Drop-down editors don't arrange their popup when the popup height increases
Text:
Hello,

We have a custom control in our application based on the PopupEditBase class. The popup for this control displays a list of selectable items from a data source.

As this list of items comes from the database and may load after the popup has opened, sometimes this means that the popup starts out smaller but then grows in height. This means that if the popup is opened near the bottom of the screen, it can obscure the rest of the control as it will attempt to open the popup below the 

My question is, is there a way to rearrange the placement for the popup whilst it is open if its size changes? I was trying to use the InvalidateArrange but this doesn't seem right.

Any help you could provide would be great.

Thanks

Subject: Duplicate records can be created when using SecuredObjectSpaceProvider or a middle-tier application server despite RuleUniqueValue, RuleObjectExists and other validation rules
Text:
Hello support,

we use a SecuredObjectSpace, so that user A does not "see" all objects of a certain type T, whereas user B can see all these objects. User A can create new objects of type T. T contains a property having a RuleUniqueValue. As A does not see all objects of type T, the RuleUniqueValue does not consider the objects that A does not see. This leads to duplicate values for the said property. The duplicate values can only be seen by user B, who sees all objects.

Can we do anything so that the RuleUniqueValue considers all objects, not only those visible to A?

Thank you,
Markus

The datasource is a json array fetched from database which I need to populate the actionsheet items with, dynamically

I'd appreciate a small sample code showing how to do it.
Thanks all.

Subject: dxChart: Incorrect category order on descrete value axis in Bubble chart
Text:
Hi,

the order of discrete value axis is incorrect in the following codepen .

As stated in your docs: "By default, values on a discrete axis keep the order of objects in the data source. To change it, assign an array of properly sorted values to the categories option."

Is looks like that the correct order of the categories gets destroyed by the sizeField property of the series. Removing the sizeField property restores the correct order in the codepen. (Also setting an empty array as datasource will lead to a correct categories order.)

Subject: dxCheckBox - How to enable behavior similar to WPF CheckEdit with the enabled IsThreeState option
Text:
Dear DevExpress team,

in our WPF client application we are using the CheckEdit-control with "IsThreeState"=true, which enables the indeterminate state for the checkbox. We want to implement the exact same behavior in our webapp which uses DevExtreme Angular dxCheckBox component. I am totally aware of this answer that unfortunately only partly works. There two things that mismatch: 

1. The implementation provided in the above mentioned implementation doesn't work if the initial state of the checkbox is something other than undefined.
Case initial state "false": false => true => false => undefined => true
Expected: false => undefined => true
2. The behavior differs from the WPF CheckEdit, because the state of the CheckEdit flows like that: true => null/undefined => false

How can I match the WPF CheckEdit behavior to the DevExtreme dxCheckBox?

Please let me know if my concern is unclear.

Kind regards,
Steffen Probst

Subject: dxDataGrid - Does filter row support DateTimeOffset ?
Text:
I'm using Web Api Odata V3 service and bind it to dxDataGrid.
When i tried to filter a column that has DateTimeOffset data, the query url used datetime resulting on error.

A binary operator with incompatible types was detected. Found operand types 'Edm.DateTimeOffset' and 'Edm.DateTime' for operator kind 'GreaterThanOrEqual'.

The query url is:

http://localhost:9000/odata/Canvasses?%24orderby=DepartureDate+desc%2CNumber&%24top=50&%24expand=Salesperson%2CStatus&%24filter=((DepartureDate+ge+datetime%272014-12-11%27)+and+(DepartureDate+lt+datetime%272014-12-12%27))&%24inlinecount=allpages

I define the column as
{ allowFiltering: true, dataField: "DepartureDate", caption: "Tanggal", dataType: "date", format: "shortDate", width: 120, alignment: 'center', sortIndex: 0, sortOrder: 'desc' } The service return DepartureDate as ISO8061 string.
"DepartureDate":"2014-12-04T01:49:54+07:00"Does dxDataGrid filter row support filter on DateTimeOffset ?

Thanks.

Subject: dxDataGrid - Event like onEditingComplete or onEditingEnd
Text:
Hi,

I am looking for event like onEditingComplete (); Below is my scenario,

We are using editing.mode = batch for our grid editing. We have functionality when user edit any cell (oldValue != newValue) then we want to disable few buttons and enable others. I tried using,

1) onEditingStart() -> but seems when this event is called, we don't know newValue as it called before user actually type new value in cell.
2) onRowUpdating() -> this will be called only if user click on save button to commit the new data to datasource.

What I want is, when user complete editing of cell then that cell is highlighted with green or red. I want to call method immediately, once cell border is green and I can compare newValue and oldValue (something like onFocusOut) irrespective of editorType (dxTextBox, dxNumberBox, dxSwitch, dxLookup, etc).



Regards,
Parag

Subject: dxDataGrid - How to preserve initial multiple sorting when one sorts the grid by another column
Text:
Hi,


I’m trying to display some data in a pre-sorted DataGrid and I encountered the following issue:
All sort indexes seem to be reset when clicking on a column header to apply sorting.


In the attached example, I use the ‘Multiple’ sorting mode and I have set the first and second columns to be pre-sorted.
If I apply sorting on the third column, the data is sorted only by that column.
The previous Sort-Index-0 column was the first one, but we can clearly see that it is not sorted anymore.


Is there any way to maintain the previously applied sorting while sorting by the desired field?

What I want to do is, for example:
- Column "Region", sortindex 0
- Column "Name", sortindex 1
- Column "Date", sortindex 2
- Column "Amount"
By default, these would be sorted by Region then by Name then by "Date"
If I click on "Name", I'd like to get this sort order: "Name", "Region", "Date", i.e. I want to explicitly set the sort orders on column click.

Thanks

Subject: dxDataGrid - Search does not highlight text in lookup columns
Text:
Hi,

We are evaluating the DevExtreme dxdatagrid for use in a project and have run into an issue:

1We have setup two grids both with search panels connected to a REST api via a CustomStore

Grid A
GridA columns are bound directly to the underlying fields using dataType = "string", dataType="date".
When a search term is typed into the search panel on GridA the records are filtered and the search term is highlighted using dx-datagrid-search-text from the DevExpress CSS
This grid behaves as expected.

GridB
GridB columns are bound directly to the underlying fields using dataType = "string", dataType="date" and indirectly using lookup
When a search term is typed into the search panel on GridB the records are filtered and the search term is NOT highlighted using dx-datagrid-search-text from the DevExpress CSS on the lookup columns
This is not expected behaviour. I would expect the displayExpr value to be highlighted in the same way as string and date columns

Please let me know how I can achieve this.

Thanks,
John

Subject: dxDataGrid does not save added/removed columns when State Storing is enabled
Text:
We’re currently configuring the grids to handle the caching automatically, (i.e. we set  stateStoring.enabled = true with no customLoad or customSave) and this generally works well, but a problem occurs if we need to change some of the grid settings (e.g. add in column freezing, remove a column etc.). The built in logic doesn't recognise that the cached data doesn't match up with the new grid settings, and the cached data takes precedence (meaning the new settings may not be applied).

This will become a big issue for us down the track when we need to modify existing grids (we don't want to have to tell all our customers to clear their browser cache).

Is this something you could consider fixing in your caching logic? I realise that we can create custom handling by making use of customLoad and customSave, but I though that a fix to the framework would save us some effort, and benefit other customers too.


Cheers,

Subject: dxDataGrid is showing the 'Unknown error' message in the error bar after cancelling through a deferred http call
Text:
If there's a backend error when I try to save a new record, I cancel by using deferred.reject(). That works pretty well and keeps me properly editing my row when the serverside validtoins fail. However, I'm getting an awkward message in the datagrid which inserts a red error bar with "Unknown Error."

I'd either like to set the error, or better yet not show it as we have other error messaging systems.. "Unknown Error" isn't very polished.

Code for what I'm doing:
onRowInserting = (e: any) => {
 const limit = <StorageLimit>e.data;
 e.cancel = this.createStorageLimit(limit);
 return;
}
createStorageLimit(limit: StorageLimit) {
 var deferredCancel = $.Deferred();
 this.appService.clearMessages();

 this.accountInjectionLimitService.createStorageLimit(limit).subscribe(
 result => {

 this.data.storageLimits = _.filter(this.data.storageLimits, record => !_.isNil(record.id) );
 this.data.storageLimits.push(result);

 this.finishEdit(result);
 deferredCancel.resolve();
    },
 error => {
 this.appService.onFailure(error);
 deferredCancel.reject();
    }
  );
 return deferredCancel.promise();
}

Subject: dxDataGrid- Is there a specific event which is raised when a user sorts a column
Text:
Hi,

Can dxDataGrid provide an event callback whenever user change sorting options on column? e.g. event case including enabling sorting, changing sorting option between ascending and descending and clear sorting in column.

In my project,  I need to detect when user changes their sort option so as to do some handing. However in current dxDataGrid design, only one event call, OnContentReady will be triggered, and this event can be also triggered by other cases in dxDataGrid (e.g. changing datasource). I would like to have an event callback just indicating user have changes grid's column sorting option, or more specifically, which column's options has been just changed.

Thank you.

But when the statment is executed the grid excutes the customstore again. It's a the loss of performance becaus the query of grid is executed two times.


we don't understand why when we selectAll rows in the grid the customstore method is executed again. I attacha a project example. In this project you can find a button to select all rows. we can see tha when you click this button the grid  is refresh. 


Best Regards.

Subject: dxList - An item cannot be selected by a single click after scrolling on Android
Text:
Hi,
I found a strange behavior on the dxList widget, the problem happens on mobile devices but desktop apps seem to be aware of it.

The problem is simple: just scroll the items of a dxList, then there is no way to select an item until you perform a second click on it.

The problem is easily repeatable:
1) just scroll the items of a dxList:
2) click on a item ... nothing happens
3) perform a second click: since this second click you can select items, until you scroll  .... (and going to step 2 again)

You can see it by browsing your online demos, no need to provide a sample application.
I tested it with iPhone, iPad and 2 Android models .

Please let me know your thoughts about it.
Best regards

Subject: dxList - An item cannot be selected by a single click after scrolling on Android
Text:
Hi,
I found a strange behavior on the dxList widget, the problem happens on mobile devices but desktop apps seem to be aware of it.

The problem is simple: just scroll the items of a dxList, then you need to click it twice to select an item.

The problem is easily repeatable:
1) just scroll the items of a dxList:
2) click on a item ... nothing happens
3) perform a second click: since this second click you can select items, until you scroll  .... (and going to step 2 again)

You can see it by browsing your online demos, no need to provide a sample application.
I tested it with iPhone, iPad and 2 Android models .

Please let me know your thoughts about it.
Best regards

Subject: dxList - Editors have incorrect widths when placed in a table with a percentage size on iOS 6
Text:
When rendering an input widget (dxTextBox and dxNumberBox) within a table that is part if a dxList item, the width of the input widget does not inherit from the parent table element.

Attached is a project that demonstrates this along with images of the result from both ios6 and ios7.

When you run the app, the first view shows tables of different widths, each table containing input widgets. These appear to have the correct widths.

Selecting the "View1" menu item shows a dxList containing a table of 10% width. The table contains input widgets.

The rendered input widgets are not resized to fit within the table elements.

The attached project is using version 14.1.4 of the framework but the version I am using is 13.2.8.14083 and this is the one I would like to correct (as I do not have time to switch (and retest) to the new framework).

Text:
When rendering an input widget (dxTextBox and dxNumberBox) within a table that is part if a dxList item, the width of the input widget does not inherit from the parent table element.

Attached is a project that demonstrates this along with images of the result from both ios6 and ios7.

When you run the app, the first view shows tables of different widths, each table containing input widgets. These appear to have the correct widths.

Selecting the "View1" menu item shows a dxList containing a table of 10% width. The table contains input widgets.

The rendered input widgets are not resized to fit within the table elements.

The attached project is using version 14.1.4 of the framework but the version I am using is 13.2.8.14083 and this is the one I would like to correct (as I do not have time to switch (and retest) to the new framework).

Subject: dxLoadPanel does not work on Android
Text:
Hi DevExpress,

I have a loadpanel in a view,... a simple loadPanel

<div data-bind="dxLoadPanel: { visible: loadPanelVisible }"></div>Then i just make loadPanelVisible(true) or (false) whenever an action is made to refresh a list. but for some reason, it doesn't work.
On the browser (and android), doing it like so works for the first time, but then making it true again doesn't show it.

So i made a work around in the browser and wrote in my js:

var loader = new DevExpress.ui.dxLoadpanel (element, {visible: true}) ; .. .. .. datasource.load().done( function () { loader.option('visible', false }; );every time i need to show the loader. Now that made it work in the browser, but doesn't work on android.

When i was using phonejs .2.7 it was working using the above js method in android (the first method still didn't work) but now both methods don't work on android at all.

I really need this loading panel since it takes up to 2 seconds to reload the list, and i need to show some feedback to the user.

Thanks,
Abubaker

Subject: DXTreeList - How to implement summary footers
Text:
At the moment, our TreeListView does not provide the capability to show summary footers for its groups. This example demonstrates how to implement this functionality manually by using a custom DataRowTemplate.

This workaround has a few limitations:
1. It supports only a two-level structure.
2. The context menu for summary footers is not supported.
3. The grid's horizontal scrolling is not supported.

Subject: DXTreeList - How to implement summary footers
Text:
At the moment, our TreeListView does not provide the capability to show summary footers for its groups. This example demonstrates how to implement this functionality manually by using a custom DataRowTemplate.

This workaround has a few limitations:
1. It supports only a two-level structure.

2. The context menu for summary footers is not supported.

3. The grid's horizontal scrolling is not supported.

Subject: DXTreeList - How to implement summary footers
Text:
At the moment, our TreeListView does not provide the capability to show summary footers for its nodes. This example demonstrates how to implement this functionality manually by using a custom DataRowTemplate.

This workaround has a few limitations:
1. It supports only a two-level structure.
2. The context menu for summary footers is not supported.
3. The grid's horizontal scrolling is not supported.

Subject: dxTreeList - How to implement total summary

If it's not a current feature, would it be possible to code this using OnCellPrepared events?
Ideally, the summary totals would be dynamically calculated --- when amounts updated at the leaf node level, the parent summary totals are automatically updated.

Subject: dxValidationGroup throws the "Unknown validation group is detected" error
Text:
If a validation group, which does not contain any rules, is validated, it will throw an error.

see Plunker: http://plnkr.co/edit/VdLJEk1Qrd7QcpBaTInC?p=preview

- Press the validate button -> Error will be thrown
- If you show the text edit before validating -> no Error will be thrown


Here the error message:
Error: E0110 - Unknown validation group is detected. See: http://js.devexpress.com/error/16_2/E0110 at makeError (VM372 error.js:51) at Object.Error (VM372 error.js:19) at Object.validateGroup (VM471 validation_engine.js:324) at inheritor.validate (VM839 validation_group.js:36) at App.clicked (VM341 app.ts!transpiled:27) at CompiledTemplate.proxyViewClass.View_App0.handleEvent_6 (VM1628 component.ngfactory.js:362) at CompiledTemplate.proxyViewClass.eval (VM336 core.umd.js:12774) at SafeSubscriber.schedulerFn [as _next] (VM336 core.umd.js:4116) at SafeSubscriber.__tryOrUnsub (VM347 Subscriber.js:223) at SafeSubscriber.next (VM347 Subscriber.js:172)

Regards,
Hanno

Subject: dxValidator - The validation icon has a large margin to the right when showClearButton is true
Text:
Hi,

If you have validation on a dxTextbox with showClearButton option set to true, the dxValidator icon appears with a large margin to the right which doesn't look great.

For example, using your widgets gallery from here:
http://js.devexpress.com/Demos/WidgetsGallery/#demo/editorsvalidationvalidationvalidation/generic/light/default

Edit the "name" dxTextBox markup to include the showClearButton option, the clear all text. The validation ! icon appears to one side obviously due to clear icon, but I would have thought , if the clear button isn't visible the ! icon should be show floated right until the clear button is show where it would move to the left to show the clear icon or the ! icon should always be shown on the right. I don't think it looks very good how it currently is

Thanks

Note: I'm currently using 18.1.7 but this issue replicates in the sample using 18.2.3

Mark

You'll notice in the top grid the delete request is sent without issue whereas the bottom grid returns error E4014.

Note: I'm currently using 18.1.7 but this issue replicates in the sample using 18.2.3

Subject: Editors have incorrect widths when placed in a table with a percentage size on iOS 6 and Android
Text:
When rendering an input widget (dxTextBox and dxNumberBox) within a table that is part if a dxList item, the width of the input widget does not inherit from the parent table element.

Attached is a project that demonstrates this along with images of the result from both ios6 and ios7.

When you run the app, the first view shows tables of different widths, each table containing input widgets. These appear to have the correct widths.

Selecting the "View1" menu item shows a dxList containing a table of 10% width. The table contains input widgets.

The rendered input widgets are not resized to fit within the table elements.

The attached project is using version 14.1.4 of the framework but the version I am using is 13.2.8.14083 and this is the one I would like to correct (as I do not have time to switch (and retest) to the new framework).

Subject: End-User Designer - How to customize parameters in the Print Preview
Text:
This example demonstrates how to customize parameters displayed in the Print Preview of the End-User Designer.
The main idea is to use the XRDesignMdiController.DesignPanelLoaded event handler. In this event handler, subscribe to the ReportTabControl.PreviewReportCreated event where you can get a report instance by using the ReportTabControl.PreviewReport object. Use it to subscribe to the XtraReport.ParametersRequestBeforeShow event. 

For more details, see End-User Designer - How to customize parameters in the Print Preview.

Subject: End-User Designer - How to customize parameters in the Print Preview

For more details, see End-User Designer - How to customize parameters in the Print Preview.

Subject: Error when dragging a form within an mdi form with document manager
Text:
Hi!

I attached a sample to reproduce the issue. Run it. Click twice on the navBarItem1 on the left nav bar. It will open two forms. Try to drag the second form and dock it right. You wil receive the exception. It is a reference not set of an object in the DocumentManager in SubscribeMouseEvents method.

Here is the description of the issue. We use the DocumentManager and DockManager in a mdi form. We use the TabbedView. Then the user drags form to dock it right and he got the exception described above.

Thanks!

Benoit

Subject: Execution of the FindCommand results in creating and showing an additional "Find & Replace" form instance even if this form has already been shown

Alain

Subject: Export - Asian characters are not displayed correctly when exporting to PDF
Text:
When using the Dashboard Viewer to export to PDF , Japanese characters are not displaying properly in the output. So far we have not had any issues with characters not displaying properly in the designer or viewer so it only appears to be a PDF export issue.(the export to image works fine) I have verified that the same problem occurs in the designer and both the web viewer and win viewer.

I have a feeling it is strictly a font/font encoding issue, so if there was a way to set the font and font encoding used by the pdf exporter in code then I could properly work around the issue. I tried changing the font properties of the viewer component to use a standard japanese font and to use the Japanese character set, however this did not seem to affect the font used by the PDF exporter.

At this stage in the evaluation process we are very satisfied with the features provided by your product and this is the first major problem we have had , as such it would please me greatly if we could find a way to solve the export issue.

I have provided a sample PDF to illustrate the problem. You can recognize the characters not being exported correctly as they appear as squares.

When I tried to export grids from other demos, the exported documents didn't open at all. I had to wait too long but without success. Try the Outlook Style Grouping demo, for instance.

Text:
When I export the grid from the Conditional Formatting demo to RTF, only one row is exported. Plus, data is exported to the right of the column headers.




When I tried to export to RTF grids in other demos, the exported documents didn't open at all. See the Outlook Style Grouping demo, for instance.

Subject: Feature request - Leverage DataAnnotations to ease Winforms validation definition
Text:
More and more frequently in our applications, the model layer (what will be bound in the views) are shared between web and desktop applications.

Using asp.net mvc, we are used to DataAnnotations - http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.componentmodel.dataannotations.aspx

It would be nice if the bindings used by the winforms components could one way or another use the validations defined through the dataAnnotation attributes, preventing code duplication for similar validations.

The result could work like jquery.validate - http://jqueryvalidation.org/ and the MSFT unobstrusive plug-in http://nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.jQuery.Unobtrusive.Validation/ : translate DataAnnotation errors to UI.

I understand it's quite a feature, but I'm sure you hate code duplication as much as we do :)

Subject: Find out required vertical/horizontal size of a layout control
Text:
Hi.

I have a form which I dynamically compose at runtime out of different frames. One (actually several) of the frames has a dx layout control which contains several edits which are shown/hidden depending on some other variables. After showing/hiding those edits the layout control will have a necessary height and width to be able to display these controls without displaying scrollbars. I would like to find out what these values are, so I can change the size of the control containing the frame to initially display the layout control without scrollbars. Please note that I would prefer not to use the AutoSize (if it is usable in this case) feature, because the frame containing the layout control is itself contained in another layout item of an "outer" control.

So after constructing and placing the frames I would like to ask the layout control how large it would have to be to display all its content without using scrollbars.

Example:
dxOuterLayoutItem.Height = innerLayoutControl.GetOptimalHeight();

I attached to screenshots to make things clearer.

Thanks.

Subject: FluentDesignForm - HamburgerMenu has an incorrect color when the EnableAcrylicAccent property is false
Text:
Last week, the windows 10 version on my machine got updated from 10.0.16299 to 10.0.17134.

Before this update, the backcolor of the hamburgermenu was displayed correctly using the "Key Paint" color of the palette, as defined in the skin. After the update, it seems to be using the "Paint" color when EnableAcrylicAccent is disabled.

Because of this, depending on the user's version of windows, the text can become unreadable because the backcolor is too light.

I will force the correct color in code, but it would be nice if this was patched.

Subject: FluentDesignForm - HamburgerMenu has an incorrect color when the EnableAcrylicAccent property is false
Text:
Last week, the windows 10 version on my machine got updated from 10.0.16299 to 10.0.17134.

Before this update, the backcolor of the hamburgermenu was displayed correctly using the "Key Paint" color of the palette, as defined in the skin. After the update, it seems to be using the "Paint" color when EnableAcrylicAccent is disabled.

Because of this, depending on the user's version of windows, the text can become unreadable because the backcolor is too light.

I will force the correct color in code, but it would be nice if this was patched.

Edit: To try to correct this, i can change the color property of the middle part of the hamburger menu but not the header or the footer, so it's no good.

Subject: Form - How to display a validation message near each editor if the model is validated on the server side
Text:
We are using DevExtreme DataGrid for AspNet Core and the integrated popup editing to add new items or to edit existing rows.
We use FluentValidation to validate the ViewModel and in the controller it works fine. Unfortunately we can't leverage the integration with client-side jQuery Validation (which works fine in many cases), because we use some unsupported condition (e.g. .when()).
With client-side integration validation messages are displayed beside each field, while using server-side validation FluentValidation works fine and correctly updates ModelState but I couldn't find a way to leverage ModelState to display the error messages beside each wrong field.
The only way I found to return an error to the form is using BadRequest("message") which displays the error in the title of the popup; when there is a single error it could be a good solution, but there are multiple errors it's absolutely inadequate (I didn't even find a way to display the messages on separate lines...)
I searched the examples, the documentation and different forums, including this support forum, but I couldn't find a way to display the error messages beside each field.

Kind regards

Stefano

Subject: Form - How to place Buttons and Field in one item
Form - Values not being set when form data isn't defined
Text:
Hello,

We have a requirement that some of our fields utilize dot notation so that we can serialize the data with level for server side consumption. However, if datafields in the dxForm are set with the dot notation the form doesn't retrieve values.

Please see the fiddle below: 
fiddle

If I first supply form with data in the structure that is nested, grabbing the form data works. To simulate this in the fiddle, uncomment line 14.

If I don't supply form data or it isn't nested like the datafield dot notation, grabbing the form data doesn't work. 

We are simply storing and retrieving the data as JSON server side and don't want to have to supply the entire data structure in JSON for every form we create.

If the datafields don't use dot notation and are flat, grabbing the data works without setting the data first.

Is this a bug or do you have a work around we can utilize to not supply the JSON structure every form.

Thanks,
Jeff

Subject: Functions - XIRR function results differ from the results obtained in an MS Excel application with specific sets of data
Text:
Hi


After upgrading to 15.24, my program crashed with the following error message “{"An error occurred creating the form. See Exception.InnerException for details.  The error is: Function with same name is already defined."}.  Through trial and error, I found out, that my custom function XIRR is finally implemented (but only partial functional) in the latest build.


Its very strange that DevExpress did not announce it in What's New. I also checked the Online Documentation, NO XIRR!


Anyway I was very happy till I tried the function. Your XIRR implementation has no Error checking!! See attached screenshot.


Please note also the Black Fill color for pasted dates into Excel!


I really like your Spreadsheet control, but there are a lot of bugs in it. Some of them are, from my point of view, serious.
I start to feel a little bit like a Beta Tester.


All the best for the new year
Max Henry

Code works fine if datasource is not empty. If it is empty the grid does not show me the new line and when i move focus on any other control, the grid runs the validation process and ask to correct values ("Do you want to correct the values ?")

I tried changing the code adding new BLANK record directly to dataview, again if dataview already had records no problem, but if it's empty i get same problem, If that could help, i noticed that, in case of empty dataview, if i set a default value for all the fields code runs fine, but i cannot proceed like this, i need fields to be emtpy when adding a new row.

Can you help me with this ?

Tomislav Kunaj

Subject: Grid - Determine the current border color for any cell (in CustomDrawCell)
Text:
Dear Support,

I would like to paint a thicker border on the right hand side for some cells.
I use the CustomDrawCell event to achieve this. very simple.

private void gridView_CustomDrawCell(object sender, DevExpress.XtraGrid.Views.Base.RowCellCustomDrawEventArgs e)

{

   e.DefaultDraw();

  if (e.Column==colArbeitsbereich)

     GridLine(e, e.Bounds.Width, e.Bounds.Height);

}

privatevoid GridLine(CustomDrawEventArgs e, int hOffset, int len)

{

  int x = e.Bounds.Left + hOffset;

  int y = e.Bounds.Bottom;

  var pen = e.Appearance.GetBorderPen(e.Cache);

   e.Graphics.DrawLine(pen, x, y - len, x, y);

}

The problem I have is to find the proper pen/color to paint the additional line (well, could also be a rectangle). It should have the same color as the current grid line in that cell. The current attempt returns a pen with a color value of 0,0,0 (i.e. empty).

Can you help me in finding the correct pen/color?

Thanks in advance.

Subject: Grid - New record is not shown in an empty view after the AddNewRow method is called and DetailMode is Embedded
Text:
Hi, i have an XtraGrid boud to a dataview
I add new row (BLANK) using following code (where dgLst is GridView)

        dgLst.AddNewRow()


        dgLst.FocusedColumn = dgLst.Columns("COD")
        dgLst.ShowEditor()

Code works fine if datasource is not empty. If it is empty the grid does not show me the new line and when i move focus on any other control, the grid runs the validation process and ask to correct values ("Do you want to correct the values ?")

I tried changing the code adding new BLANK record directly to dataview, again if dataview already had records no problem, but if it's empty i get same problem, If that could help, i noticed that, in case of empty dataview, if i set a default value for all the fields code runs fine, but i cannot proceed like this, i need fields to be emtpy when adding a new row.

Can you help me with this ?

Subject: Grid does not display rows when AutoFilterRowDisplayTemplate is overriden
Text:
We have a data grid with auto filter turned on and use a TextBlock with empty text as AutoFilterRowDisplayTemplate so that it would not display the filter after the filter being applied.
Sometimes the only row that satisfies the filter given in the auto filter row would not show up unless scroll mouse wheel, click the auto filter row or whatever the action that may cause the grid to redraw.

The followings are the steps to recreate the issue:
1) run the attached code.
2) In the data grid drag the thumb to the middle or end of the scrollbar.
3) In the column with header = "Text",  type "e" and hit the enter key.
4) The grid shows zero row.
5) Scroll the mouse wheel, and the one row which Text="e" will show up.

Subject: Grid ExportType.DataAware - Why images aren't exported?
Text: I've recently implemented an unbound column process which inserts an image into an unbound column in the grid.  This works great, however, when I export it to Excel the image is not included.  I can resolve this by setting ExportType.WYSWYG but then I lose the DataAware functionality in Excel of being able to expand and collapse the groups.  Is there a way I can keep DataAware enabled and still export the image from the unbound column (or use WYSWYG and still retain the expand/collapse group functionality in Excel)?  Thanks, Jason

thanks

bob merriman

Subject: GridControl - Create a RepositoryItemComboBox item for columns with the enum type
Text:
As some data types are automatically bound (without specifying it in the property ColumnEdit) to default editor when it makes sens (bool,dateTime,...), why are not enumerations automatically bound to a combo/list editor ?

I think it is a pity, since the system doesn't have the choice but to match any input of the user with values from the enum ; why stoping good stuff here. Automatically binding it to a list editor (without specifying it in the property ColumnEdit) will save a lot of time in many cases.

regards

JuL

Subject: GridControl - Editors are shown for a focused row when selecting multiple rows on any ModifierKey press
Text:
Hi,

I have a question about the multiselection mode in grid and tree. Is it by design that for the focused row (at least it seems so) the editors are shown while holding shift or ctrl? For other rows than the focused row no editors are shown. For us the second case would be the right one, but for all rows (also the focused). The current behavior sometimes leads to unwanted changes of values (e.g. checkboxes) by the user. Since fixing the ticket Q557466 the tree behaves similiar to the grid.
Do you also agree that no editors should be shown for the focused row while holding shift or ctrl? If so will you change the current behavior?
I have attached a video, which demonstrates that especially for the ctrl key the behavior is very confusing (the test solution is also attached).

Thanks.
Best regards,
Matthias

GridControl does not display combined flag enumeration values
Text:
I have upgraded my Devexpress (Windows Forms) version from 1.8 to 2.3. Since then , all of my grids with columns binded to enumeration types are having a strange behavior. With single enumeration value everything is fine but if you have multiple enumeration values on a single field, the grid is not displaying text anymore.

For example:

public enum Test
{
Option1,
Option2,
Option3
}

public class ObjectTest
{
public Test Column1 {get;set;}
}

If you bind Column1  to a grid column and create a row with  value "Option1"  it shows ok, but if I create a row with "Option1 | Option 2" for example, it is showing empty on the grid. Before, it was showing both enumeration values.

Subject: GridView -  How to use FormatConditions.AddIconSet with a custom expression
GridView -  How to use FormatConditions.AddIconSet with a custom expression
GridView - A full dataset is always fetched when the paging operation is performed
Text:
I have been looking at this Demo and using it to implement a Gridview.
https://demos.devexpress.com/MVCxGridViewDemos/PagingAndScrolling/Paging 

The issue that I am trying to understand is that the data source is always pulling all records. Where is the paging happening? Is the entire record set being sent to the browser every time? It appears so when I look at the page source.

If all the data is client side already why is another call to the controller happening? This is causing another hit to the database to get the full dataset as well as sending over the wire the entire page again.
I could see another call to the database if the entire dataset was being reduced before being sent client side, but all this is doing is putting strain on the database as well as causing client side data usage to be more than it should.

Is there a way to reduce the hits to the controller and have the paging happen client-side since it has the entire dataset already?
This will save performance hits to the web server, data server and the client data usage if they are on a data conscious plan.

Subject: GridView - A wrong number of records is displayed in EmbeddedNavigator when the last record is filtered out
Text:

1. Go to record 10.
2. Click "Click me". This changes the value in the data source item in a way that will remove the item from the active filter, since it no longer matches the criteria.
3. Observe as the grid adjusts to go back to the very first item.
4. The bug: Look in the embedded navigator. It still says "Record 10 of 9". Since the grid adjusts to go back to the first item, this text should also be adjusted accordingly: "Record 1 of 9". I assume this is a bug since this does not happen.

Text:
Hi,

  We are currently working on a MVC GridView in batch edit mode in which we add a new Row using a button.  We also want to put some default values in the row, so we set up some fields with the "SetCellValue" function.  

  We also modified our code to do custom filtering in order to have accent insensitive searches.  

  If we add a new row and set a default value/text in a combobox column on which we manage the filtering, when we try to edit this cell the displayed text in the combobox is not the text but rather the value directly.  In our included example, if we click on the new row to edit its value, the displayed text is "9" instead of the usual display text.

  This does not happen if we use the regular "BindList" method

  We have included a sample project and a video in which we demonstrate the issue

  Regards,

Subject: GridView does not display combined flag enumeration values
GridView does not display combined flag enumeration values
Text:
I have upgraded my Devexpress (Windows Forms) version from 1.8 to 2.3. Since then , all of my grids with columns binded to enumeration types are having a strange behavior. With single enumeration value everything is fine but if you have multiple enumeration values on a single field, the grid is not displaying text anymore.

For example:

public enum Test
{
Option1,
Option2,
Option3
}

public class ObjectTest
{
public Test Column1 {get;set;}
}

If you bind Column1  to a grid column and create a row with  value "Option1"  it shows ok, but if I create a row with "Option1 | Option 2" for example, it is showing empty on the grid. Before, it was showing both enumeration values.

Subject: GridView- How to eliminate database queries when building filters
Text: We use the MVC gridview extensively in our product and most support filtering and we use custom callbacks to support things like saving views/etc. For some customers who have large datasets, we've noticed that while building a filter, it calls back to the server and in the callback, we requery the database. Is there a way to determine in the custom callbacks like when they are adding a condition/etc that we don't need to requery the database? In other words, we'd like them to be able to build their filter conditions but not query the database until they hit "Apply/OK" on the filter. In looking at the parameters sent from the browser, it looks like it's possible to figure this out but I couldn't find a way to do it that is documented.

Subject: GridView: DataAnnotation lost if SetDataItemTemplateContent is used?
GridView: DataAnnotation lost if SetDataItemTemplateContent is used?
GridView: DataAnnotation lost if SetDataItemTemplateContent is used?
Text:
I have a column in a gridview where the bound Property in the model is an enum. In the file definind the enum there is a DataAnnotation [Description] applied.

If the column is added without anything fancy, like ..

columns.Add("Progress");

it works. The Column displays it's Enum-Value with the pretty descriptions.

If I add the column with a specific template:

   columns.Columns.Add(c =>    {
        c.FieldName = "Progress";
        c.SetDataItemTemplateContent(cell =>
        {
              ViewContext.Writer.Write(cell.Text);
        }
    }

then the DataAnnoations are ignored.

Subject: Grouping by a column with the OnGetProperties event leads to showing duplicated group rows if the dcoSortByDisplayText option is activated

Subject: How to add items at runtime without Form recreation
Text:
How to add new item into dxForm without rewriting all items?

Solutuion in T533543 offers to _replace_ items array with a new one.
This means that:
1. Form will be reconfigured.
2. All items will be turned into their initial state.
3. All entered data will be lost.

In other words, it is a static solution.

How to add items into form in dynamic manner, without recreation of the form itself?
I mean some methods like addItem() / removeItem().

What this needed for: open Google Contacts and edit any contact. If a contact have an email, it will have a button allows to add another email.

Screenshots are here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16VlHtpo34cW1f9wPKnmYBPlgg99NaqAKOAoG_SFriro/edit?usp=sharing

There are also two strange bugs (see screenshots for details):
1. Checkboxes were duplicated (only if their values are not undefined).
2. Labels alignment broken.

Subject: How to add the pull-to-refresh functionality
Text:
This example shows how to add the pull-to-refresh functionality to a grid to allow your end-users update grid content with the pull-down gesture. To do this, follow the steps below.

    1. Set the GridControl.IsPullToRefreshEnabled property to true to enable the grid's pull-to-refresh feature.
    2. Create a command to be executed when an end-user pulls the grid down.
    3. Bind the created command to the grid using the GridControl.PullToRefreshCommand property.

Michail

Subject: How to change an edit value when the arrow key is pressed in a LookUpEdit drop-down window
Text:
Hi,

Regarding the RepositoryItemLookUpEdit, can it be make to behave like in MS Access.
Attached is the image of a comboxbox cell.

When any character is typed inside the cell, and then pressing F4 will open the dropdownlist.
After opening the dropdownlist, if I continue to type in any character it will continue to append to the cell value.
eg if initially I type only B and now I type A, 'BA will appear in the cell.
The dropdownlist will also select the next matching row that begins with 'BA'

Q1. However for the RepositoryItemLookUpEdit, after the popup is displayed, I will need to retype in the 'B' again then type in 'A' to autocomplete with characters beginning with 'BA' . 

Q2. In MS access, the characters to autocomplete is displayed in the cell itself, but for RepositoryItemLookUpEdit it is only displayed inside the popup. Can the characters be match be displayed in the cell as well.

Q3. When typing the up or down arrow in the popup is pressed, can the row value also be displayed in the cell.

 Regards,
Francis

Subject: How to connect to a data service behind a firewall
Text:
Hi,

I was wondering if you guys could help me get my head around a solution for our future product. We own DevExtreme Complete. After all the research I believe it is the one we will use for our mobile project.

Our customers data are internal to their network running on MySQL on our server, behind the firewall. No ports can be opened, however, we need to get to that data in order for our mobile project to work.

So far I have this figured out:

Inside their network on our server we would create a service (service1) using .net. This will be a restful web service (ASP.NET Rest API? DevExtreme WCF OData Service? --need maybe a suggestion here) . It will connect to another service outside the network (service2). To this web service will the clients connect to running the DevExtreme Mobile application either on a phone, tablet, or a website.

Service2 will forward the requests down to service1, service1 grabbing the data and sending it back to service2, which in turn will forward it to the clients.

Am I looking at this correctly?

Any thoughts would be really helpful.

Subject: How to disable or reduce TdxRibbonBackstageView close delay?
Text:
Hi,

I am implementing the TdxRibbonBackstageView in my application and notice that the menu takes to much time to close.
Even in my super fast machine it takes to long.
In slower machines it is more noticeable and it will be a problem since many customers have very slow computers.

Testing the same behavior in Office 2016, the menu closes almost immediately and the app main screen show up instantly. Which means that this is not the design behavior of the Office 2016 UI.
The problem doesn't seem to be exactly while the menu is closing, but more about the time that takes to show the main app screen again right after the menu disappears.
This is weird since I also have my app with tabs, so every app screen show inside a TcxTabSheet on the main form. And switching between tabs is very fast and the screen draws quickly.
And at least I would expect the same speed when the TdxRibbonBackstageView menu closes and the main form shows it's content again.


Can we disable the animation to make the menu to close without delay?
The animation when it opens it's not bad, but it would also be nice if we could adjust the animation delay.

I hope I could have explained this issue well enough.


Thanks.


Luis Madaleno

How to use XtraReports in an ASP.NET MVC application

Subject: How to dynamically generate a report in an ASP.NET MVC application
Text:
This example illustrates how to create a report in code in an ASP.NET MVC application.

The following steps are essential to create a report layout:

1. Create a report instance and bind it to data.

2. Add required bands to the report.

3. Add required controls to the created bands and provide data to them.

After the report layout is complete, you can generate the report document and display it in a Print Preview.


See also:
How to use XtraReports in an ASP.NET MVC application
How to link the Document Viewer with an external Ribbon control

Subject: How to extract pages from a PDF file into a separate document

PdfDocumentProcessor xxx = new PdfDocumentProcessor(); xxx.LoadDocument(PDFDoc);
PdfDocumentProcessor yyy = new PdfDocumentProcessor();
for (int i = 3; i < 8; i++) { yyy.Document.Pages.Add(xxx.Document.Pages[i]); }

Thanks,
Scott Kay

Subject: How to implement browser-style tab behavior in DXTabControl using StretchView
Text: One of DXTabControl's supported views is TabControlStretchView. This view automatically stretches tab headers to all available space in the Tab Header Panel and allows dragging tabs in the browser-style manner. To control the dragging behavior, use the DragDropMode property. In addition to this functionality, TabControlStretchView allows pinning tabs to the right or left side of the Tab Header Panel. To pin a tab, use the TabControlStretchView.PinMode attached property.

Subject: How to implement browser-style tab behavior in DXTabControl using StretchView

Subject: How to implement Excel documents' editing using the ASPxGridView control
Text:
Where I work, currently different departments are heavy users of Excel.  They all seem to gather their data from different systems (viewing reports, etc) and then enter that data into excel and then those spreadsheets get emailed out, etc.
I am looking at trying to create a more 'defined' approach.  I am the SQL DBA and working coming up with a data model that will allow me to model much of their different excel spreadsheets so that in a web page they could view that excel's specific format in a ASPXGridView.
Example.  Once spreadsheet may have 5 columns and 10 rows but the rows are grouped by a particular header, etc.  I get the basic concept of how I would do this in ASPxGridView (grouping, etc) but I was also considering making the data customizable.  So that through an admin web page they can define the Column header names, group names, etc.
Are there any example or other information you could point me in to maybe help me not go done wrong path way?  I am good on the SQL side of things.  I believe I can structure the data in a normalized format, etc.  Just concerned on just how much flexibility I can have on the ASPXGridView side of things.
Any advice?
Thanks

Subject: How to implement the drag-and-drop to re-order and drop rows onto an external control
Text:
We have implemented GridDragDropManager behavior in the grid extentions library. This attached behavior allows you to include the drag and drop support in your application more easily than the old approach.


This description is actual only for versions earlier than 12.1.:

The following example demonstrates how to implement the drag-and-drop capability to allow end-users to do the following:

1. re-order grid rows;

2. drag any grid row from a grid and drop it onto an external control.


To accomplish this task, it is necessary to set the GridView.AllowDrop property to True and handle its PreviewMouseDown, PreviewMouseMove, DragOver, and Drop events as shown in this example.

Subject: How to migrate from ASPxDashboardViewer to ASPxDahboard in the ViewerOnly mode
Text:
Our Web Dashboard continues to evolve and with v17.1, are ready  to completely replace the previously available Dashboard Viewer. The DevExpress Web Dashboard is now significantly faster, provides a rich client-side API for comprehensive dashboard customization, and supports Designer/Viewer or Viewer Only modes. We are planning to stop supporting the old Viewer in the near future and highly recommend to use the Web Dashboard instead.

This KB article shows you how to migrate from the old viewer to the Web Dashboard control in your application.

Subject: How to prevent TagBox from changing its value
Text:
Hello:
1) I'm handling the valueChanged event of the dxTagbox and perform the necessary service calls to update the database.
2) If the service returns any error and the value cannot be updated in the database for any reason, I have to reset the values in the dxTagBox like below.
e.component.option('value', e.previousValue);3) The problem now is that the above line of code obviously raises the valueChanged event of the dxTagbox again and the service method is again called and it goes in an infinite loop. 

4) I therefore have to use additional variables in the component to prevent this infinite loop from happening and it makes more work.

So, my questions/suggestions:
a) Is there any other way I can reset the value without getting into the infinite loop and the use of additional variables?
b) Suggestion: It will be helpful if we have a valueChanging event for the dxTagBox and have the option to cancel as below:
e.cancel = true;Please let me know.

Thank you in advance for your help.

Subject: How to reuse XAF Audit Trail module functionality in a non-XAF ASP.NET application
Text:
The Audit Trail module is used in the eXpressApp Framework to write changes made by users into a separate table. This module is defined in a separate assembly, and it is possible to use it outside XAF. This example demonstrates how to use this module in an ASP.NET application.

Note: To use the Audit Trail module, it is still necessary to have a DXperience Universal Subscription.

See Also:
Audit Trail Module Overview
How to use XAF Audit Trail module outside XAF
How to track changes made to persistent objects, and write them into a separate table

All works as expected.


But.. half of classes, has absolutely other behavior.. but was developed for same use.
In this case - when I change row in the grid - dasource still has old row pointer.
When I add new row to the datasource, the focused row in Grid not changed, and new row appears somewhere at the bottom of the grid, but never focused.

I spend couple days and still can't find the solution, but I found difference in call stack!

In bad case, after ColumnView.DoChangeFocusedRowInternal() - RaiseFocusedRowChanged happens.. and row pointers are not synchronized.

In good case after ColumnView.DoChangeFocusedRowInternal() - XtaGrid.Views.GridView.DoChangeFocusedRow happens - all all works fine as expected.

I add the stack pictures.. Picture 1 (BAD) ... Picture 2 (GOOD)

Any idea.. why same developed classes somethiems works fine.. sometimes not

Subject: How to update a particular cell or row when db trigger was executed

Hello dear specialists,
I have binding via Data source configuration wizard  and all is perfect: I can add/insert/modify data via grid control.


But there is one feature that bothers me: 
in my DB-table I have trigger "before-insert" generating GUID key for a unique field of the table.


so from my client in query I insert all the fields except that key field.
I do 
myTableAdapter.Update(myDataSet);


Surely I need to know the GUID in the key field immediately after insert-query is executed
and for this reason to get refreshed (by DB) data back each time I call:

myAdapter.Fill(myDataSet.table);

(I mean everytime if Update return 1)

But if there are many records in "select" so this scheme seems to me unreasonable.


could you give me a hint please how can I get round this stuff?
maybe there is another good way to handle with guid or smth like that?

Subject: How to update an underlying data source once a user clicks a check box
How to update custom themes after upgrading a project to a new version using ASPxThemeBuilder
Text:
If you have been actively using our ASP.NET components in your web applications for a long time, I am sure you encountered difficulties with updating a custom theme. This article will help you avoid these and thus save your time and booster productivity.
We introduce new features in all our major releases. Every new feature requires upgrading HTML markup of an ASP.NET control. As a result, CSS classes and styles are also modified according to changes made in the markup. This is not a problem if your application uses only default DevExpress themes. However, a custom theme created based on one of DevExpress themes should be upgraded manually. I would like to show you an approach that might help you make the process easier.

Subject: How to update custom themes after upgrading a project to a new version using ASPxThemeBuilder
Text:
If you have been actively using our ASP.NET components in your web applications for a long time, you probably cusotmized our themes for your needs. If you upgrade your custom theme to a new major version of our products,  you can encounter difficulties with new version control appearance. This article will help you avoid these and thus save your time and booster productivity.
We introduce new features in all our major releases. Every new feature requires upgrading HTML markup of an ASP.NET control. As a result, CSS classes and styles are also modified according to changes made in the markup. This is not a problem if your application uses only default DevExpress themes. However, a custom theme created based on one of DevExpress themes should be upgraded manually. I would like to show you an approach that might help you make the process easier.

Subject: How To: Implement Browser-style Tab Behavior in DXTabControl Using StretchView
Text: One of DXTabControl's supported views is TabControlStretchView. This view automatically stretches tab headers to all available space in the Tab Header Panel and allows dragging tabs in the browser-style manner. To control the dragging behavior, use the DragDropMode property. In addition to this functionality, TabControlStretchView allows pinning tabs to the right or left side of the Tab Header Panel. To pin a tab, use the TabControlStretchView.PinMode attached property.

Subject: How To: Implement Browser-style Tab Behavior in DXTabControl Using StretchView
Text: One of DXTabControl's supported views is TabControlStretchView.

Subject: How to: Implement conditional formatting for cells
Text: The following sample demonstrates how to change the appearance of grid cells in a certain column based upon some condition. For example, in this tutorial you can see that the background color of cells in the second column is gradually changed based on the value in this cell.

Subject: How to: Implement conditional formatting for cells
Text:
The following sample demonstrates how to change the appearance of grid cells in a certain column based upon some condition. For example, in this tutorial you can see that the background color of cells in the second column is gradually changed based on the value in this cell.

This is done by binding the Background property of a style, assigned to a column, to a color converter. This converter is represented by the ColorValueConverter class that implements the IValueConverter interface and returns a color based on the provided numerical value.

Update: Starting with version 14.1, there is no need to create custom styles. Instead, you can use the built-in Conditional Formatting mechanism to color cells.

Subject: How to: Implement conditional formatting for cells
Text:
The following sample demonstrates how to change the appearance of grid cells in a certain column based upon some condition. For example, in this tutorial you can see that the background color of cells in the second column is gradually changed based on the value in this cell.

This is done by binding the Background property of a style, assigned to a column, to a color converter. This converter is represented by the ColorValueConverter class that implements the IValueConverter interface and returns a color based on the provided numerical value.

Subject: If dxList contains dxSelectBox, onItemReordered has wrong fromIndex and toIndex
Text:
onItemReordered seems to fire with wrong from and to indexes under certain conditions.

Use this plunker to replicate the issue http://plnkr.co/edit/xSFeYdZf8yEYGPDufwqk
The plunker prints the indexes in the console log every time onItemReorder is fired, so keep the browser's javascript console open

Steps to replicate:
Case 1
- Open the browser console
- With the first select box select a product
- Drag the second list item up to place it above the first one
Otcome: the first element seems to disappear and the console shows fromIndex:3 and toIndex:2 that is not correct given a list of 2 elements.

Case 2
- Open the browser console
- With the first select box select a product
- With the second select box select the other product
- Delete both products (selecting the text and using backspace)
- Drag the second list item up to place it above the first one
Otcome: the first element seems to disappear, a hierarchyRequestError is returned

I'm quite sure there are other permutations of these operations that have the same effect but there's probably no point in listing them all if they have the same root cause.

It seems that in this case the order of paramers is the problem,becource of In pervasive query the parameters are not named same kind as in other databases.
If the used parameters are in the begin of the parameter list and in right order the query works, but in real life they are not.
Do you thing if you can do something about this?
This could be very helpful when needing complicated SQL queries.

Subject: Implement the ability to display group rows only for rows with 2 or more matching values
Text:
To enable this feature set the TableView.AllowPartialGrouping property to true.

With this option, grouped columns are always visible in the beginning of the GridControl.

Subject: Implement the ability to display group rows only for rows with 2 or more matching values
Text:
To enable this feature, set the TableView.AllowPartialGrouping property to true.

When this option is enabled, grouped columns are always visible within the group panel of the GridControl.

Subject: Implement the ability to hide group rows for groups that consist of a single row
Text:
To enable this feature set the TableView.AllowPartialGrouping property to true.

With this option, grouped columns are always visible in the beginning of the GridControl.

Hello,

I just want to make sure before I get started on going this path that pivot grids can be used for any types of data and that aggregations are not necessary.

For example, I have following data:

Subject,Visit, Collection Date
1,V1, 01/01/2018
1,V2, 01/15/2018
2,V1, 02/01/2018
2,V2, 02/20/2018

I would like the data transposed as follows:
Subject, V1, V2
1,01/01/2018,01/15/2018
2,02/01/2018,02/20/2018

Is this possible with pivot grid?

Thanks.

Subject: Import of CodeRush Classic settings disables Reorder Parameters refactoring shortcuts
