Subject: Improve the scaling of DevExpress controls and skinnable standard controls at high DPI settings (more than 96)
Text:
Hi,

I noticed, that when I have a skinned TcxCheckbox, it looks fine when view on regular 100% display scaling (96 DPI) but is displayed too small when viewed on 200% (192 DPI). So what is the preferred way to make a skinned TcxCheckbox (or TcxRadiobutton) look consistent independent of DPI scaling? (when skinning is deactivated, the control resizes as expected)

To create a sample, place a regular TCheckbox on a form with active skinning (I used skin 'Seven') and place a TcxCheckbox too. Then run on a system with 96DPI/100% and then on a system with 192DPI/200% and check the appearance.

Attached is a screenshot of what I can see on my systems.


best regards

Subject: Incorrect array iteration in _convertKey (data/odata/store.js)
Text:
Hello,

I've found an issue with deleting using when using the ODataContext and a composite key.  We always get E4014 even though the keys appear to be properly assigned. See example:

https://codesandbox.io/s/y7w93yl00v

The top grid uses an odata store config whereas the bottom using odatacontext, both fail.

Note: I'm currently using 18.1.7 but this issue replicates in the sample using 18.2.3

Thanks!
Mark

Subject: Incorrect array iteration in _convertKey (data/odata/store.js)
Text:
Hello,

I've found an issue with deleting using when using the ODataContext and a composite key.  We always get E4014 even though the keys are properly assigned.  If you remove the ODataContext from the equation everything works fine.  See example:

https://codesandbox.io/s/y7w93yl00v

You'll notice in the top grid the delete request is sent without issue whereas the bottom grid returns error E4014.

Note: I'm currently using 18.1.7 but this issue replicates in the sample using 18.2.3

Thanks!
Mark

Subject: iOS 6 Safari interprets CSS tules incorrectly
Text:
When rendering an input widget (dxTextBox and dxNumberBox) within a table that is part if a dxList item, the width of the input widget does not inherit from the parent table element.

Attached is a project that demonstrates this along with images of the result from both ios6 and ios7.

When you run the app, the first view shows tables of different widths, each table containing input widgets. These appear to have the correct widths.

Selecting the "View1" menu item shows a dxList containing a table of 10% width. The table contains input widgets.

The rendered input widgets are not resized to fit within the table elements.

The attached project is using version 14.1.4 of the framework but the version I am using is 13.2.8.14083 and this is the one I would like to correct (as I do not have time to switch (and retest) to the new framework).

Subject: It is impossible to access horizontal and vertical border settings of selection
Text:
Hi DevExpress,
I've created a dialog that allows me to set the inside horizontal and inside vertical border settings (line style and colours) for a multicell selection.
Prior to displaying said dialog from the popup context menu, I thought I would attempt to get the selection's current inside horizontal and vertical border settings so I could use them to initialise the dialog.

When I use the following code

Dim pCurrentSelection As Range = spreadEdit.Selection

This works:
Trace.WriteLine(pCurrentSelection.Borders.LeftBorder.LineStyle.ToString) eg prints 'None'

This gives an ugly error message:
Trace.WriteLine(pCurrentSelection.Borders.InsideHorizontalBorders.LineStyle.ToString)

So am I doing it correctly - how do you obtain the inside horizontal and vertical border settings for a selection?

Regards,
John.

Subject: It is not possible to set the ChartControlSettings.PivotGridDataSourceOptions.MaxAllowedSeriesCount property
Text:
Dear Support,

I implemented the charts integration with a pivot table as shown in 
http://demos.devexpress.com/MVCxPivotGridDemos/DataOutput/ChartsIntegration

Additionally I wanted to increase the displayed number of series which is by default limited to 10 series.
chart.PivotGridDataSourceOptions.MaxAllowedSeriesCount = 50;The result was an exception with this message:
The PivotGridDataSourceOptions.MaxAllowedSeriesCount property is available only if the chart's data source is a PivotGrid.

As I understand, the MVC extension does not bind the Pivot and the Chart by using the DataSourceID property but by creating some copy of the pivotgrid data and creating a decoupled data source. 

Is there a way in MVC to bind the pivot and the chart with charts DataSourceID ?
If not, is  there some way to increase the SeriesCount of the chart ?

Thanks in advance
Mike

Subject: Item settings restored with any of the LoadFrom~ methods are overridden by the settings of TAction objects linked to items
Text:
At runtime, our users can make items in a NavBar visible or not. These settings are saved in a INI-file.
If the TdxNavBarItem has a TAction, than it will always show after LoadFromIniFile.
A workaround is to save up the attached Action first, then call LoadFromIniFile and set the Action back for the visible items.

Subject: iTunes rejected DevExtreme package
Text:

I have created new version of my mobile app and submited in iTunes. My request was rejected. In attachment i provide app installation file.

Bellow is copy from apple review:

We discovered one or more bugs in your app when reviewed on iPad running iOS 9.1 and iPhone running iOS 9.1 on both Wi-Fi and cellular networks.

After launching the app, the splash screen appeared, but activity indicator spun infinitely. The content did not load.
We have attached screenshots to highlight the issue.

The steps to reproduce are:

1. Launch the app
2. The splash screen is displayed
3. The activity indicator is spinning infinitely.
4. The content is not loading.


Personaly I dont have iPhone running iOS 9.1, so I can not test on real device. I hope you can test and find quickly solution.

Subject: Layout - How to align checkboxes within a group (add more space at the left side) as other Property Editors in DetailView with a caption placeholder
Text:
Hello XAF Team,

In Web UI, checkboxes are aligned always at right by default, in detail views.

In Win UI, checkboxes will be aligned at left or at right, in detail views. For a complex detail view, this behavior looks ugly for end users.

Please see the attached simple VS2010 solution with a screenshot.

Regards,
James

Subject: Layout control - how to keep control bottom from sliding up and down when splitter is moved
Text:
Its hard to explain this question without seeing it so I created a video to demonstrate it: https://www.screencast.com/t/aXORhQyq79 

In words: I am using a LayoutControlGroup to manage the layout of a form and inside it have a vertical splitter control separating a PropertyGridControl control from the PropertyDescriptionControl.  When I move the splitter i want it to expand the Description and shrink the PropertyGrid.  It does that.  But when it expands the Description it also causes the bottom of the Description control to move.  I don't want that.  How do I arrange things so that the bottom of the control doesn't move when I move the splitter?

 private void layoutView_IV_CustomRowCellEdit(object sender, DevExpress.XtraGrid.Views.Layout.Events.LayoutViewCustomRowCellEditEventArgs e)
{
DataRowView currentRow = (DataRowView)layoutView_IV.GetRow(e.RowHandle);
if (e.Column.FieldName == "StartIV")
{

}
}
}

Thank you

Subject: LayoutView - When the MultiColumn Mode is used and the MaxCardColumns and MaxCardRows properties are set, cards are not arranged according to the maximal row count if a grid has a large width
Text:
Hi,

I have a Grid in LayoutView set to show 3x3 cards, but when I resize the window, the view changes to a list. I'm wondering if it's by design and if so I'd like to know why ?

To reproduce the behaviour, simply add a GridControl to any form. Set the properties OptionsMultiRecordMode.MaxCardColumns = 3, OptionsMultiRecordMode.MacCardRows = 3 and OptionsView.ViewMode = MultiColumn. Then, you only have to resize the designer window to witness the behavior I'm talking about in the 'Sample View'. If the window is small enough, the 3x3 matrix is visible as desired, but as soon as the window is enlarge sufficiently for a 4th card to fit on the 1st row, the view changes. Now only 1 row is visible, containing the cards of the 1st column.

By comparison, if you change the property OptionsView.ViewMode to MultiRows and resize the window, the behaviour is as I would expect. The 3x3 matrix stays the same no matter what.

Thanks in advance for any explanation.

Pierre-Denis

Subject: Lazy loaded modules break scrolling in SelectBox
Text:
Hi,

We are having a issue with every single DxSelectBox in our application. Every time we open a new feature module the scroll wheel in any DxSelectBox makes a bigger jump. Only the first time we open a feature module with a DxSelectBox the mouse wheel works as expected. After that, the number of items scrolled by a single scroll wheel movement increases every time a new feature module is loaded. With dozens of feature modules loaded a single scroll wheel movement moves the scroll straight to the end.

In our application we have a shared module where we export all the devextreme modules that we use. Every feature module in our application imports this shared module. Most of the feature modules are also lazy loaded and I think this is the root of the problem. I've made a simple sample application where I try to demonstrate this issue. If you remove lazy loading everything works as expected but with lazy loading enabled every feature module loaded increases the number of items scrolled by a single scroll wheel movement.


Best regards,
Pedro Ferreira

Subject: Legend - `getLayoutOptions` and `shift` methods work wrong
Text:
The `getLayoutOptions` method returns *width* and *height* which are not equal (both greater) to actual width and height of legend.
Width and height should be measured at legend's border.

The `shift` method considers top-left corner of the first square symbol as the origin of the legend.
It should consider top-left corner of the border as the origin.

Also method should be renamed - *shift* means *relative movement* rather than *absolute positioning* (which actually happens).

Subject: List - The search box loses focus when the elementAttr option is specified
Text:
I found bug in search editor connected to DxList.
When you use DxList normally with search box it works fine, until you want to add class to style this search box. 
Adding <dxo-search-editor-options [elementAttr]="{ class: 'someclazz' }"></dxo-search-editor-options>to <dx-list></dx-list> tag totally breaks search box - after entering character, list is refreshed and with it, searchbox is removed from DOM and recreated from scratch resulting in losing focus from input element.

When you remove [elementAttr] part everything gets back to normal.

To reproduce you can go to: https://js.devexpress.com/Demos/WidgetsGallery/Demo/List/ListWithSearchBar/Angular/Light/
and paste given code above <div *dxTemplate="let data of 'item'">
in app.component.html

and try to filter items on list.

Is there any, working way to add class to the search editor?

Subject: List of critical vulnerabilities found and solved in DevExpress ASP.NET products
Text: For several last years we discovered several vulnerabilities in our ASP.NET WebForms controls. Some of them affects MVC Extensions too. This article lists the vulnerabilities with some additional details.

Subject: ListViewProcessCurrentObjectController - Throw a more descriptive exception when an object to be shown in a DetailView cannot be found in the target ObjectSpace
Text: ListViewProcessCurrentObjectController.ShowObject may call Application.CreateDetailView with an empty object, which leads to ArgumentNullException. This happens when the original object is saved within the nested object space only but the target object space is not a nested object space, and also when the object is non-persistent.

Subject: LookupEdits Embedded in FlyoutPanel Disappear When Columns Are Defined without field names
Text:

When using a FlyoutPanel control, if I embed two lookup edits in the control and manually define the columns for both (defaulting to the .ToString representation), the second lookup edit control added disappears from view and cannot be interacted with.

Essentially, the dataset which is returned from the method I use to populate the lookup edits is a little richer than I need. I'd like to reduce the number of columns to a single column, that of the .ToString representation of the objects in the list I use for data binding. I am using the LookUpEdit Task window to access the column editor to define that column, binding it to the value I want to display and clearing out FieldName to force it to use that representation. This works, but if I try to follow the same pattern for a second column only one of the controls appears on the flyout panel. 

The attached project demonstrates this behavior using a Dictionary.

Desired Behavior
To have both controls appear with the defined columns.

Regards,
Magnus

Subject: Make individual columns optionally unaffected by the View's OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth property setting
Text:
See the Column widths design question ticket. The width of such columns should:

 - be sizable by the end user;
 - not affected by the <View>.OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth property value.

Subject: Make individual columns optionally unaffected by the View's OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth property setting
Text:
See the Column widths design question ticket. The width of such columns should:

 - be sizable by the end user;
 - not affected by the <GridView>.OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth property.

Subject: Menu - How to force opening a sub-menu in code (the hover event)
Text:
Hello,

I tried to open a dxMenu bind with knockout programmatically, but without success.

How can I open a dxMenu?

Background:
I create a dx Menu with placeholder content (items) and after I click on it I want to make an ajax call and rebuild the dxMenu.

User sees the dxMenu for a short time and after that it closes (because it will be rendered again ).

Subject: Misplaced Row when showing grid's Print Preview
Text:
Hello

Please see attachment

The ribbon print preview of this xtragrid shows a misplaced row under certain circunstances:

- The OS is Windows Server 2012 R2  (not happening on Server 2008 R2 / Windows 7)
- The grouping level is two (not hapenning when grouping is one or three columns)
- The Style is "Windows XP Theme"  (not hapenning when style is  Style3D or any DX Skin)

I think that what's happening is that the last row of the first page doesn't fit, or barely fits at the bottom. But the print preview miscalculates this and places this in a nonsense position.

I think that varying some arbitrary parameters like the cited before (OS, skin, grouping level...) affects some of the calculated heights by the print preview and the positioning calculation goes all right in that case.

Subject: Multi-thread support in DevExpress controls
Text:
We are trying to add support for binding to concurrent lists. We can achieve this quite easily by using BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization on our concurrent lists. This works great with our non-DevEx WPF controls. However, it doesn't work with our DevEx controls due to the implementation of DevExpress.Xpf.Core.Native.SyncCollectionHelper (in our case, used by DevExpress.Xpf.Core.ItemsAttachedBehaviorCore). SyncCollectionHelper only supports ILockable, which doesn't work for us because our custom collection implementations are in assemblies that know nothing of UI, and ILockable only exists in DevExpress.Xpf.Core. Is it possible add support for a custom collection synchronization callback similar to BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization and BindingOperations.AccessCollection?

Also, SyncCollectionHelper.SyncCollection doesn't guarantee a call to BeginPopulate/EndPopulate, resulting in non-thread-safe access to the target collection.

Subject: NavBarControl  - Provide the capability to automatically select the first or last clicked item in NavBar when a user changes groups
Text:
Guys,

The control designer forms new look is great, but I really cannot congratulate you on choosing an Outlook-styled navigation pane to browse through features. This control is perfect in Outlook because it brings up a contextual helper panel for the selected group. In your designers though, it's merely a treeview substitute, where only one node can be opened at a time.

This is especially unefficient considering most of your designers groups only contains one or two elements. Not only this results in a lot of wasted space, it also makes moving back and forth between designer pages often requiring a second click that shouldn't be necessary.

If you really insist on keeping that awkward navigation paradygm, would you please at least make it so that when clicking a group, it's first element gets automatically selected? That would already be a lot better.

Thanks.

Subject: NavBarGroup content is not properly measured when NavBarControl is located within LayoutControl
Text:
We have developed a customizable layout control that allows the user to drag and drop different widgets onto a LayoutControl and move them around using the built in customization window provided by the LayoutControl. This control has the ability to save and serialize the layout of all the widgets so when the user loads the control all of the layout is preserved and displayed properly. The issue that we discovered is one of the widgets contains a NavBar control that when center aligned horizontally squishes the content within the NavBarGroup. 

I have attached a sample solution in order to illustrate the issue. The sample is a very simple illustration of this control. Note this did work in our previous version of the DevExpress toolkit (13.1.8).

The steps to see the issue are as follows.
1. Select the two widgets on the right.
2. Click the button to group them from the customization window.
3. Select the widget with the NavBar control.
4. Click the button to Center align the widget horizontially.
5. Issue is visible - notice that the content does not take the entire space.

This is a critical issue for our customers and a solution needs to be supplied as soon as possible. 

Thanks,
Nick

Subject: NullReferenceException thrown when editing an XPCollection item in DXPropertyGrid
Text:
Hello,
recently I have come across an interesting issue. I have some XPO objects which I am trying to display in WPF property grid. Everything works fine until I call the Save() method upon the XPO object. After it, null reference exception is often thrown from XtraVerticalGrid .

I could not find the direct source of the exception, so I started to debug DevExpress dlls and came to this conclusion:

After the XPBaseObject is saved, PropertyChanged is fired like this:

TriggerObjectChanged(new ObjectChangeEventArgs(Session, this, ObjectChangeReason.Reset));

this event continues to DevExpress.Xpo.PersistentBase.TriggerObjectChanged() method where reason "Reset" is changed to call RaisePropertyChangedEvent(null);

the code further bubbles threw call stack (see the picture attached) up to the DevExpress.XtraVerticalGrid.Data.FieldNameHelper.GetFieldName() method where propertyName parameter is passed as null, and therefore null reference exception is thrown.


Is that really a mis-conception between WPF property grid and XPO, or am I just using the assemblies incorrectly?

Thanks for your reply

Jan

Subject: OBSOLETE - ASPxGridView - creating external filter with the ASPxTextBox and highlighting search text
Text:
UPDATED:

Starting with version 14.2, GridView provides the built-in Search / Find Panel functionality with the capability to locate it outside grid boundaries. This allows accomplishing a similar task with less effort and does not require so much extra code. See the ASP.NET Data Grid: Enhancements post to learn more about this new functionality.

The DevExpress ASP.NET controls collection provides a valuable control that allows creating filter expressions - ASPxFilterControl. This control is irreplaceable for advanced users who require to have a tool with rich functionality.
However, this control may be hard to understand for beginners, and they may require a traditional search textbox with the submit button.
This example illustrates how to use this textbox for grid filtering.

See also:
E4029: ASPxTreeList - How to create an external filter with the ASPxTextBox and highlighting search text

Subject: OBSOLETE - ASPxGridView - creating external filter with the ASPxTextBox and highlighting search text
Text:
The DevExpress ASP.NET controls collection provides a valuable control that allows creating filter expressions - ASPxFilterControl. This control is irreplaceable for advanced users who require to have a tool with rich functionality.
However, this control may be hard to understand for beginners, and they may require a traditional search textbox with the submit button.
This example illustrates how to use this textbox for grid filtering.

See also:
E4029: ASPxTreeList - How to create an external filter with the ASPxTextBox and highlighting search text

Subject: OBSOLETE - CSS corrections for well-known CSS frameworks (Twitter Bootstrap)
Text:
Twitter Bootstrap v3.X:

Starting with version 13.2.7, all existing CSS corrections for Twitter Bootstrap v3.X are included in the DevExpress source code.


Twitter.Bootstrap v2.3.X:

Starting with version 13.1.8, all existing CSS corrections for Twitter Bootstrap v2.3.X are included in the DevExpress source code.


Most well-known CSS frameworks contain CSS rules that globally apply styles for different HTML elements. These CSS rules may implicitly affect the other 3-rd party (such as DevExpress) controls/widgets, which are obviously derived from standard HTML elements. As a result, there may be CSS conflicts between framework styles and DevExpress default styles.

Subject: OBSOLETE - CSS corrections for well-known CSS frameworks (Twitter Bootstrap)
Text: Most well-known CSS frameworks contain CSS rules that globally apply styles for different HTML elements. These CSS rules may implicitly affect the other 3-rd party (such as DevExpress) controls/widgets, which are obviously derived from standard HTML elements. As a result, there may be CSS conflicts between framework styles and DevExpress default styles.

http://localhost:9000/odata/Canvasses?%24orderby=DepartureDate+desc%2CNumber&%24top=50&%24expand=Salesperson%2CStatus&%24filter=((DepartureDate+ge+datetime%272014-12-11%27)+and+(DepartureDate+lt+datetime%272014-12-12%27))&%24inlinecount=allpages

I define the column as
{ allowFiltering: true, dataField: "DepartureDate", caption: "Tanggal", dataType: "date", format: "shortDate", width: 120, alignment: 'center', sortIndex: 0, sortOrder: 'desc' } The service return DepartureDate as ISO8061 string.
"DepartureDate":"2014-12-04T01:49:54+07:00"Does dxDataGrid filter row support filter on DateTimeOffset ?

Thanks.

Subject: ODataStore does not support case-insensitive filters
Text:
Hi,

I am building a Basic DXTREME Application and I'm using ODataStore as datasource for my dxlists. I filter my ODatastore as described in your documentation at this link http://help.devexpress.com/DevExtreme/Documentation/Howto/Data_Stores#Data_Stores_Advanced_Queries_Filter
It's working but I wonder how to make operators "startswith" and "contains" to be case-insensitive.
Reading OData documentation I discovered that there are functions like tolower and toupper that may help but I don't know how to apply these functions to filter operators.
Could you provide me an example on how to filter an ODataStore using "startswith" and "contains" operators in case-insensitive way?
Thank you

Subject: Out of the box mobile compatibility of DevExtreme
Text:
Hi All,
 
We're running into some issues with the out of the box compatibility of Dev Extreme, as well as clear presentation of styles on desktop as well.
Basically all of the built in styles are failing our usability testing as a result, and material themes are especially deficient in the way of clarity. Going forward, we're looking for more of a way to minimize customization for basic usability. Very simply a theme must pass the squint test to pass our usability testing. When you create any kind of visible control that has a low opacity, even if it's for a disabled control that is visible, people still need to be able to see it clearly, and currently cannot with your themes.  I'd really suggest consulting with a person who can q/a your controls from a readability perspective and run with these as well as standard ARIA recommendations.
 
Thanks,
 
-David

Subject: ParametrizedAction with confirmation message is called twice when executed using ENTER key
Text:
Steps to reproduce:

1) Run standard DX FeatureCenter XAF application
2) Choose Actions->Parametrized Action navigation item
3) Go to "Confirmation Message" tab
4) Fill in any parameter when confirmation message is defined (or use the default one with text: "Do you really want to do it?")
5) Press ENTER key
6) When confirmation dialog is opened press ENTER to confirm action.
7) ... now action is executed again :(

Subject: Performance issue when using ODataConventionModelBuilder with DevExpress MVC Libraries
Text:
Hello,

I've encoutered a performance issue when using OData with DevExpress MVC Libraries.

I've created a very basic ASP.NET MVC web application. The only code I've added is located in Startup.cs, and it does iterate 10 times through the creation of an EdmModel using the ODataConventionModelBuilder. A breakpoint on the surrounding Stopwatch shows that this process is pretty slow. 

However, if I remove the reference to DevExpress.Web.v16.1 in the project, and remove the DLL file '\bin\DevExpress.Web.v16.1.dll' from disk, then the execution of the exact same code is getting much faster.

There are actually no dependencies betwee n these libraries, so I find it odd that adding a single reference could slow down code execution in this case.

Could you please try to have a look ?

Best Regards,
PN.

Subject: Performance Issues with 500 rows per page
Text:
Hello Devexpress support team,

In our application, we are showing grid with 500 rows per page. Apart from grid, there are few dropdowns and textboxes on the page.

It was working fine when it was 10 rows per page, but after changing to 500 rows per page, it is taking too much time.
We observed that, in Internet Explorer 11, there are 7 requests having the URL DXR.axd which is consuming more than 10 seconds, and the size of those files is around 7 MB.
For Google Chrome, the loading time is almost the same, but the size of the all the DXR files is around 1.2 MB.
Due to this, every request which shows grid is consuming more than 10 seconds only for Devexpress.
Can you please suggest the measures which will improve the performance>

We are using the default devexpress theme.
We have the following in the web.config:
<compression enableHtmlCompression="false" enableCallbackCompression="true" enableResourceCompression="true"

enableResourceMerging="true" />

We changed enableHtmlCompression from "false" to "true", but there is no change in the file size or downloading time.

Regards,
Sachin

Subject: PersistenceBehavior - Does not correctly restore grid columns' visibility when StoreChildLayouts=True
Text:
PersistenceBehavior.StoreChildLayouts=True

Run the form.
Hide any grid column
Restart the form.
The hidden column is visible again.

If you set StoreChildLayouts=Default, the previously hidden grid column remains hidden after the form restarts.

Subject: PivotGrid - How to calculate custom total
Text:
Hi, 

In our application, we added a custom report, where user can create their own pivot grid, user get to select which fields to group and display in the grid and also be able to add custom field from expression field /custom formula. The issue with the custom fields is that the total(sum) result after grouping sometimes is not as expected, as explained in attached image.
User has created a custom field [test] with a formula (estimated cost column/ network measure column). Please be note that the formula is not fixed, users can come up with any formula, so we cannot incorporate the formula in the program, but their purpose is to derive value from total of field1 and total of field2 from their grouping, and then apply the formula, in this case is total cost divided by total network measure per grouping. 
The expected [test] field total sum grouped by 'Floor 1' is 7.14. However what the pivot grid has resulted is the the sum of the custom fields. 
Is there a way to fix this? Appreciate your help. Thank you

Subject: Print Dialog - Printer preferences are not saved for certain printers
Text:
Dear DevExpress Team,

we do have a problem with WPF PdfViewerControl with printing.

We use it for label printing with a Brother QL-570. And i tested it with default Win 8.1 driver and newest brother original drivers. 

Problem:

Pressing the print button to get to Printer Settings. Then we have to pick the Printer and adjust the preferences of that printer. To adjust size and stuff.
And this settings will not be saved and only partially used.

Especially for custom settings like fixed with and custom length. It will have effects like e.g. setting a different custom length that it will still be print with default length but twice. And if we go back and forth the setting is always reset to default values.. usually your settings will be saved there.

Opening that created pdf with any other pdf reader and everything works as expected.

As of now we don't use PdfViewerControl for PrintPreview and open it with the installed default pdf reader, because of that problem.. however this not a ideal situation

Any ideas or solutions?

I also installed the newest version to test it, if it is already fixed. But it did not work properly there, too.

Subject: Printing XtraReport, doesn't reflect Paper Kind, Page margins setup on the report.
Text:
I am using ReportViewer MVC extension for displaying and printing a report. I have set up PaperKind (for example. Letter/Legal) and Page margins (10px, 10px, 10px, 10px) on the XtraReport which are displayed correctly when displayed on-screen. Narayan

Subject: PrintPreview displays the transparent background of watermarks as black
Text:
HI,

i updated to the latest devexpress controls version and found that the watermark i use ('Confidential' text) is no longer transparent (see attachment). the 'old' version still works as before using the same code.

Dim vShape As Shape = vsubHeader.Shapes.InsertTextBox(vsubHeader.Range.End)
vShape.TextBox.Document.AppendText("Confidential")
' Header
Dim cp As CharacterProperties = vShape.TextBox.Document.BeginUpdateCharacters(vShape.TextBox.Document.Range)
cp.FontName = "Segoe UI"
cp.FontSize = 70
cp.ForeColor = Color.LightGray
Dim measureFont As New Font(cp.FontName, cp.FontSize.Value)
vShape.TextBox.Document.EndUpdateCharacters(cp)
vShape.RotationAngle = -45
Dim sizeInPixels As Size = TextRenderer.MeasureText("Confidential", measureFont)
vShape.Size = New SizeF(Units.PixelsToDocumentsF(sizeInPixels.Width, vRichEdit.DpiX), Units.PixelsToDocumentsF(sizeInPixels.Height, vRichEdit.DpiY))
vShape.Offset = New PointF(CLng(vSection.Page.Width) \ 2 - CLng(vShape.Size.Width) \ 2, CLng(vSection.Page.Height) \ 2 - CLng(vShape.Size.Height) \ 2)
vSection.EndUpdateHeader(vsubHeader)

thank you.

Subject: Provide a way to calculate Unbound Fields at the summary level
Text:
We have a data set which contains highly normalised data - there is only a single numerical column, and the meaning of that column is defined in other columns. For example, we have mineral content and total mass as separate metrics, and we would use the metric name as column headings in the pivot grid. However, customers do not think in terms of mineral content - they always talk in terms of mineral grade, in parts per million - so it is imperative that we are able to report those values. One way around this is to generate cross tab views, with calculated fields to determine the grades, but this is no good for data in pivot tables because you cannot simply sum the grades when the pivot aggregates multiple rows. The calculation must be done on the aggregated content & total fields.

At the moment, the closest thing you have is pie charts, but they are only useful for values in the percentage range, not for parts per million.

Please please please, will you consider adding a mechanism for calculated columns, where the value in a column is calculated based on the values shown in other cells on the same row. This is a really important issue for our customers - it's a potential deal maker / breaker.

Subject: Provide a way to display Percentage values in Pivot Grid and other items
Text:
I have a question that I'm not sure there is an answer for (but I'm hoping there is!)

When using the great new Dashboard component, I have hit a problem I have had before with grids and pivot grids, and have resolved the problem with custom summary functions, but with Dashboard its more problematical. I'm talking about aggregated summary values.

Lets suppose I have a data source that give me the sale value of a product and its cost price at the time of the sale. To get the margin on the sale price I use the following formula:
((salePrice - costePrice) * 100) / salePrice This is fine individually, but once I aggregate the value on a monthly basis, I need the sum of the salePrice's and the sum of the costePrice's to make the calculation valid.

My question is: how can I achieve this on a 'general' aggregation basis?

The user may wish to aggregate but month of the sale, the quarter , by department etc. so I can't put calculated margins for all these criteria.

Your help would be appreciated.

Regards,
Martin.

I'm developing a solution and intend on using the radial menu as part of the UI for this. I hope it's me not having found the correct property and not a limitation of one of the nicest menu interfaces I've come across!

Thanks,
Tom

TdxCustomRichEditControl

    function IsSelectionInHeader: Boolean;

Subject: Provide public functions that identify which document area/object is currently being edited or is selected
Text: With VCL 15.2, we expanded the Rich Edit control with the IsSelectionInHeader, IsSelectionInFooter, IsSelectionInHeaderOrFooter, and IsSelectionInTextBox functions allowing you to identify in which document area or object the selection (caret) is currently located. In addition, with the control's new IsFloatingObjectSelected function, you can identify if a floating object (picture or text box) is selected.

Provide the capability to display a visible signature
Text:
Hi,

PDF Viewer does not show the signature of a PDF that is digitally signed.

In the attached file, you can see a print screen of TEST.PDF in Acrobat Reader and in a simple form using PDF Viewer (the digitally signed PDF is also included).

The PDF file was created exporting a form letter (generated with XtraReports) to PDF.
Since XtraPrinting can sign a document, but there is no options to make the signature visible (I had created a different ticket on this subject Q534202), or to use a time stamp server, I use a diferent library to sign the PDF.

After that the signed PDF is either sent to the customer by email or printed to be sent by postal mail - and this is my problem: since the "printed-on-paper" document is in fact the copy of a digitally signed document my customer requires that the physical document has a "printed" signature that relates to the digital signature.

I was expecting to use PDF viewer to provide the printing engine to this task - but without the signature beeing visible, I can't use it.

Subject: Provide the capability to use the Numpad dot as a decimal separator with the "\R." regex patter when the system decimal separator is comma
Text:
Hello.

RegEx pattern \R. doesn't allow to use numpad dot as decimal separator if system's decimal separator is comma.

Expected behavior: pattern \R. should allow to use comma, dot or numpad dot as decimal separator disregarding system's decimal separator.

Why: numeric mask "n" works exactly this way.

A perfect solution for me would be to be able to emulate Numeric "n" mask with some RegEx mask.

Here is xaml on which problem can be demonstrated.

    <StackPanel>
        <dxe:TextEdit Margin="20" MaskType="RegEx" Mask="[0-9]+\R.[0-9]+" />
        <dxe:TextEdit Margin="20" MaskType="Numeric" Mask="n" />
    </StackPanel>

What I'm trying to achieve - I want user to be able to type something like 1k to enter a thousand or 1m to enter a million, so I need a Regex mask like [0-9]+\R.[0-9]+(k|m)+

 Thanks,
Best regards

Text:

I'm researching DevExtereme React Grid to see if it is a viable grid solution for use with medium to big data. I've found this this ticket: 

https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/T658592/react-grid-virtual-scrolling-with-a-remote-data-source

One comment is:

I have informed our R&D team regarding the importance of this functionality. Please feel free to contact us at any time. We will be happy to help you.

This feature is also important to me. Can I have an update about this functionality? What's the status, is it in progress? Is there a release data / roadmap for it?

Subject: Refactorings - Accept the variable name when using declare local
Text:
When I declare local the new variable name is selected / highlighted but my natural response is to hit Enter, to accept the name and move the caret to the next line. However what happens is that the variable name is replaced by a new line and the assignment moves to the following line. I then need to Ctrl+Z, End, Return (or navigate to the next line). This is not a great flow and I'm sure not how the feature should work... 

Ideally I want to type 
new MyRepository(dbContext);
 then invoke CRR, declare local (already at the top of the list), hit return to get
var [myRepository] = new MyRepository(dbContext);Where the value in square brackets is the suggested variable name. 
Then hit Return to continue

Subject: Refactorings - The "Move Type To File" refactoring inserts an unnecessary empty line
Text:
1. Say that I have a file Foo.cs with classes Foo and Bar.
2. I apply Move Type to File on class Bar.
3. I get a new document Bar.cs.

I am missing the ability to press ESC at this point to return to file Foo.cs, at the point where class Bar was before the refactoring.

Getting back to Foo.cs, I have now an empty line as a leftover of class Bar having been extracted:

Before:

namespace X
{
    public class Foo
    {
    }
    public class Bar
    {
    }
}

After:

namespace X
{
    public class Foo
    {
    }
    <-- leftover here after extraction
}

Subject: RefreshStateMachineActionItems throws exception after state transition
Text:
Dear Support

We are getting an "object reference not set to an instance of an object" error every time when a transition is completed via the dashboard. The transition would have been completed successfully.

We tried debugging the issue but it doesn't seem to coming from our custom code. It appears to be coming from a standard method called "RefreshStateMachine".

I have attached a sample application & database which is producing the same error. The application is a stripped version of the actual project. It doesn't have any View Controllers and we removed the majority of the classes. To reproduce the error follow the full steps in the attachment, in summary being:

1. Run the Web Application
2. Create and save a new record from the grid on the dashboard
3. Click the button titled "Status 2 (Operation 1)" which will make a transition to another status
4. The transition will go through successfully but you will get the above mentioned error just above the dashboard

We are close to project go-live and the customer has suspended user training until we resolve this issue. It is very urgent and your usual prompt response will be greatly appreciated.

Subject: Report designer constantly freezes with the ContextSwitchDeadlock error
Text:
Report designer constantly freezes when working with fields.
Any suggestions on i can collect more info what is causing this?

ContextSwitchDeadlock occurred
Message: Managed Debugging Assistant 'ContextSwitchDeadlock' has detected a problem in 'C:\Dev\src\rm\rm.Win\bin\Debug\rm.Win.exe'.
Additional information: The CLR has been unable to transition from COM context 0x10966c0 to COM context 0x1096608 for 60 seconds. The thread that owns the destination context/apartment is most likely either doing a non pumping wait or processing a very long running operation without pumping Windows messages. This situation generally has a negative performance impact and may even lead to the application becoming non responsive or memory usage accumulating continually over time. To avoid this problem, all single threaded apartment (STA) threads should use pumping wait primitives (such as CoWaitForMultipleHandles) and routinely pump messages during long running operations.

Subject: Report Parameters in a calculated field's expression have invalid prefixes in detail collections whose caption is localized
Text:
Hi,

it seems like an old bug has returned in 15.1:
https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/Q588421

Parameters within lists are prefixed on each edit, i.e. [Parameters.parameter1] is changed to [AssignedTasks.Parameters.parameter1] and so on.

To reproduce:
- Open Main Demo
- Copy and edit the Contacts report
- add a Parameter
- add a calculated field to "Assigned Tasks"
- edit the Expression and insert the Parameter created previously
- Close and re-open the Expression Editor -> [Parameters.parameter1] in the Expression is now [AssignedTasks.Parameters.parameter1]

Best regards,

Gerhard

Subject: RepositoryItem- When the ExportMode property is set to Default and the editor is bound to an unsupported type, this property value should be treated as DisplayText
Text: When RepositoryItem.ExportMode is set to ExportMode.Default and the editor is bound to an unsupported type, it should be treated as ExportMode.DisplayText. Otherwise, many standard values are exported as "#VALUE!" (e.g. Char, Guid, enums, etc.)

Subject: RepositoryItem.ExportMode - When this property is set to ExportMode.Default and the editor is bound to an unsupported type, this property value should be treated as ExportMode.DisplayText
Text: When RepositoryItem.ExportMode is set to ExportMode.Default and the editor is bound to an unsupported type, it should be treated as ExportMode.DisplayText. Otherwise, many standard values are exported as "#VALUE!" (e.g. Char, Guid, enums, etc.)

When we upgraded to DevExpress 17.2.7 we found a difference in behaviour of the RepositoryItemColorPickEdit  control.

Problem2: Color sequence in RepositoryItemColorPickEdit also changed.

Is this a DevExpress bug? OR There is a change because of which we should change our code to increase the width by about 10 pixels to make it work as before?

See screenshot for details.

Subject: ResourcesTree incorrectly expands/collapses nodes after switching from GanttView to MonthView
Text:
Hello:

I've come across a pretty strange issue with the ResourceTree in association with the scheduler control. Attached I have provided a very simple solution that uses the ribbon, scheduler control and resourcetree. It would seem when collapsing the the nodes in the resource tree while in the gantt view, after switching back to the month view, the collapse/expand feature of the tree becomes erratic. To reproduce the behavior please follow the steps below:

1. Run the winforms app
2. Observe the expanded tree on the left
3. Switch to the gantt view
4. Collapse the root node
5. Switch to the month view
6. Observe the root node is still collapsed (works as expected)
7. Expand the root node (works as expected)
8. Collapse the "A" node (works as expected)
9. Expand the "A" node => At this point it collapses the root node and from here the tree does not work as expected as it never expands the child nodes and always collapses the root node

If you would like a video please let me know. Some of our users have very detailed complex trees and this behavior is pretty painful even though it seems small.

I am using a dxList with itemTemplates.

The value in one of the element of the itemTemplate is a computed value depending on selected value of a date by the end user. In short, I am calculating the days between two different dates when the values for the dates are selected.

On the click of a button I need the values of the Date and the Difference in Days between the dates.

Please have a look at the following URL https://codepen.io/anon/pen/oEdmxJ to get a better understanding of what I have implemented and what my requirement is.

Do kindly let me know how I can get the values of the dates and the difference on click of a button.

Regards,
Jay

Subject: RibbonControl – How to show hints for the context popup menu’s items
Text:
I have a 'static tooltip' screen area that displays tooltips when the user hovers over the controls, replacing the standard popup tooltips. My form has a ToolTipController, ribbon control with its popup controller set to TooltipContainer1, and a PopupMenu which is associated with the ribbon control. In the 'BeforeShow' event of the TooltipController, I divert the e.SuperTip to my own 'Static' tooltip control and use e.Show=False to prevent the popup tooltips from being displayed. This all works great.

My problem is with the popup menu's SuperTips - They are not being displayed (which is the behaviour I want), but I can't trap them in the ToolTipController_BeforeShow event as it is not fired when the mouse hovers over the popup menu items, and there isn't an option to set up a ToolTipController for the popup menu.

Can you please suggest a way to add functionality to the popup menu items' mouseenter or mousehover etc. events so that I can manipulate the tooltip.

Thanks,
Richard

Subject: RibbonForm blinks when resizing a popup window
Text:

We have found an issue with the Painting of a ribbon form,  when you call a popup edit control. 

To reproduce the issue

2) Resize the form, extend to the right.
3) Then go to the DataField and bring up the summary filter popup window.

You will see that some of the form blanks out. We were able to reproduce this also by adding a popup edit control to the toolbar.

I have attached an example. This is preventing our upgrade to DevExpress 2014.

I look forward to hearing your response.

Subject: RichEdit - How to implement an advanced mail merge
Text:
Hi,

We are looking for an online template editor that can create PDF, Docx and HTML files.
It should be possible to:
- replace fields (simple mail merge)
- find customer defined placeholders, so we can add something like {IF condition THEN}.a.{ELSE}.b.{END} to the document and depending on the condition we can show the content a or b specified in the document .
- have master detail mail merge.

Can this be done using the Richtext editor in the MVC suite together with the document automation suite ? 

The goal is to give our user an easy to use editor to create a template. Based on this template we want to create docx files (newsletters, ...), pdf files (invoices to be send to their customers) and html files (information to be send by email).

I have about 2 weeks to investigate this and create a prototype for my manager. 

Thanks.

Best regards,

Luk
Belgium

Subject: RichEdit - Turkish text is encoded incorrectly when reading text from a database
RichEdit Control Report Link - The "Canvas does not allow drawing" exception occurs on printing certain large documents
Text:
Our application uses the RichEditControl to create a custom Rich Editor. Our tester found an issue when printing documents that contain multiple pages. One of our reports generates > 150 pages and when they try to print this report the program crashes. During debugging it gives an error of "Project LSRichEditor.exe raised exception class EInvalidOperation with message 'Canvas does not allow drawing'.". After getting stuck trying to find the cause I decided to try the demo project supplied with the RichEditor code. This also gives the same error when printing the document. I then opened the document in Word to verify that the RTF is fine and it prints correctly in Word. This happens when printing to a physical printer, printing to PDF, as well as just previewing the document. 
I have searched the support center and have not found any helpful threads for this issue I am having. I am attaching the document we initially found the issue with, this document contains 183 pages. Any help with this would be appreciated. I am using the TdxComponentPrinter with a TdxRichEditorControlReportLink to print the document.

Is that possible?

Subject: SearchLookupEdit - Clicking Column Chooser outside popup hides it
Text:
Hi,

- create a Winforms project with a Form;
- drag and drop SearchLookUpEdit editor;
- run the app;
- toggle to open the drop down of the editor ;
- resize the dropdown window as small as possible;
- right click on the PopupView columns header and select menu item 'Column Chooser';

The dialog shows up and then closes immediately along with the pop up window. It appears problem occurs only when 'Column Chooser' dialog top left window point is not in PopupView rectangle. If not reproducible, toggle context menu from most right part of the columns header. If still not reproducible, populate context menu with 20+ or so menu items and try 'Column Chooser' again.

Cheers!

Subject: SearchLookupEdit - Clicking the Column Chooser outside the popup hides it
Text:
Hi,

- create a Winforms project with a Form;
- drag and drop SearchLookUpEdit editor;
- run the app;
- toggle to open the drop down of the editor ;
- resize the dropdown window as small as possible;
- right click on the PopupView columns header and select menu item 'Column Chooser';

The dialog shows up and then closes immediately along with the pop up window. It appears problem occurs only when 'Column Chooser' dialog top left window point is not in PopupView rectangle. If not reproducible, toggle context menu from most right part of the columns header. If still not reproducible, populate context menu with 20+ or so menu items and try 'Column Chooser' again.

Cheers!

Subject: SearchLookUpEdit.Text property updates SearchLookUpEdit.EditValue when passed byref
Text:
First, I understand that when a variable is passed byref, it updates in the function/sub...  This is not a question about that behavior.

This issue is that the wrong property appears to be updated.  Consider the following code:
Dim dSettle As String = DataAccess.GetCMESettle(cbProduct.Text, sTerm1)
Where cbProduct.Text is the Text property of a SLE named cbProduct.

In my DataAccess layer, consider the following declaration:
Public Function GetCMESettle(ByRef prod As String, ByRef term As String) As String 'DataAccess stuff End Function
Before calling this function, my EditValue is, for example, 41983 with a Text value of "ME"
After calling this function, my EditValue is "ME." and Text is ""

I feel that if the Text Property is passed, the Text property should be updated after a byref call, if the EditValue property is passed, the EditValue property should update after a byref call.

Is this expected behavior?  I have attached a small sample project that shows the issue.

Subject: SearchLookUpEdit.Text property updates SearchLookUpEdit.EditValue when passed byref
Text:
First, I understand that when a variable is passed byref, it updates upon return.

This issue is that the wrong property appears to be updated.  Consider the following code:
Dim dSettle As String = DataAccess.GetCMESettle(cbProduct.Text, sTerm1)
Where cbProduct.Text is the Text property of a SLE named cbProduct.

In my DataAccess layer, consider the following declaration:
Public Function GetCMESettle(ByRef prod As String, ByRef term As String) As String 'DataAccess stuff End Function
Before calling this function, my EditValue is, for example, 41983 with a Text value of "ME"
After calling this function, my EditValue is "ME." and Text is ""

I feel that if the Text Property is passed, the Text property should be updated after a byref call, if the EditValue property is passed, the EditValue property should update after a byref call.

Is this expected behavior?  I have attached a small sample project that shows the issue.

Subject: Security - Logoff is required to reload and apply security permissions when editing a record a permission was based on
Text:
Hi,

this is serious issue with the security system and it makes it absolutely useless.

the issue is same/similar to this one claimed as fixed in 12.1 release -  https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/B220145 ,


steps to reproduce in your security demo app (13.2.12 and 14.2.4)

1. Remove Delete permission for fully accessible object for Demo role
2. set ObjectPermission for fully accessible object based on criteria Contains([Description], 'test') to Delete for Demo role
3. set description of fully accessible object to test
4. log in as John
5. John can delete fully accessible object (and that is correct)
6. change description to anything else that doesn't suit criteria specified
7. John still can delete object

Expected:
User shouldn't be able to delete object

Please look into this.

Subject: Security - Logoff is required to reload and apply security permissions when editing a record on which a permission was based
Text:
Hi,

this is serious issue with the security system and it makes it absolutely useless.

the issue is same/similar to this one claimed as fixed in 12.1 release -  https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/B220145 ,


steps to reproduce in your security demo app (13.2.12 and 14.2.4)

1. Remove Delete permission for fully accessible object for Demo role
2. set ObjectPermission for fully accessible object based on criteria Contains([Description], 'test') to Delete for Demo role
3. set description of fully accessible object to test
4. log in as John
5. John can delete fully accessible object (and that is correct)
6. change description to anything else that doesn't suit criteria specified
7. John still can delete object

Expected:
User shouldn't be able to delete object

Please look into this.

Subject: SelectBox - The scrolling feature works incorrectly after angular routing
Text:
Hi,

We are having a issue with every single DxSelectBox in our application. Every time we open a new feature module the scroll wheel in any DxSelectBox makes a bigger jump. Only the first time we open a feature module with a DxSelectBox the mouse wheel works as expected. After that, the number of items scrolled by a single scroll wheel movement increases every time a new feature module is loaded. With dozens of feature modules loaded a single scroll wheel movement moves the scroll straight to the end.

In our application we have a shared module where we export all the devextreme modules that we use. Every feature module in our application imports this shared module. Most of the feature modules are also lazy loaded and I think this is the root of the problem. I've made a simple sample application where I try to demonstrate this issue. If you remove lazy loading everything works as expected but with lazy loading enabled every feature module loaded increases the number of items scrolled by a single scroll wheel movement.


Best regards,
Pedro Ferreira

Subject: SelectBox - the scrolling feature works incorrectly loading extra components
Text:
Hi,

We are having a issue with every single DxSelectBox in our application. Every time we open a new feature module the scroll wheel in any DxSelectBox makes a bigger jump. After that, the number of items scrolled by a single scroll wheel movement increases every time a new feature module is loaded. With dozens of feature modules loaded a single scroll wheel movement moves the scroll straight to the end.

In our application we have a shared module where we export all the devextreme modules that we use. Every feature module in our application imports this shared module. Most of the feature modules are also lazy loaded and I think this is the root of the problem. I've made a simple sample application where I try to demonstrate this issue. If you remove lazy loading everything works as expected but with lazy loading enabled every feature module loaded increases the number of items scrolled by a single scroll wheel movement.


Best regards,
Pedro Ferreira

Subject: Skin Editor - Add the capability to make a skin active once any of its element or group are selected in the "Product groups" frame

4) Choose Ok
5) What you now see is a project where the upper skin is inherited from Darkroom and the lower skin is inherited from XMas2008 Blue. See attachment
6) If you click on any element in the inherited Darkroom, the skin stays in XMas2008Blue
7) If you double-click on the inherited Darkroom, this becomes bold and then the skin changes to darkroom.

I think this is not consistent and confusing.

Subject: Slow performance when drawing HTML tooltips (GridControl + ToolTipController)
Text:
Hello,

currently we are using your 14.1.3 WinForms controls on one of our projects.
Recently we noticed that the performance of drawing a tooltip on a GridControl via a ToolTipController is really slow for long tooltips.
On an older release of our product with older DevExpress version there wasn't such a performance problem.

I tracked down the problem to be somewhere between 12.2.8 and 13.2.7 (probably the issue was introduced with 13.1).

Please look at the two sample projects "ToolTipSample_v13" and "ToolTipSample_v12"; hover the mouse via any grid cell to display the tooltip. In the v12 example there is no delay between mouse hover and displaying of the tooltip.
In the v12 example however it takes a long time to draw the tooltip and the application freezes. Replacing the <br> tags with System.Environment.NewLine speeds up the drawing significantly but it's still slow compared to the v12 drawing.

I assume this affects other components where HTML test is parsed and drawn.

It would be great if the performance could be improved to the level of the old versions.

Thank you.

Subject: Slow performance when drawing HTML tooltips (GridControl + ToolTipController)
Text:
Hello,

currently we are using your 14.1.3 WinForms controls on one of our projects.
Recently we noticed that the performance of drawing a tooltip on a GridControl via a ToolTipController is really slow for long tooltips.

I tracked down the problem to be somewhere between 12.2.8 and 13.2.7 (probably the issue was introduced with 13.1).

Please look at the two sample projects "ToolTipSample_v13" and "ToolTipSample_v12"; hover the mouse via any grid cell to display the tooltip. In the v12 example there is no delay between mouse hover and displaying of the tooltip.
In the v13 example however it takes a long time to draw the tooltip and the application freezes. Replacing the <br> tags with System.Environment.NewLine speeds up the drawing significantly but it's still slow compared to the v12 drawing.

I assume this affects other components where HTML text is parsed and drawn.

It would be great if the performance could be improved to the level of the old versions.

Thank you.

Subject: Spreadsheet - How to allow inserting a row after the last row in a table
Text:
Hi

See attached workbook and please reference the sheet called 'Variance Registers'.

You will see that this sheet is basically a grid of information with a header section and a footer section. The idea is that an end user should only be able to insert, edit and delete rows within the main body of the grid but nowhere else (i.e. the table header, footer and all other rows should be locked from insertions or deletions.) In other words, only row 11 should be editable to start off with.

What I am trying to do is to restrict the 'Insert Row' and 'Delete Row' commands so that the insert row command will always add a row at the end of this table and nowhere else. So the first insert would insert a row just after row 11, regardless of which cell the end user was focusing on at the time. Also so that the delete row command will only work if the highlighted row is within the table.

I am very new to this control and am a bit perplexed as to how to achieve this at the moment. I would really appreciate a sample project to demonstrate this as I have searched the knowledge base for ages now and cannot find an existing sample for this.

Thanks in advance.

Subject: Spreadsheet - The ClearFormats method changes cell protection
Text:
Hello.

I found an issue in MVC SpreadSheet. I have a protected sheet with several unprotected rows. These rows have some formatting. Then when I call range.ClearFormats() on this rows the range.Protection.Locked changes from false to true. As a result, all cells in the worksheet are protected.

I also noticed it happens when all cells in a row are unlocked. If I unlock only a small region, everything works fine.

Subject: Spreadsheet - The MIRR formula isn't refreshed after changing its argument value
Text:
We are using the MIRR function in the excel spreadsheet.

There are multiple problems:
- If the data source for the MIRR calculation is invalid (should have at least one value smaller than zero per definition) the value is not updated
- even though there is a "IFERROR" function around the MIRR formula, DevExpress spreadsheet does not recognize the error in the source data (no value smaller than zero) and it does also not update the displayed value.
- when i save the spreadsheet and open it in excel, Excel claims an error and must repair the document.

Please see attached sample project and video how to reproduce the above.

Expected behavior is the following:
- Spreadsheet MIRR formula recognizes invalid data input and outputs an error
- IFERROR formular catches the error and sets the cell's value to "n/a" as defined for that case
- If spreadsheet is saved, no error when opened in Excel

Subject: Task dependencies are drawn incorrectly on scrolling the Gantt View
Text:
Dear Support Team,

I'm working on a resource planner application to schedule jobs with several work items for different resources. The database contains all of the appointments, resources and dependencies without overlapping between jobs. When I open the Gantt view to see the appointments (work items) with the corresponding dependencies, I realized that, the drawing of dependency lines depends on the horizontal scrolling of the view - the reorganization of the visible appointments may have effect on it. The problem is, that the visualisation of relationship changes: the appointments of two different jobs gets mixed in a specific point of the scolling - see the attached images.
Is there any workaround, or may I missed something regarding dependencies?
Thank you in advance!
BR.
Peter Tomek, MFKK

Subject: TcxGrid font does not scale with TForm.ParentFont = True
Text:
TcxGrid font usually scales when underlying TForm.Scaled = True.
But with TForm.ParentFont = True it does not scale anymore.

Probably this is a VCL issue:
TForm.ParentFont does not work properly in conjunction with TForm.Scaled.

Subject: TcxGrid font does not scale with TForm.ParentFont = True
Text:
TcxGrid usually scales when underlying TForm.Scaled = True.
But with TForm.ParentFont = True it does not scale anymore.

I suspect this is a bug.

Subject: TcxPopupEdit - Minimizing a Remote Desktop window that displays TcxGrid residing within TcxPopupEdit.PopupControl causes the "Control has no parent window" exception
Text:
Hi!
An error "Control '' has no parent windows" occurs when I use a TcxPopupEdit together with a TcxGrid as PopupComponent .
To recreate the issue, you need:
- a form
- a TcxPopupEdit on the form
- a TcxGrid on a TPanel as PopupControl
Run the application in a terminal server session or a remote desktop connection, open the popup window (and don't close it), minimize the remote desktop window, then restore the remote desktop window and you will get the error.

Please have a look at the enclosed test application.

The same error occurs if you define the edit properties of a TcxGrid as TcxPopupEditProperties and you attach the same panel+cxgrid to the properties of the column as PopupControl.

TIA,
Domenico

Subject: 'TdxSmartGlyph' vs 'TBitmap' - Change Glyph in the TcxTreeList.OnCustomDrawHeaderCell event handler
Text:
CxTreeList is used by us to simulate second tree with horizontal orientation.
Bands are not shown because of one request to the control.
With DevExpress 16.x behaviour program was fine but the sample is not tested under
DevExpress 16.x due to technical cause.
How we can achieve proper behaviour.

Test under DevExpress 17.3.
* Press Init to reset cxTreeList
* Press Glyph+ to show "+" glyphs in column heders
or Press Glyph- to show "-" glyphs in column heders
Enter cxTreelist, set focus to cell in second row - no effect.
Enter cxTreelist, set focus to cell in first row - all headers are gone.
Uncheck "TdxSmartGlyph.CreateFromBitmap(B) instead of TdxSmartGlyph.Create"
* Press Init to restore state.
* Repeat test - no problems.

 Thanks,
Thomas Hentschel

Subject: TestCafe - Retaining cookies between tests
Text:
Hi,

We are currently evaluating Test Café within our company and I am finding a problem I wonder if you can assist with.

Most of our websites require some form of user authentication before any actual activity can take place on the page.
I see that there is a way I can store a username and password prior to recording a test, however with out sites before I get to that stage the user is faced with 2 pop ups asking the user to first confirm the language and secondly the country they reside.
This is then stored as a cookie and the user is taken to a log in screen.

I am trying to write some user story test cases without constantly having to start by logging into the site,  is there a way of making TestCafe remember the locale I have selected and retain this for any future tests visiting the URL?
I am expecting by doing this I can use the username/password facility built into the fixture without having to go through the log in function every time and selecting the locale information.

The concern is that some of our sites require password changes on a semi-regular basis and I would rather just be updating this centrally (i.e within the fixture) than rewriting or correcting 30+ tests periodically.

Subject: TextEdit - How to invoke the Validating event
Text:
Hi,


External caller function will initialize winform and set textEdit control value. After winform is initialized, we would like to perform validation at the same time by raising validate event.

Currently, we are having problem with raising validating event.

In the textedit validating event, we check oldEditValue and EditValue to perform validating only when old and new edit value are not the same
and call external business logic method from control validating event.

When we load the form and set control value, we have called external business logic method and perform validation. But textedit control validation fire again after form is load and control value was set. How can we do to achieve to fire validation only once. Please advise.

Subject: The "TypeError: element.id.indexOf is not a function" JavaScript error if an array is passed to the isDXScriptElement function
Text:
Hi,

When using the Devexpress in a page which also loads data using Jquery ajax , one of the function in the script in (MVC/utils.js)

function isDXScriptElement(element){ return element && element.id && element.id.indexOf(__aspxStartupScriptPrefix) == 0; }

throws an exception, if the element being loaded has an id property and it is not of string type, The workaround i have done for now is to override this function to

function isDXScriptElement(element){ return element && element.id && element.id.toString().indexOf(__aspxStartupScriptPrefix) == 0; }

Can this be done in a different way or will this be marked as bug which will be fixed in the next release.

Subject: The "Use IsNullOrEmpty" refactoring is not compliant with best practice
Text:
The "Use IsNullOrEmpty" refactoring is replacing
something == ""with
String.IsNullOrEmpty(something)This is violation of rule SA1121: UseBuiltInTypeAlias (http://stylecop.soyuz5.com/SA1121.html)

Subject: The “FromPage“ and “ToPage” properties are not restored when the ReportPrintTool.LoadPrinterSettings method is used
Text:
Hello,
We found a bug in the DevExpress.XtraPrinting.PrintTool’s “LoadPrinterSettings” methods:

The methods “SavePrinterSettings” and “SavePrinterSettingsToStream” correctly save the properties “FromPage“ and “ToPage”. But these properties aren’t load to the PrintTool when reloading the settings with the “LoadPrinterSettings” and “LoadPrinterSettingsFromStream” methods.

Could you please check and fix?

Subject: The caret is rendered incorrectly while typing text in a WPF RichEditControl document
Text:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Create WPF application.
2. Add RichEditControl to MailWindow.
3. Create ribbon items: Home.
4. Launch the application.

5. Choose font "Arial".
6. Type "111111111111111111111111111111". (30 "1"`s).
7. As you type, observe that, with every keystroke the cursor is further away from the last letter typed.

8. Choose font "Times New Roman".
9. As in 6., Type "111111111111111111111111111111". (30 "1"`s).
10. As in 7., as you type, observe that, with every keystroke the cursor is further away from the last letter typed.


P.S. If you change font name to some non-existing "MyFontNameBlaBlaBla", this incorrect behaviour is observed for any typed characters.

Subject: The diagram layout is incorrect when the chart is embedded in the DocumentManager and the DirectX rendering mode is enabled
Text:
I've attached a screencast of an issue when attempting to use DirectX rendering.

Each tab shown in the document area of the interface (Actual Flowing Conditions, Qwater) is housing a user control containing the XtraChart.  The chart is inside of a layout control in a fixed size LayoutItem so that when the image is output for reporting purposes the positions of annotations and the image quality matches exactly what the user defined during data analysis. 

Hovering inside of the Pane causes the Crosshair to appear which is when the problem occurs, resizing the chart to fit into the entire viewing area.  You cannot click on annotations to update or move them so in this state the Crosshair option is not usable. 

I can confirm that using the default drawing method (not switching to DirectX) results in the correct behavior, this appears to only happen with DirectX rendering.

I am almost certain this is a bug but want to confirm that there isn't something else I need to enable specifically for XtraCharts directX.  The only option I've enabled is when launching the application, I call WindowsFormsSettings.ForceDirectXPaint().

Subject: The Document.AppendDocumentContent/InsertDocumentContent method incorrectly copies section properties in certain cases
Text:
With the current implementation when you insert content with sections using the AppendDocumentContent and InsertDocumentContent methods, the destination section's properties could be reset or overwritten by the inserted section's properties.

For example, the destination section's page size can be reset to Letter unexpectedly. This occurs if you copy a document range without the last paragraph of a section. In this case, the section settings are not copied. Our Word Processing engine creates a temporary document model for copied content with the default section setting (e.g., paper size set to Letter). After inserting the temporary document into the main document, the destination section's properties are overwritten. As a result, the destination section formatting (page size, page orientation, etc.) changes.

Subject: The EditValueChanging event is raised after changing the property in the view model
Text:
Hi, support:

I have a ComboBoxEdit which I want to users to confirm selection changes. Once changed I would do something in my data bound property setter in my VM. I found a similar ticket here: https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/Q440435

I set my XAML like this:
<dxe:ComboBoxEdit Grid.Column="1" Width="100" EditValueChanging="ComboBoxEdit_EditValueChanging" EditValue="{Binding Path=SelectedItem, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" ItemsSource="{Binding Path=Items}" />In the event handler I give users chance to cancel the selection. The problem is that "EditValueChanging" event is fired after my property is updated, which means my "SelectedItem" is updated first and then event fired. This scenario does not help me at all.

Could you please help me to make sure the event is fired before my property is updated? Thanks.

Bo

Subject: The Grid's average summary is exported incorrectly
Text:
Hi DevEx

I believe I've found a bug with the grid export mechanism. I have a grid column bound to a nullable integer, and an average summary displayed in the footer. When I export the grid to PDF, HTML etc. the printed average in the footer gives a different value. It seems that the exported average counts null values as part of its calculation, where as the grid does not. Either way, I shouldn't be getting different values for the same calculation!

I have attached a couple of screenshots to illustrate this.

All the other summary types seem to work as expected.

Thanks
Simon

Text:

Steps:
Run Project.
Click the button, this opens the report designer in a similar manner to how our application does it. 
Drag a chart onto the report.
Double click the chart to open the chart designer.
The dev tools will throw an error ("Impossible to get chart image.").


Kind regards,
John.

Subject: The NavBar control's OptionsBehavior.Common.DragDropFlags property setting applies to the NavBar designer and Customization Form in error
Text:
Hello,

Since a couple of releases I cannot use the NavBar Items Designer to add NavBarItems to NavBarGroups. After some investigation it turns out this is related to the state of dxNavBar.OptionsBehavior.Common.DragDropFlags. When these flags are turned off design-time, the Items Designer shows this erranous behavior.

Of course, I can go around the problem and have these flags turned off at runtime only, but it would be so much nicer if this behavior was fixed.

Best Regards,

our format function as follows

String.proto type.format = function(){
   //custom formation code
}

The above line of code throwing error .

Looking forward to hear from you.....

Subject: The Page Setup dialog in the PDF Viewer control does not save printer settings for certain printers
Text:
Dear DevExpress Team,

we do have a problem with WPF PdfViewerControl with printing.

We use it for label printing with a Brother QL-570. And i tested it with default Win 8.1 driver and newest brother original drivers. 

Problem:

Pressing the print button to get to Printer Settings. Then we have to pick the Printer and adjust the preferences of that printer. To adjust size and stuff.
And this settings will not be saved and only partially used.

Especially for custom settings like fixed with and custom length. It will have effects like e.g. setting a different custom length that it will still be print with default length but twice. And if we go back and forth the setting is always reset to default values.. usually your settings will be saved there.

Opening that created pdf with any other pdf reader and everything works as expected.

As of now we don't use PdfViewerControl for PrintPreview and open it with the installed default pdf reader, because of that problem.. however this not a ideal situation

Any ideas or solutions?

I also installed the newest version to test it, if it is already fixed. But it did not work properly there, too.

Subject: The RecurrenceInfo.GetDescription method returns an incorrect string for weekedays and weekends
Text:
Hi.
We are using a MonthlyRecurrenceControl to generate a RecurrenceInfo that we then use elsewhere in our product.

We display a list of the items using the RecurrenceInfo.GetDescription, unfortunately when selecting weekday, weekend day and day these will always return Friday for example
selecting the First Weekday of every 1 Month
will get a description of "the First Friday of every month"

I see a call Q500459 which was very similar and a statement it would be fixed in 13.2.6, but now having tried 13.2.9 it is still a problem

I have attached an example, just load it up, set the recurrence info to first weekday of every month and press the button.

Hope you can help, this is causing many problems

Thanks

Pete

Subject: The RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEdit.Assign method doesn't copy all settings from the source repository
Text:
[Moved from email to SC]

Paul 

Thx for your reply. I have decided to have another go at a Dx16 upgrade and I am very nearly there.

 

My first image is a form on .NET4 dx11. It is working correctly. Bank A/cc & CBD are default values on a newly added datatable’s datarow…

 

Here is the same form with Dx16 … 

I have decided to give you images rather than code at this stage on the off chance that there may be something that rings a bell.

 

The editor’s are both a customised SearchLookupEditor. I have checked that the default values on the datarow are correct as is DataSource (a BindingSource), ValueMember and DisplayMember on the editor. The underlying record is correct and will save to the db ok. A similar problem occurs if a saved record is retrieved and bound to the form. It is simply a display issue.

 

Interestingly, the Payable To field on the left-hand side is exactly the same editor and it is working correctly. The only real difference that I can see is that it does not have a default value. BTW the ValueMember is a Guid.

 

Michael

Subject: The resulting XLS file is corrupted when re-saving a document in a SpreadsheetControl
Text:
Hi Team,

Sorry to bother you once again, but I have a new problem with the XtraSpreadsheet. I load a document in a spreadsheetcontrol, then save it immediately using the default options (Document.SaveDocument). The original file has xls 97-2003 format. Saving takes a "long" (10s?) time and the resulting file is smaller than the original one. I can open the saved file again without problem using DevExpress control, but not with Excel 2010. Microsoft says the file is corrupted, tries to recover it but looses all formats (and maybe other data) after the recover.

I have attached the original file, the file obtained after DevExpress save and finally the file recovered by Excel 2010. It would be great if you could solve this strange behavior.

Best regards,
Ghislain

NB: If I use Excel to convert the original file to xlsx format, everything works fine. I can open it with DevExpress controls, save it (it takes five times less than under the xls format) and the resulting file is ok, up and running. Problem is: I have to preserve the xls format for backward compatibility with another application :-(

Subject: The SpreadsheetControl does not recognize the localized cell format
The SpreadsheetControl.GetCellFromPoint method returns inccorect results in a high resolution environment
