i am doing a Drag & Drop from listView to Spreadsheet in Wpf.
But i don´t obtaint the Data in the Cell where my Mouse Point.

Here is exactly my question:

How to determine the SpreadSheet cell currently under the mouse Cursor in WPF with spreadSheet.GetCellFromPoint() function.
here ist my Drop Event

private void SpreadSheet_DragDrop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)

{

System.Windows.Point point = e.GetPosition(spreadSheet);

System.Drawing.Point dp =new System.Drawing.Point((int) Point.X, (int) Point.Y);

Cell cell = spreadSheet.GetCellFromPoint(dp);

cell.Value ="test";

}

Subject: The SynchronizePointOptions property in the ASP.NET markup cause the compilation errors
Text:
A compilation error occurs if the SynchronizePointOptions property is included in the ASPX markup prior to upgrading to v14.1:

<cc1:Series LegendText="Risk Rating" Name="Compliance Risk Rating" SynchronizePointOptions="False">

The SynchronizePointOptions property has been removed in v14.1. This causes a conflict during the chart layout initialization and results in multiple errors related to WebChartControl elements, such as:
Type 'DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl' does not have a public property named 'ViewSerializable'
Type 'DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl' does not have a public property named 'SideBySideSeriesView'.
Type 'DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl' does not have a public property named 'LabelSerializable'.
Type 'DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl' does not have a public property named 'PieSeriesLabel'.

Subject: The XIRR function does not check whether or not a start date is smaller than an end date
Text:
Hi


After upgrading to 15.24, my program crashed with the following error message “{"An error occurred creating the form. See Exception.InnerException for details.  The error is: Function with same name is already defined."}.  Through trial and error, I found out, that my custom function XIRR is finally implemented (but only partial functional) in the latest build.


Its very strange that DevExpress did not announce it in What's New. I also checked the Online Documentation, NO XIRR!


Anyway I was very happy till I tried the function. Your XIRR implementation has no Error checking!! See attached screenshot.


Please note also the Black Fill color for pasted dates into Excel!


I really like your Spreadsheet control, but there are a lot of bugs in it. Some of them are, from my point of view, serious.
I start to feel a little bit like a Beta Tester.


All the best for the new year
Max Henry

Subject: There is hysteresis effect in NavBar content foreground changing during themes switching
Text:
STR:
1. Run OutlookInspiredApp demo
2. Switch to VS2010 theme
3. Look at the NavBar. Remeber foreground color. It is color #1.
4. Switch to Metropolis Dark theme.
5. Switch to VS2010 theme back.
6. Look at the NavBar. Remeber foreground color. It is color #2.
AR:
There is hysteresis effect. Color #1 and color #2 are different.
ER:
There is no hysteresis effect. NavBar content foreground is single-valued function of theme. Color #1 and color #2 are equal.

Subject: TreeList - Node cells are empty after restoring a layout created in earlier versions
Text:
We upgraded to 13.2.5. We have multiple forms with treelists on. Our users can save the layouts of the treelists. the saved layout is restored when the form opens. After upgrading to 13.2.5 we realised that this restoring of the layouts gives unexpected results. Most columns with just text in does not show any text etc.

The problem can be resolved as follows: The user deletes the layout xml. Close the form and opens it again. The form loads with the native layout. He then changes the layout the way he wants and save it again. When he opens the form the 3rd time, the layout restores as expected.

The problem that remains is that our project has hundreds of layouts saved. In other words this will take our users hours or days to redo all the layouts. We will not be very popular. Do you have any suggestions?

This is critical for us because you solved a number of problems in this release and we want to roll it out as soon as possible.

Subject: TreeList - The Cursor is changed to SizeWE and is serialized at design time
Text: I would just like to bring to your attention that sometimes the cursor of the TreeList will be set to SizeWE on its own. It will be set in design mode, so it can be reverted back, but it gets set by itself, not by user design. It has happened too many times for me to be positive that it is not the programmer doing it.

Subject: TreeList does not track changes in an array
Text:
I'm using a DevExtreme TreeList control and the datasource is set to a Knockout observable array. When I add (or update) items through the TreeList control the array correctly updates, however I have to manually call .valueHasMutated() on the array to notify any other observers (in the OnRowInserted event).

I'm guessing the way you are updating the datasource is not compatible with Knockout as it doesn't realise anything has changed, even though the underlying array has correctly been updated.

As an example, I have a DX TreeList and a standard HTML list. Both are bound to the same observable array. Adding items through the TreeList updates the TreeList but not the HTML list. Querying the array shows it has been updated correctly. Calling .valueHasMutated() on the array then updates the HTML list.

Subject: TreeList does not track changes in ko.observableArray
Text:

Subject: TreeView - Does the extension support the drag and drop functionality?

Subject: Turning on DirectX rendering and using the Crosshair on hover resizes charts and breaks interactivity with annotations
Text:
I've attached a screencast of an issue when attempting to use DirectX rendering.

Each tab shown in the document area of the interface (Actual Flowing Conditions, Qwater) is housing a user control containing the XtraChart.  The chart is inside of a layout control in a fixed size LayoutItem so that when the image is output for reporting purposes the positions of annotations and the image quality matches exactly what the user defined during data analysis. 

Hovering inside of the Pane causes the Crosshair to appear which is when the problem occurs, resizing the chart to fit into the entire viewing area.  You cannot click on annotations to update or move them so in this state the Crosshair option is not usable. 

I can confirm that using the default drawing method (not switching to DirectX) results in the correct behavior, this appears to only happen with DirectX rendering.

I am almost certain this is a bug but want to confirm that there isn't something else I need to enable specifically for XtraCharts directX.  The only option I've enabled is when launching the application, I call WindowsFormsSettings.ForceDirectXPaint().

Subject: Turning on DirectX rendering and using the Crosshair on hover resizes charts and breaks interactivity with annotations
Text:
I've attached a screencast of an issue when attempting to use DirectX rendering.

Each tab shown in the document area of the interface (Actual Flowing Conditions, Qwater) is housing a user control containing the XtraChart.  The chart is inside of a layout control in a fixed size LayoutItem so that when the image is output for reporting purposes the positions of annotations and the image quality matches exactly what the user defined during data analysis. 

Hovering inside of the Pane causes the Crosshair to appear which is when the problem occurs, resizing the chart to fit into the entire viewing area.  You cannot click on annotations to update or move them so in this state the Crosshair option is not usable. 

I can confirm that using the default drawing method (not switching to DirectX) results in the correct behavior, this appears to only happen with DirectX rendering.

Is there something else I need to enable in the chart control for DirectX rendering?  The only option I've enabled is when launching the application, I call WindowsFormsSettings.ForceDirectXPaint().

Subject: Unable to control the popup close behaviour on mouseclick outside the and mousehoverout event SlideOut control
Text:
Hi Team,


With reference to the below ticket,

https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/T622146/slideout-how-to-add-the-pin-option


We have tried to develop the PIN option using menuVisible and it works great.

I have a requirement where when SlideOut control is "pinned", the control should not hide/collapse when mouse clicked outside the control.
We are facing problem like clicking anywhere in the page leads to SlideOut control close.

We have tried exploring the documentation & Q&A but we cant locate the actual way to control the popup close behaviour when we click anywhere outside the slideout control within the page?
FYI - we have set false for "SwipeEnabled" property as well.


One more question, Is there a Event handler for the event for "mouse hover out" of slideout control? Basically trigger even when user mouse hover outside the control.
We tried finding the event for hover but cant locate it in your documentation?

We are expecting your answers earliest. 

Regards,
Yogesh S

I am trying to achieve this using an AutomaticMeasureUnitsCalculator which sets the DateTimeMeasureUnit and a Summary function which adjusts the SeriesPoints arguments values to align the data points.

Kind regards,

Matt

Subject: UploadControl - The "The Remote host closed this connection . The error code is 0X80070404CD" error occurs during a very long server request
Text:
Hi Dev Express Support, 
I am having an issue with UploadControl. I am uploading an excel file (less than 1 mb). Each row is converted into record and then its being processed and uploaded to Database.

While by job is still evaluating and processing the record, I get the error : "The server encountered an internal unspecified error that prevented it from fulfilling the request"  on the screen. 
As an example, say my excel has 25000 rows, c# code throws error while at row 17000 but continues to process the records.

This doesn't happen when number of row is less than 10000. 

I am : 
(1) Using , ASPxUploadControl.UploadMode property to Standard. I tried with advanced and have the same issue. 
(2) In Web.config .  my maxRequestLength is 2097151 
<httpRuntime targetFramework="4.5.1" maxRequestLength="2097151" />

Any help would be greatly appreciated. 

Thanks, 
Utsav.

Subject: Usability - Provide a capability to access a document source stream in the DocumentChanged event
Text:
If I handle the PdfViewer's DocumentChanged event, the only information provided is the DocumentFilePath. If I load my PdfViewer control from a MemoryStream, the DocumentFilePath will always be an empty string.

The PdfViewer should either provide access to the underlying document object, the document source stream or the PdfDocumentChangedEventArgs should expose the underlying stream.

I reverted to a prior version of the reports and they open in design view and do work in runtime.
Of course, I am back to the warnings issue.
Attached are before and after versions of two reports. While you probably can't run them without the rest of the project, I am hoping that you can figure out the issue by comparing the designer files.
How can this be resolved?

BTW, I've marked this as private, but only the attachments are private, so if you can remove the attachment, it can be changed to public.

Subject: Validation - Aggregated property validation can be bypassed when this single property is edited in the embedded DetailView of the ListView with MasterDetailMode = ListViewAndDetailView
Text:
I have a business object with a FileData property for file attachments.  I've given this property the RuleRequired attribute so that the user must attach a file when saving that type of business object.

However, I've discovered that if the user right-clicks on the property and chooses "Clear Content" from the popup menu that appears, they can save the business object without triggering the rule.  (The application knows they've changed something, because the Save button is enabled once "Clear Content" is clicked.)

This only appears to happen when I'm viewing the object in a ListViewAndDetailView tab.  And the rule is triggered if another property of the object is changed.

Subject: Validation does not prevent from saving
Text:
I have a client mobile app created from an ODataService.

My views are
   xxx.dxview/js - list view
   xxx-detail.dxview/js - detail view
   xxx-edit.dxview/js - edit view

I added a "required" rule, see code below.   If I blank the field a red "!" in a red circle appears when I tab from that field.
However, if I press the "SAVE" button in the upper-right, it does the save as normal despite the rule being broken.

<div class="dx-field-value" data-bind="dxTextBox: { value: studentactivity.Description, placeholder: 'Enter Student Description' }, dxValidator: { name: 'Description' , validationRules: [{ type: 'required' }]}"></div> I can provide the projects if necessary, but it needs a DB, an ODataService project and the client project, so it would be a nuisance to setup -- but just ask.

Subject: Visual Studio Designer freezes on an attempt to edit XAML with BarItems
Text:
Hello Support,

Hello Support,

I have been working on ViewX for the past 3+ years, and have been using DevExpress throughout that time.  I have upgraded the project as I went along.  Obviously I know a lot more today than when I started ViewX.  However, my source is my source and it will not be rewritten. My project started using Vs2010 and has migrated to Vs2015 or Vs2017.  The update to Vs2015 has been painful as editing of the XAML has become very ugly. Today I finished built a demo project for a memory leak issue.  I utilized cut and paste from my ViewX project sources.    Luckily, the resulting demo shows some of the major issues that I have been encountering when I try to update the XAML source code.  I would appreciate your suggestions and help how to fix my XAML editing.  The VS 2017 is a default install.  The CodeRush is the default install, but I disabled the XAML features trying to just edit the code.  I do look forward to using CodeRush in my future editing.  I have included the project zip file in this post and will include a video in the next post.

Thank you in advance for your help,

Bryce

Subject: Web Dashboard - Filter Editor does not show a list of filter values when the Object Data Source is used
Text:
In the MVC Dashboard Designer, a user can specify filter criteria for an item under the data / filtering menu.  This triggers a popup window in which the user enters one or more filter conditions by selecting a field, an operator and a value.

When entering a value, the user must type the exact value they are searching for from memory.  I would like to be able to show a drop-down list of possible values for the user to select from.  Ideally some kind of filtering search box would be available.

Is this feature provided by the dashboard designer and if not, is there any way I can modify this behaviour using javascript perhaps?

Subject: Web Dashboard - How to add a button with image to toolbar
Text:
T521519 describes a technique to add widget button that no longer works in 17.2.4 

To reproduce, use a dashboardViewer with a single grid and try your simple initial solution from T521519 to add the simplest possible input button directly in the chrome console:  with 17.1.x it works, but in 17.2.4, it does not work, partially because the <div> of class .dx-db-toolbar-internal no longer exists

We've tried to determine where we should add new buttons within the new dashboardViewer|widget|toolbar structure, but appending the button to <div class="dx-toolbar-items-container"> didn't work.  We got better results appending to <div class="dx-toolbar-after">, HOWEVER, the button is immediately wiped out when you hover over the widget toolbar, and any modifications are lost. There seems to be some new visibility code that is hiding/showing the export button and it wipes out changes to the dx-toolbar-after div.

Can you please give us a new, valid technique for extending toolbar buttons within widget toolbars?

Subject: Why DevExpress ASP.NET controls scripts and styles may not work
Text:
This KB Article addresses the following inquiries:
- Why may the JavaScript "'aspxAddDisabledItems' is undefined ..." error occur?
- Why may the JavaScript "ASPxClient*** is undefined ..." error occur?
- The default DevExpress ASP.NET controls styles/images/scripts are not loaded.

Subject: Why DevExpress extensions stop operating  after the first callback
Text: A View has several DevExpress extensions (in separate PartialViews) that can send callbacks. If an end-user performs an action that initiates a callback (i.e. sorting, paging, filtering GridView data, refreshing CallbackPanel, etc.), all DevExpress extensions stop operating correctly. There is no any JavaScript exception in this case.

Subject: Why DevExpress extensions stop operating  after the first callback
Text:
There are several DevExpress extensions (located in separate PartialViews ) operating via callbacks on a page. After an end-user performs an action that initiates a callback (i.e., sorting, paging, filtering GridView data, refreshing CallbackPanel, etc.), he/she sees one of the following issues: 

- infinitive spinning loading image;
- an extension becomes frozen;
- all the next callbacks don't work.

Subject: Why DevExpress MVC extensions stop operating after the first callback
Text: A View has several DevExpress extensions (in separate PartialViews) that can send callbacks. If an end-user performs an action that initiates a callback (i.e. sorting, paging, filtering GridView data, refreshing CallbackPanel, etc.), all DevExpress extensions stop operating correctly. There is no any JavaScript exception in this case.

Subject: Why DevExpress MVC extensions stop operating after the first callback
Text:
There are several DevExpress extensions (located in separate PartialViews ) operating via callbacks on a page. After an end-user performs an action that initiates a callback (i.e., sorting, paging, filtering GridView data, refreshing CallbackPanel, etc.), he/she sees one of the following issues: 

- infinitive spinning loading image;
- an extension becomes frozen;
- all the next callbacks don't work.

Subject: WidgetView - A touch scroll bar is briefly shown on moving a document
Text:
I have a DocumentManager set to have a WidgetView, and there is one document with a control I made, which is positioned at the top left.
This control has a grid with a TileView, with OptionsBehavior.AllowSmoothScrolling set to true, and OptionsTiles.ScrollMode set to TouchScrollBar.

I discovered when attempting to move the document, a phantom scroll bar persists for a few seconds. Any idea what's causing this?
This issue seems exclusive to TouchScrollBar - other scrollbar options work fine.

Video attached. Let me know if you need a sample project as well.

Subject: WindowInjectionResult when closing dialog
Text:
Hi,

I'm using MIF to show a dialog. When the dialog is closed using the close button, the WindowInjectionResult is as expected. Closing the dialog though the close button ( x in the top right corner) the result is None. So far, so good.
But when I close the window with the close button, cancel the close during closing command an then close the window by using the close (x) button, the result is still the result of the Close button, not the None result.

Steps to reproduce:
- Start the app and hit the 'Open MIF Dialog' button. The dialog opens.
- Check the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'OK' button. Result is as expected.

- Start the app and hit the 'Open MIF Dialog' button. The dialog opens.
- Check the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'X' button. Result is as expected.

- Start the app and hit the 'Open MIF Dialog' button. The dialog opens.
- UNCheck the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'OK' button. The dialog is not closed.
- Check the Allow close checkbox
- Hit the 'X' button. Result is the 'OK' button result, not 'None'

An other question: how can I set the dialogs owner when using MIF to show the dialogs across a larger application?

Subject: WorkspaceManager does not raise an event when a user captures a workspace with the same name as an existing one
Text:
I want to save the workspace info to a database when the user captures a workspace.  When the user captures the current workspace and gives it a new name, the WorkspaceAdded event fires and I can save the data.  But when the user gives it an existing name (overwriting an old workspace), then there is no event triggered. 

If I use the BarWorkspaceMenuItem 's ListItemClick, I can trigger on that list item with index -1, but it fires before the workspace is captured and I cannot get the new name or if the user clicked Cancel.


Is there an event I can use that fires when the workspace is actually captured?

Subject: WorkspaceManager does not raise an event when a user captures a workspace with the same name as an existing one
Text:
I want to save the workspace info to a second location when the user captures a workspace.  When the user captures the current workspace and gives it a new name, the WorkspaceAdded event fires and I can save the data.  But when the user gives it an existing name (overwriting an old workspace), then there is no event triggered. 

If I use the BarWorkspaceMenuItem 's ListItemClick, I can trigger on that list item with index -1, but it fires before the workspace is captured and I cannot get the new name or if the user clicked Cancel.


Is there an event I can use that fires when the workspace is actually captured?

Subject: WPF Map Editor - How to hide certain toolbar buttons
Text:
Hello,

I'm looking for certain Map Editor features:

1) Hide certain buttons
There is a thread for Win Forms Map Editor where it was implemented, see https://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/Question/Details/T639145/mapeditor-it-is-impossible-to-hide-certain-buttons

See Switching modes https://documentation.devexpress.com/WindowsForms/120215/Controls-and-Libraries/Map-Control/End-User-Features/Map-Editor

All these features are available on Win forms, what about WPF? Are these features gonna be implemented to WPF aswell, when?

Also I'm looking for ability to draw polygons using Map Editor with limited amount of dots(clicks), lets say 5 (to prevent user clicking only 5 times), is there any way to achieve this?

Best regards

Subject: WPF Pivot Grid - Lazy loading in the PreFilter Editor
Text:
I like the PreFilter. And I use the PreFilterString to save/load that filter in my serialization of the grid. That works excellent.

To create a simple condition in the PreFilter Editor needs some learning curve. But I've serious duration issues. EACH time the Prefilter editor is loaded it costs me about 1.5 minute for a table with 130,000 records and a couple of dozins fields. For my own chart wizard I get all unique values of each field and that costs me 2 secs; excluding the fact fields.

Is it possible a kind of lazy loading within the editor will be used? Like field values will be fetched not before the user wants to select something from the field value list and the possible values will be cached so it won't be done when the editor is loaded again.

Subject: XPO - XPCollection throws an exception (empty subcriteria in ContainsOperator) when filtered by a certain expression
Text:
Hello,

the containsoperator in Iif statements doesn't work.
If the parameters in the contains function are the same, then we get an exception: empty subcriteria.

works:
Anzeigename = Concat( Iif('ABSCHLUSSPROVISION' = 'ABSCHLUSSPROVISION' && Contains('','MIT DYNAMIK') , 'Abschlussvergütung - Dynamik','Bestandsvergütung'))doesn't works:
Anzeigename = Concat( Iif('ABSCHLUSSPROVISION' = 'ABSCHLUSSPROVISION' && Contains('MIT DYNAMIK','MIT DYNAMIK') , 'Abschlussvergütung - Dynamik','Bestandsvergütung'))
You can reproduce this behavior in the attached project.

best regards

Martin Stoll

Subject: XPO: How to purge deferred deleted object that belong to certain tables only?
Text:

Subject: XtraMap Getting Started - Lesson 3 - Binding a map control to data loaded from XML
Text:
This example illustrates how to bind a map control to data, which is stored in an external XML file. The XML data source contains information about wrecked ships including ship coordinates.

In this example, the map control automatically generates ship images based on data from a datasource, along with a description for each image on a tooltip.

Subject: XtraMap Getting Started - Lesson 3 - Binding a map control to data loaded from XML
Text:
This example illustrates how to bind a Map control to data. This data stored in an external XML file, which contains information about wrecked ships, including ship coordinates.

In this example, the map control automatically generates ship images based on data from the datasource, along with a description for each image in a tooltip.

Subject: XtraReport - All queries in a data source are executed when the report parameter loads
Text:
I have a report with 1 datasource that has 4 queries.
2 of the queries are used as dynamic lookups for 2 different visible report parameters. The other 2 queries are used to populate data in a chart and a table in the report.


When the report runs in the reportviewer, all 4 queries are executed when the report attempts to display the parameters panel.
Is this expected, i would have thought that only the queries aociated with lookups would need to be executed, the other 2 being executed when the report is submitted.
The reason i ask is that 2 of the queires take sometime to execute and this means there is a long delay before the parameters panel is displayed.

Is there any way of preventig the execution of the 2 queries not associated with dynamic lookups prior to the parameters panel being displayed?

Should we be setting the XtraReport.RequestParameters Property, will this help?

Subject: XtraReports - Extreme memory consumption with bound XRPictureBoxes in v18.1.8 and v18.2.3
Text:
Hello, I've updated XtraReports from 16.1.11 to 18.2.4 and our reports now take up a whole lot more memory and we are running into OutOfMemory Exceptions when reports have high number of pages.

We are using the XtraReports suite to generate catalogs of jewelry images. A user discovered that a report they were able to print before is now generating an OutOfMemory Exception. After some investigating, i found that the report suite is now taking up a much higher amount of memory than before when generating the same report.

In my attachment is an image of memory usage for the same report running on 16.1.11 and 18.2.4.

Our App using 16.1.11 version completes the report with 203 pages with a total of 137,380K of memory
with 18.2.4 it has to be stopped before the OutOfMemoryException. Stopped at 97 pages already has taken 915,892K of memory.

Is there anything we need to now add to the calling of the PreviewDialog to better handle memory?

Subject: XtraSpreadsheet - Conditional formatting defined for a cell is overridden by NumberFormat
Text:
Run the repro project

In cell A1 there is a conditional formatting rule that says that values between -2 and 2 should be green.

That same cell has "0.000;[Red]-0.000" as NumberFormat

If I input -1 in the cell A1, the number format has priority over the conditional formatting and the value is red instead of green. That is a bug.

Download the workbook and open it in Excel, you will notice that the conditional formatting should have priority.

Subject: XtraVerticalGrid - Read-only rows are not grayed out
Text:
Hello,

We are currently using DevExpress version V12.2.10 .0. Earlier we were using V8.2.6.0. Then we upgraded to V12.2.10.0.

Scenario:

1) DevExpress.XtraVerticalGrid.PropertyGridControl is used to display the object attributes and values of those attributes.
2) Read each row and depending on the attributes we decide to allow user to edit the value of attribute or make the row readonly.
3) To make the row readonly, we use following code:
row.Properties.ReadOnly = true;

Observed behavior with DevExpress version V8.2.6.0:
If we set row.Properties.ReadOnly to true, its cell value become grey. Looks like semi-transparent.

Observed behavior with DevExpress version V12.2.10.0:
If we set row.Properties.ReadOnly to true, its cell value colour does not change.

Issue:
We can not differentiate readonly attributes and editable attributes.

Questions:
1) Is it expected behavior in V12.2.10.0 or is it regression?
2) What is solution for this issue?

Subject: ZoomTrackBarControl - Provide the capability to snap the scroll thumb to a particular notch while dragging
Text:
I would like to see a SnapToMiddleValue property added to the ZoomTrackBarControl control, in order to make it act like the zoom trackbar in, say, Microsoft Word 2010.
Start up Word 2010. In the lower-right corner of the Word window, you'll see a zoom trackbar, preset to 100%. Drag the trackbar to the left until it's somewhere around 50% or so. Then, drag it back towards the center (100%). When it gets near 100%, it'll "snap" to the 100% mark.


Thank you for considering
